data.query: Why Re-KYC is required?
data.solution:
KYC (Know Your Customer) details are updated while opening the Account.
Based on RBI guidelines, Bank may ask for Re-KYC at specific intervals to keep the records of the Bank updated. If any of your personal or contact information has changed, they will updated in Bank Records through Re-KYC process.

data.query: What are the documents required for Re-KYC?
data.solution:
As per the RBI norms Re-KYC needs to done for all customers at specific intervals. Bank may request the customer to update their latest contact details and correspondence address with supporting documents.
Following documents can be submitted for Re-KYC (any one document as Proof of Identify and one for Proof of Address):

Passport
Voter's Identity Card
Driving License
Aadhaar Letter/Card

All documents should be self-attested.

data.query: What is the reason for my KYC not being updated?
data.solution: If you have completed your full KYC process through the biometric process, it may take up to 48 working hours to get updated. In case of physical way/traditional way, your KYC will be updated within 7 working days.

data.query: What is the procedure to complete the KYC for my 811 Account at an ATM?
data.solution:
Sorry, KYC cannot be completed at an ATM. You can complete the Full KYC of your Kotak 811 Lite or Kotak 811 Limited KYC Account, by using the Biometric Aadhaar Authentication from the comfort of your home or office in less than 5 minutes. 
Simply book an appointment via the Kotak 811 App (Mobile Banking) by following the steps below: 

1. Log into the Kotak 811 App with your CRN & MPIN 
2. Tap on '811' 
3. Book an appointment. 
Our customer service representative will call and meet you at a time convenient for you and help with the quick completion of the KYC process. 

Please note: Providing your Aadhaar Card details for Full KYC is voluntary.

data.query: KYC and Re-KYC	How do I re-open a Kotak 811 account if it is closed due to Non-completion of KYC?
data.solution:
We would like to inform you that you will not able to re-open your 811 Account or open new Kotak 811 account after your Kotak 811 account is closed . 
You can, however, open new savings account (except 811) with us by clicking here

data.query: Why I am getting messages that the KYC of my account has expired?
data.solution:
You seem to have a Kotak 811 Lite/Limited Account and validity of those accounts is one year. 
To continue the services, you are required to complete your KYC by booking an appointment through the Kotak 811 Mobile Banking App or by visiting the nearest branch. If you do not complete your KYC, your account will be closed.

data.query: How do I re-open a Kotak 811 account if it is closed due to Non-completion of KYC?
data.solution:
We would like to inform you that you will not able to re-open your 811 Account or open new Kotak 811 account after your Kotak 811 account is closed . 
You can, however, open new savings account (except 811) with us by clicking here.

data.query: What is the reason for my 811 Account is not working even after submitting the required KYC documents?
data.solution:
If you have completed your full KYC through the biometric process, it may take up to 48 working hours to get updated. 
In case of completion through the physical way/traditional way, your KYC will be updated within 7 working days.

data.query: How can I check my debit card delivery status?
data.solution:
Your Debit Card will be delivered to your address within 72 hours or might take 4-8 working days basis Pincode of few delivery locations. Use your Debit card to enjoy convenience, pay for shopping, entertainment etc.

Once we dispatch your Debit card, you will receive an SMS from Kotak Bank with the details of your package as well as a link to track the status. You can also check the courier details and status of your debit card, by clicking here.

data.query: My debit card pin was incorrectly returned with reason given as landmark needed.
data.solution:
You can view delivery status and update landmark by following below steps
Net-banking
1) Login to Net-Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will  see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Debit Card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
Mobile Banking
1) Login to Mobile Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will be see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Debit Card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
 
Please Note :: You will able to update landmark only in case of failed attempt of deliverable. 
This functionality is not applicable, in case of RTO (Return To Origin) which happens after 3 attempts to deliver
If deliverable status is RTO, Please call our cutomer care no 1860 266 2666 available between 10 am to 6 pm for redelivery of your Debit Card to nearest branch or registered address.

data.query: Delay in the delivery of my debit card pin.
data.solution:
Your debit card PIN should reach to you within 7 working days from the date you placed the request for new PIN/debit card. 
You can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here or else go ahead and apply for fresh one once again. 

Please Note: If debit card PIN was not delivered in second attempt also it will be returned to bank and same will be destroyed due to security reason, same PIN (package) will not be re-dispatched.

data.query: My debit card pin was delivered to the wrong address.
data.solution:
We deliver debit card PIN packages only on the registered correspondence address as per our records. The delivery is made only to family members at residences, and authorised personnel at office locations. 
In case your debit card PIN was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, nothing to worry as you can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here, once you generate new debit card PIN online so automatically old debit card PIN (sent by courier) will be invalid.

data.query: My debit card pin envelop was delivered in a open condition.
data.solution:
I am so sorry that this happened! We will definitely check this with our delivery partner and take necessary action. 
If you found your debit card PIN delivery package (envelope) with open/torn or damage (not useable) condition so for the time being, if possible, could you please return the package at your nearest branch or destroy it and apply for a new one or generate online.

data.query: Can I collect my debit card pin at the nearest branch?
data.solution: Now a days no need to wait for debit card PIN, you can regenerate that online by clicking here.

data.query: My debit card pin was returned.
data.solution:
In that case, here is what you can do: 
1. If your latest address is not updated in the bank's records or if your current registered address is incomplete or incorrect, please visit your nearest branch with relevant documents and update your address. 

2. You can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here.

data.query: Place a request for debit card pin redispatch.
data.solution:
Sorry we do not take a debit card PIN re-dispatch request as its returned in first two attempts made by our delivery partner (courier company).Once its returned to bank we destroy that due to security reason. 
You can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here.

data.query: My debit card pin status is reflecting delivered but I have not received.
data.solution:
Ohh! We deliver debit card PIN packages only on the registered correspondence address as per our records. I request you check with your family members once (if correspondence address is of residence) or with authorised personnel at office locations - normally at reception. 
In case your debit card PIN was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, nothing to worry because now you can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here, once you generate new PIN online so automatically old debit card PIN (sent by courier) will be invalid.

data.query: My debit card pin status is reflecting delivery attempted.
data.solution:
It looks our delivery partner (courier company executive) visited your location to deliver your cheque book but due to some reason (door locked, incomplete address etc.) it's not delivered. 
Net-banking
1) Login to Net-Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will  see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against debit card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
 
Mobile Banking
1) Login to Mobile Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will be see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against debit card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company

Please Note :: You will able to update landmark only in case of failed attempt of deliverable. 
This functionality is not applicable, in case of RTO (Return To Origin) which happens after 3 attempts to deliver
If deliverable status is RTO, Please call our cutomer care no 1860 266 2666 available between 10 am to 6 pm for redelivery of your Debit Card to nearest branch or registered address.

data.query: My debit card pin delivery status is reflecting in transit from long time.
data.solution:
It looks our delivery partner (courier company executive) visited your location to deliver your debit card PIN but due to some reason (door locked, incomplete address etc.) it's not delivered. 
Nothing to worry, now a days no need to wait for debit card PIN, you can regenerate that online by clicking here.

data.query: My debit card package was delivered open condition.
data.solution:
I am so sorry that this happened! We will definitely check this with our delivery partner and take necessary action. 
If you found your debit card delivery package (envelope) with open/torn or damage (not useable) condition so for the time being, if possible, could you please return the package at your nearest branch or destroy it and apply for a new one?

data.query: My debit card pin was returned as nobody was available to collect it.
data.solution:
Don't worry! In this case, our delivery partner will make a second attempt. If you still do not receive your package. 
You can regenerate new PIN for your debit card online by clicking here or else go ahead and apply for fresh one once again. 

Please Note: If debit card PIN was not delivered in second attempt also it will be returned to bank and same will be destroyed due to security reason, same PIN (package) will not be re-dispatched.

data.query: What is the correspondence address used for sending my Debit Card / Debit Card PIN?
data.solution:
The correspondence address can be checked under:

Mobile Banking > Profile 
First page of your cheque book & on your account statement

On Net banking, under Profile section, please check if your correspondence address registered with us is same as your current address

 Please track the package on the courier company website using AWB number sent on your registered mobile number.

You can also check the courier details and status of your debit card, by clicking here.

data.query: How do I re-activate my Debit Card?
data.solution:
Pick the most convenient way to do this from these options -
You can reactivate your debit card online by following few simple steps:

On Mobile Banking:


Go to Service Request

Activate / Deactivate Debit Card


On Net Banking:

You can also unblock your debit card by sending a simple SMS from your registered mobile number:

SMS DCUNBLOCK xxxx (last four digit of your debit card number) > 5676788 OR 9971056767

data.query: How can I block my debit card Temporarily/Permanently?
data.solution:
There are various options to block your debit card: 
You can block & replace your debit card online by following few simple steps: 

On Mobile Banking:

Go to Service Request
Select Debit card Service requests
Report loss of card (for Permanent Block)
Or Click on Activate/Deactivate Debit Card (for Temporary Block)


On Net Banking: 


Go to Service Request
Select Debit card Service requests
Report loss of card (for Permanent Block)

You can also temporarily block your debit card by visiting this link

data.query: Cash not dispensed from ATM or cash dispensed was lesser than the input amount
data.solution:
First of all, don't panic.
Normally, the full amount should get refunded incase cash was not dispensed or partial amount should get refunded if lesser cash was dispensed into your account within 24 Hrs from the time of ATM transaction.
If the full or partial amount is not reversed to your account within 24 Hours, please raise a service request by calling our 24x7 helpline. Once you raise a request, we will update you with the status within 7 working days.

data.query: I want to know details of a transaction
data.solution:
You can check the description given in your bank statement for the transaction. Following are some standard descriptions,

ATW : ATM withdrawal done from Kotak ATM machine.
ATL :  ATM withdrawal done from other bank ATM machine.
OS : Online shopping done on Net banking payment gateway from merchant web site.
IB : Transaction done on Kotak Net Banking
MB - Transaction done on Mobile banking. 
Int. Pd. : Interest credited on your savings account balance. 
PCD : Debit card Swipe/Pos transaction.
PB : Transaction done through Phone Banking (IVR).
Sweep transfer to : Booking new Term Deposit.
Sweep transfer from : Broken existing Term Deposit.

data.query: I do not recognize a transaction
data.solution:
Please check the description given in your bank statement or Transaction History which will you more clarity about the particulrar transaction,

The description may start with:

ATW - is for ATM withdrawal done from Kotak ATM machine.
ATL - is for ATM withdrawal done from other bank ATM machine.
OS - is for online shopping transaction done by using Net banking payment gateway from merchant web site.
IB - is for transaction done post logging into net banking on the Kotak website.
MB - is for transaction done post login on Mobile banking. 
Int. Pd. - Is for Interest credited on your savings account balance. 
PCD - is for debit card Swipe/POS transaction.
PB - is for transaction done through Phone Banking (on call).
Sweep transfer to - is for booking new Term Deposit.
Sweep transfer from  - Is from broken existing Term Deposit.

data.query: My Debit Card Purchase Transaction is declined but still the amount is debited
data.solution:
Sorry to hear that.
For debit card transaction, please contact us to raise dispute post checking with merchant
To contact us, please click here

data.query: I am not able to use my debit card at an ATM
data.solution:
Sorry to hear that. Any number of things could have happened. Please do the following checks,
1. Check the error message that appeared on the ATM machine screen and take steps accordingly, 
        For e.g. if error message is, 

"Network connectivity failure" -->  Please try again  
"Invalid PIN or Invalid Authentication" --> Please try again with corrent PIN or if you do not remember your PIN, you can Reset your PIN and try again. 

2. Check if your card is termporarily blocked. You can unblock your Debit Card using following steps
On Net Banking: 

Select Card > Debit card
Select Deactivate/ Activate card


On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking
Select Service Request -> Debit Card
Select Activate / Deactivate Debit Card

2. Check for any physical damage to your debit card like scratches & cracks on the magnetic strip or the chip 

3. Check daily transaction limit of your debit card. 
4. You can check & update the primary account number linked to your debit card by following these easy steps,
On Net Banking: 

Login to Net Banking 
Select Debit card
Select Change Primary/De-link account.

On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking
Select service request -> Debit card service Requests
Switch Primary account

data.query: I have been charged twice for same debit card transaction
data.solution:
It is possible that on the first attempt,  the merchant did not get a confirmation receipt on the POS machine and therefore the merchant swiped your card a second time.
But don't worry. Check your account once again after 24 to 48 hours to see if the same amount is reversed into your account. If it's not reversed, call our 24x7 helpline number.

data.query: I cancelled a transaction but amount is not refunded as yet
data.solution:
Please check with Merchant if the refund has been initiated at their end. After Merchant initiates the refund, it normally takes 3 to 4 working days for the amount to reflect in your account.
If the merchant has initiated the refund and even after 4 working days, the amount is not reflecting in your account, we request you to contact us with cancellation & refund confirmation from merchant like void slip / mail / letter to raise dispute
To contact us, please click here

data.query: I am charged more than the transaction amount for international transaction
data.solution:
For any International transaction, a cross currency mark up fee of 3.5% + GST is applicable on your spends using a debit card.
For transactions completed on international websites or amount claimed by a merchant in foreign currency or if the card has been physically used (swiped) while on international travel, the above mentioned charges will be applicable.

data.query: I have received defective or not as described goods / services from the merchant
data.solution:
Please contact us with the below information to raise dispute.
1. Order description
2. Details of what was defective in the order OR what was not as described as per Order description
3. Delivery date
To contact us, please click here

data.query: My amount is debited however I have not received the services / goods from merchant
data.solution:
Please contact us with the below information to raise dispute.
1. Description of Service/Merchandise.
2. Expected date of delivery for Services/Merchandise
3. Please attach response / communication received from merchant
To contact us, please click

data.query: Wrong Amount Charged to My Card Account
data.solution:
Please contact us with bill copy / invoice copy with correct transaction amount to raise dispute
To contact us, please click

data.query: ATM is not functioning
data.solution: We are sorry for the inconvenience, we would want to address this on priority. Please provide your contact number along with ATM ID or its Location here.

data.query: My debit card is stuck at Kotak ATM
data.solution:
For the security of your account we request you to approach your bank branch for the replacement of the card.

 If you are a Kotak customer, we request to replace your card immediately. 

 Two ways to replace your card:

On Net Banking
 • Select Debit card 
 • Select Apply for new card.

On Mobile Banking 
 • Go to Service Request -> Debit card Service requests
 • Report loss of card 
 • Select Replacement Required checkbox

data.query: What are my Debit Card charges?
data.solution: Depending upon the Debit Card & the Bank Account type you hold with us, Debit Card annual & issuance charges or both will be applicable. Check this link for full details on the applicable charges.

data.query: Debit Card annual fee has been charged twice
data.solution:
Normally the Debit Card annual fee is charged only once in a year, depending on the account type & Debit Card type you are holding with us.
 
It is possible that the day we charged a Debit Card annual fee on your account, your available balance may not have been sufficient enough to recover the full amount of charges. In that case, partial charges were debited & again the remaining charges were debited from the balance available in the account.

data.query: What are the ATM usage charges?
data.solution: ATM Charges may vary depending up on account type and / or Debit Card your are holding with us; please refer this link to check your account specific charges.

data.query: My Debit Card transaction failed for online purchase
data.solution:
Please check the reasons below to avoid debit card transaction failures: 

Card details entered are incorrect ( Card number, card expiry and CVV)
Incorrect OTP / Incorrect VBV Verified by Visa password
Make sure you have your registered Mobile number with you as OTP will be delivered on the registered number only
Check your transactions to ensure you haven't crossed the daily online transaction limit of your debit card.
Your Card is Temporarily blocked, please unblock it through below channels:


Net banking  
Mobile Banking
SMS <DCUNBLOCK xxxx (last four digit of your debit card number)> to 5676788 OR 9971056767 from your registered mobile number

data.query: My Debit Card PIN is not working
data.solution:
You can regenerate your debit card PIN online by following simple steps:
On Mobile Banking


Go to Service Request -> Debit card requests 
Select Regenerate PIN 


On Net Banking:


Go to Card > Debit card
Select Instant Re - generation of Pin

You can also regenerate debit card pin by visiting this link.
Please Note:

PIN can be generated for active cards only.
If the card is temporarily blocked, then you will need to unblock the card to initiate regeneration of PIN.

PIN cannot be regenerated for Debit/Credit Cards that are permanently blocked.

data.query: My debit card is not working on ATM/POS
data.solution:
Sorry to hear that. Any number of things could have happened. Please do the following checks,
1. Check the error message that appeared on the ATM machine screen or POS Screen and take steps accordingly, 
        For e.g. if error message is, 

"Network connectivity failure" -->  Please try again  
"Invalid PIN or Invalid Authentication" --> Please try again with corrent PIN or if you do not remember your PIN, you can Reset your PIN and try again. 

2. Check if your card is temporarily blocked. You can unblock your Debit Card using following steps
On Net Banking: 

Select Card > Debit card
Select Deactivate/ Activate card


On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking
Select Service Request -> Debit Card
Select Activate / Deactivate Debit Card

2. Check for any physical damage to your debit card like scratches & cracks on the magnetic strip or the chip 

3. Check daily transaction limit of your debit card. 
4. You can check & update the primary account number linked to your debit card by following these easy steps,
On Net Banking: 

Login to Net Banking 
Select Debit card
Select Change Primary/De-link account.

On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking
Select service request -> Debit card service Requests
Switch Primary account

5. You can also unblock your debit card by sending a simple SMS from your registered mobile number:
SMS <DCUNBLOCK xxxx (last four digit of your debit card number)> to  5676788 OR 9971056767

data.query: How can I report a fraud transaction on my debit card/savings account?
data.solution:
Request you to go through all possible details of the transaction on your bank account statement — e.g. merchant name, time of the transaction, any transaction done with same merchant or website in the past to see if it being reflected only now. Also, you may also check with family members if they have used your debit / credit card.
You can then ask to block your debit / credit card & other channels like Net banking and Mobile banking by calling our 24x7 helpline number 1800 209 0000 or click here   to report the fraud transaction.

data.query: Where can I find my CVV number?
data.solution:
Your CVV is the three-digit number available on the back side of your debit card.
If you're using a Virtual Debit Card (for 811 customers only), you'll need to click on the debit card image to flip and see the three-digit CVV number. 
Please Note: Some websites ask to enter CVV 1 & CVV 2 — simply enter the same three digit number at both the places.

data.query: I want to close my savings account
data.solution:
We understand that you wish to close your Kotak Savings Account and we are here to assist you. However, we would like to share a few key benefits that you can avail only with your Kotak Savings Account:
 

Up to 4%* interest p.a. on your balances
Unlimited free ATM withdrawals on Kotak ATMs (except for 811 Savings Account)
Free online transactions – UPI, NEFT, RTGS

 
If you still wish to close your Savings Account, kindly visit your nearest branch.
*Interest on Savings Account balance: *W.e.f. Jun 13, 2022, daily balances in Savings Account above Rs. 50 lakhs will earn 4% interest p.a. Daily balances in Savings Account up to Rs. 50 lakhs will continue to earn 3.50% interest p.a. These interest rates are applicable for Resident Accounts only.
If account is closed after 1 month & before 6 months of A/C opening, Account Closure Fee will be levied as per the Product Variant. Please refer Fees & Charges section on website for further details.
Please click here for latest information on interest rates.

data.query: Documents required to open a savings account
data.solution:
All you need are the usual KYC documents which include Address Proof, Signature Proof & Photo ID Proof 
List of Documents required

data.query: My account balance shown is not matching as per my calculation
data.solution:
Please do the following checks,

Your recently deposited cheque might be in under clearance process,  creating the difference in expected balance and available balance or/and

There might be a partial or full hold on balance by the bank with regards to a specific transaction requested or/and
Bank charges might have been applied for any number of reasons including related to a cheque issued,  non-maintenance of Average Monthly Balance charges etc.

data.query: Why my balance is on hold?
data.solution:
Your account balance might be on hold fully or partially, due to:

Any specific transaction instruction set,
Un-cleared cheque,
Overdue loan account or credit card payment,
Towards recovery of outstanding charges pertaining to your account like non maintenance of average monthly balance, ECS bounce charges ,IPO applied for investment etc.

We appreciate your business . We are transparent in communicating the rates and charges of our products and services.
The lien will be marked as per the 'Banker's Right of General Lien' vested with our Bank. It permits the bank to adjust the overdue from your designated savings bank account or your other accounts held in the same legal capacity.
To know your account features, benefits & applicable charges , Click here to know the General Schedule of Features & Charges GSFC.

data.query: How can I check my Account Balance?
data.solution:
There are 5 ways to check your balance, choose what works best for you from the following options: 
1. On WhatsApp: You can easily check your account balance on WhatsApp: 

Give us a Missed call on 9718566655 from your registered mobile number to get started. You will immediately receive a welcome message and all services related details on WhatsApp from Kotak Bank's official number 022 66006022 or just click here.
Type Bal and view your account balance.
 

2. On Mobile Banking:


Login to Mobile Banking.
Go to Banking.

data.query: How can I change my correspondence/communication address?
data.solution:
You can update your Correspondence address through Net Banking. Please find below the path:

 3) Click on Edit button next to Correspondence Address
 4) Select either of the options
Update address using Aadhar Number & OTP (address will be instantly updated)
Update address by uploading Address Proof (address will be updated in 1 working day). Valid address proof are Passport, Aadhaar Number, Driving License and Voter ID.


 You can place a request at the nearest branch with the required documents viz. Passport, Aadhaar Number, Driving License and Voter ID. It will be executed within 1 working day from the date the request is placed. Please carry the originals and their self-attested copies.
In order to change the address only in the Credit Card records, you can also call our 24X7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 (call charges apply). This request will take upto 10 working days.

data.query: I want my account balance to be invested in FD automatically (ActivMoney Facility)
data.solution:
Yes, we can do that for you. We offer ActivMoney facility where you can define an upper limit for the amount you want to keep in your savings bank account, which is known as the threshold limit. Whenever your balance is higher than your threshold limit, the surplus amount will be transferred to the FD account automatically.

data.query: Cheque deposited but not reflecting in my account
data.solution:
We request you to do following checks,
1. Cheque clearing timelines

Kotak to Kotak (Fund Transfer cheque) takes 1 working day
Payable at Par cheque of all other banks across India will take 2 to 3 Working days
Outstation cheque takes 14 to 17 working days
International cheque takes 21 working days

2. If you have deposited the cheque at an ATM drop box or at an off site ATM drop box, it may take 1 to 2 extra working days.  

3. Also, verify that the cheque you are depositing is valid (within 3 month from date of issue, No over-writing of name, signature, amount in words and in figures)

2. At a branch via a physical form request. Please keep handy the cheque number or numbers which you would like to revoke/reactivate.

data.query: Delay in the delivery of my account welcome kit
data.solution:
Your welcome kit should reach you within 7 working days from the date your newly opened account got activated. 
If this time frame has elapsed, please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply) to check the status and/or place a re-dispatch request.

data.query: My account welcome kit was incorrectly returned with reason given as landmark needed.
data.solution:
You can view delivery status and update landmark by following below steps
Net-banking
1) Login to Net-Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will  see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Welcome Kit displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
Mobile Banking
1) Login to Mobile Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will be see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Welcome Kit displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company

Please Note :: You will able to update landmark only in case of failed attempt of deliverable. 
This functionality is not applicable, in case of RTO (Return To Origin) which happens after 3 attempts to deliver
If deliverable status is RTO, Please call our cutomer care no 1860 266 2666 available between 10 am to 6 pm for redelivery of your Welcome Kit to nearest branch or registered address.

data.query: My account welcome kit was delivered to the wrong address.
data.solution:
We deliver your account welcome kit packages only on the registered correspondence address given by you on the account opening application form. 
The delivery is made only to family members at your residence, OR at an office location to you or authorised person from your organization (usually at the reception). 

In case your welcome kit was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, please do inform us by calling our 24x7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 (Standard call charges applicable).

data.query: Can I collect my account welcome kit at the nearest branch
data.solution: Sorry, we do not deliver your account welcome kit to any branch. It can be delivered only on your registered correspondence address.

data.query: My account welcome kit package got returned.
data.solution:
In that case, here is what you can do:
1. If you feel that your latest address is not updated in the bank's records or if your current registered address is incomplete or incorrect, please visit your nearest branch with relevant documents and update your address. 

2. Once/If your address is correctly updated in the bank's records, please place a request to re-dispatch your newly opened account welcome kit by calling our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply).

data.query: My account welcome kit redispatch
data.solution:
If you find first two attempts has been already made by our delivery partner and then too your newly opened account welcome kit is become undelivered so to place a re-dispatch request, please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply). 
However, please note the following: 

A re-dispatch request can be taken only if there is no change in address and you verify it. If you feel you need to change/update your address, please do this by visiting your nearest branch with relevant documents and place a re-dispatch request by calling us only once address change is done. 
Please Note: If you wish to change your correspondence address only for credit card records or / and if you hold only credit card (not bank account) with us, so you can place a address change request by calling our customer care number also.

data.query: What to do if my welcome kit package was delivered in an open condition
data.solution: We are so sorry that this happened!  If you have found your Welcome Kit delivery package (envelope) in an open/torn or damage (not useable) condition please return the package at your nearest branch or destroy it and apply for a new one.

data.query: My account welcome kit status is reflecting delivered but I have not received
data.solution:
Ohh! We deliver the welcome kit package only to the registered correspondence address as per our records.
Here is what you should do if you haven't received it but the status shows that it is delivered: 

1. If the correspondence address is your residence, check if one of your family members has taken the delivery. If your address is an office or workplace, please check with authorised personnel (normally the reception or security desk). 

2. If it was returned from your correspondence address, it could have been delivered to your home branch or nearest branch. To confirm this, please call our helpline number. 

3. If you are sure that your welcome kit was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, or if you are unable to trace it, please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply) for further assistance. You can ask for proof of delivery on the same call.

data.query: What is ActivMoney?
data.solution: This is a facility whereby surplus funds above a specified threshold are transferred from Current/Savings Account to Fixed deposit and is transferred back from Fixed deposit to linked Current/Savings account in case of any shortfall in balances

data.query: What is the benefit in opting for this facility?
data.solution: This is a facility which allows you to enjoy complete liquidity of a Savings or Current Account coupled with high earnings of a Fixed Deposit. This is achieved by automatically creating a fixed deposit whenever the balance in your account crosses a specified threshold and, this deposit is auto-linked to the same account from where the funds are moved to provide you with total-liquidity

data.query: What is a sweep in/sweep out threshold limit with respect to ActivMoney?
data.solution:
Sweep out threshold limit is an upper limit defined in the account above which balance is transferred to auto Fixed deposit which is linked to current/savings account
Sweep In threshold limit is the limit set in account below which funds from the linked auto fixed deposit will move to current/savings account.

data.query: What are the Sweep in/Sweep out threshold values for Savings and current A/cs variants for this facility?
data.solution:
Type of account

Minimum Sweep in/out threshold value for new signup*

Edge & other equivalent savings account variants

Rs 25,000

Ace / Pro & other equivalent variants

Rs 50,000

Kotak 811 account

Rs 25,000 (Sweep out)
Rs 20,000 (Sweep in)

All Salary Account variants

Rs 25,000

NRO & NRE Savings Accounts

 
Rs. 25,000 for all variants except Platina
Rs. 2 Lacs for Platina NRO/ NRE Variants.
 

Accounts under Kotak Privy League programme

Rs 3 lacs

Accounts under Kotak Private Banking programme

Rs 5 lacs*

Current Account

More than or equal to 3 times the required Minimum balance requirement applicable as per the product variant OR Rs 50,000 whichever is higher


* Minimum Sweep in/out threshold value for accounts under Kotak private banking league will be revised to 5 lacs from 10 lacs for new ActivMoney registrations w.e.f 1st Aug’23. For ActivMoney registrations before 1st Aug’'23, Minimum sweep in/out threshold will continue to be Rs 10,00,000
Apply for kotak current account

data.query: I have a joint account with my family member, however we see different ActivMoney limits for sign up via Mobile Banking?
data.solution: You would normally see same limits, however if only one of you is part of the Kotak Privy League or Kotak Private Banking programme, then you may see different limit as defined by the programme

data.query: I have an Edge account in joint mode of operation with my family member, however while signing up via Mobile app, I can see ActivMoney sign up limit of 3,00,000/- for the said joint account, whereas my family member can see a sign up limit of 25,000/-, Why are we seeing two different limits for the same account?
data.solution: You see limits based on the login CRN relationship with the bank. You would be part of Kotak Privy league programme and hence are seeing limit of Rs 3, 00,000/- as defined by the programme

data.query: How does ActivMoney Facility work?
data.solution:
Every day, at the end of the day if there is surplus money over the specified threshold (sweep out limit, the same would be auto-moved to a fixed deposit of 180 days duration ( 1 year for NRE SA) at the prevailing fixed deposit rate.  And, this deposit is auto-linked to the same account from where the funds are moved to provide you with total-liquidity. In case you are falling short of funds in your account the deficit will be withdrawn from your Fixed Deposit so that you can enjoy financial peace of mind and live worry-free.  What is more; the fixed deposit thus created does not carry any pre-closure/part closure penalty which is usually 0.5% to 1%; you save on that too. 
Illustration:
Let’s say you have a Kotak Edge Savings Account and you opt for the ActivMoney facility.
The default ActivMoney threshold for your savings account is Rs.25, 000.
Now in case your savings account balance is more than the threshold of Rs.25,000 at the end of the day, the excess amount will automatically get transferred in multiples of Rs.5,000* to a 180 day FD. You will then earn the prevailing FD rate on the balance that has been transferred to the FD. As this FD is linked to your savings account, you can access the funds whenever you wish to, with no penalty charges.
In case you are falling short of funds in your savings account, you need not worry as the deficit will be withdrawn from your FD automatically
While there is nil penalty on premature withdrawal as contracted tenor of FD is 180 days, very early premature withdrawal like 45 days or before at times may result in interest earnings on FD lower than savings bank account interest

**Liquidated Dep2 for Rs. 25, 000 and liquidated in part for Rs.15, 000 from Dep1 to honour the cheque of Rs.40, 000 as breaking of FD is done in multiples of Rs.5, 000. Dep2 will earn interest for 15 days at the applicable rate without penalty (on LIFO basis) as it exceeds 7 days which is minimum period required to be eligible for interest and Rs.10000 liquidated from Dep1 would earn eligible interest for 16 days. In the above scenario, due to early premature withdrawal, the interest earned on Dep 1 & Dep 2 at times would be lower than savings interest
FDs will be created and broken in multiples of ₹5,000 for new ActivMoney registrations w.e.f 5th July’23. For ActivMoney registrations before 5th July'23, Fds will continue to be made in 10,000 but will be broken in multiples of Rs 5,000

data.query: Is Senior Citizen rate applicable on FDs created via ActivMoney Feature?
data.solution: No. For FDs made through the feature of ActivMoney (2 way sweep deposits) Regular Fixed Deposit rates will be applicable for all customers including Senior Citizens.

data.query: Do I get Fixed Deposit advice for fixed deposits created via ActivMoney Feature?
data.solution: No.  Fixed Deposit advice is not issued, in case of fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature

data.query: Can customer submit nomination facility for these Flexi Fixed Deposit/ ActivMoney Term Deposits?
data.solution: In case of FD created through ActivMoney feature, nomination made by the customer in respect of the linked savings / current account will be replicated

data.query: Can we have both Active Money and one way sweep-in facility (Linked FD) in the same current /saving account?
data.solution: No. Only one facility can be availed at a time. ActivMoney (two way sweep deposits) and Sweep -in facility on standalone Fixed deposit cannot be provided in the same Current /Savings account

data.query: Can I pre-close the Fixed Deposit created via ActivMoney feature linked to the account?
data.solution: Yes. You can pre-close the auto fixed deposit (made via ActivMoney feature) linked to the account. However before closing the FDs manually, you would need to deactivate the ActivMoney feature

data.query: Can the holding pattern in linked Fixed Deposit and Current/Saving account be different?
data.solution: FDs made through the ActivMoney facility will be created with mode of operation as in the linked Current/Savings account and is not modifiable

data.query: What advantages does the Kotak ActivMoney facility provide over other sweep in products offers in the market?
data.solution:
Funds in excess of sweep out threshold limit moves in to Fixed Deposit on daily basis at end of the day as compared to products of many other banks where it is transferred on a fixed day of the week or at a fixed frequency. This feature helps the excess money in the account to earn higher interest for more number of days via the Kotak ActivMoney product 
No premature penalty is applicable on Fixed Deposits made through ActivMoney as these are booked for 180 days. Other offerings in the market may charge penalty ranging from 0.5% to 1% on premature liquidation of FDs

data.query: What are the charges applicable to enrol for ActivMoney Facility?
data.solution: This facility can be availed in eligible accounts without any charges

data.query: Who can avail ActivMoney facility?
data.solution: This facility can be provided to both savings and current account customers except for account variants where the feature of Active Money has been disabled at the time of creation. It is also not available in case your Pan Number is not updated

data.query: Can existing customers sign up for ActivMoney via net banking or mobile banking facility?
data.solution:
Existing customers can sign up for this facility via Mobile banking App. The facility will also be available via Net Banking shortly. Existing customers can also enrol for ActivMoney facility by contacting Customer Experience Center or visiting the nearest branch
In case you already have a Kotak Savings Account, activate now

data.query: I cannot see one or more of my accounts when applying for ActivMoney via  Mobile banking
data.solution:
In the following cases, you will not be able to sign up an account for ActivMoney facility via Mobile Banking:

Account has a linked FD or an Overdraft facility or is a Current account
Is in dormant or Freeze Marked Status
Is under Jointly mode of operation
Minor account

 
For more details, please visit the nearest Kotak branch

data.query: Is the tenure for fixed deposits booked via ActivMoney facility modifiable?
data.solution: No. Fixed deposits made through ActivMoney feature are for booked for a default duration of 180 days for Resident and NRO account and the same is non-modifiable. For NRE accounts, this default duration is 1 year.

data.query: Will customer get separate statement for sweep in/sweep out transactions via ActivMoney feature?
data.solution: Customer will not receive a separate statement for Sweep in/Sweep out transactions triggered due to ActivMoney feature.

data.query: Is TDS applicable on fixed deposits booked via ActivMoney feature?
data.solution: Yes. TDS as per extant guidelines will be applicable on fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature

data.query: Once ActivMoney is opted for, will I earn fixed deposit interest rate plus savings account interest rate on fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature?
data.solution: Fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature will earn fixed deposit interest rate and savings interest will be applicable on the balance retained in the savings account. Interest is not applicable on balances maintained in the current account

data.query: Is there a penalty applicable in case funds are reversed from fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature for meeting Current/Savings account obligations?
data.solution: Penalty is not applicable on premature withdrawal of fixed deposits created via ActivMoney feature as they are booked by default for a contracted tenor of 180 days. However in case of NRE accounts, FDs closed before 1 year will not earn any interest.

data.query: Can I use my existing Salary Account if I have changed employers ?
data.solution: Yes, In case an arrangement exists between your new corporate and Kotak bank. Please check with your company HR, if there is an arrangement between the two, please get your Kotak account mapped to your payroll system.Also, we request you to visit the nearest branch along with a letter. The letter should have your complete name, company's name and account number and should state that you have joined this new corporate and want to map the company code of your new company with your account.

data.query: Can a Company ID card be accepted as a Photo ID document?
data.solution: No, a Company ID cannot be accepted as a Photo ID document. A government issued photo ID card is mandatory.

data.query: Why am I charged for not maintaining balance in my Corporate salary account?
data.solution:
To enjoy "Zero balance " on your corporate salary account, your account needs to have monthly Salary credits.  In case salary credits have stopped for two or more months  you are required to maintain AMB (Average monthly balance) as per the product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000 (whichever is lower)  ,failing which applicable charges will be levied. 
As a bank, we are transparent in communicating the rates and charges of our products and services. Apart from communication about applicable charges as a part of account opening documentations, bank also sends regular SMS/email alerts prior to levy of non-maintenance charges on your registered mobile number and email id.

Click here to know details of General Schedule of Features & Charges (GSFC) applicable on your account.

Tips to avoid charges for non-maintenance of AMB:

1. Ensure regular Salary credits in your Corporate Salary account - In case you have changed your emlpoyer, check with your new employer on provision of linking your existing Kotak Corporate Salary Account for receiving your salary from new employer
2. Avoid maintaining multiple accounts: This way you don’t have to worry about tracking different accounts, plus you can access your funds with much more ease, rather than blocking them through these conditions of AMB requirement under all accounts
3. Smart withdrawals: Instead of withdrawing excess funds from your account in advance, use your debit card or digital mode of payments for transactions as and when needed. Advance withdrawals impact opportunity to earn interest on your savings account balance & also AMB requirement
4. Pay attention to notifications sent by the bank regarding your accounts - Bank sends regular notification on your registered mobile number/email id regarding non credit of salary, on maintenance of AMB prior to levy of these charges. Basis these initmations, you can fund your account suitably to meet the required AMB and there by avoid charges
5. In case you are certain of no further salary credit in your corporate salary account & are not able to maintain AMB requirement, reach out to any of our branches for conversion of account to different Savings account variant with lower or Nil AMB requirement as applicable as per bank's policy

data.query: I was not informed about non maintenance charges on my account
data.solution:
As a bank, we are transparent in communicating the rates and charges applicable for our products and services. Apart from communicating about applicable charges as a part of account opening documentation , bank also sends regular SMS/email alerts prior to levy of non-maintenance charges on your registered mobile number/email id.
For Corporate Salary accounts, in case salary credits have stopped for two or more months  the account is required to maintain AMB (Average monthly balance) as per the product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000 (whichever is lower) , failing which applicable charges will be levied.  In order to safeguard interest of our customers, we proactively send SMS/email alerts to notify regarding non receipt of salary credit and non maintenance of average monthly balance prior to levy of charges. This gives an opportunity to customers to ensure account is suitably funded to maintain average monthly balance/enable Salary credit to avoid levy of charges

Click here to know details of General Schedule of Features & Charges (GSFC) applicable

data.query: How do I convert my salary account into  “zero balance” account ?
data.solution:
You Corporate Salary account is a " zero balance" account till the time salary is getting credited in the account. In case salary credits have stopped for two or more months  the account is required to maintain AMB (Average monthly balance) as per the product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000 (whichever is lower) ,failing which applicable charges will be levied.
Click here to know details of General Schedule of Features & Charges (GSFC) applicable

For conversion of your Corporate salary account to a different Savings account variant with lower AMB requirement, please visit any of our nearest branch to reommend you suitable account variant

data.query: How much is the maximum balance I can keep in my salary account?
data.solution: There is no limit on  the maximum balance.

data.query: If I change my job then salary account will remain or it will convert into other account?
data.solution:
If you are changing your job then there is a high probability that Kotak is an empanelled banker with the new organization for corporate salary relationship. Please check with the HR at your new organisation for same.
Kotak Bank is empanelled with new employer : Great ! Get your existing Kotak account linked in your HR system with new organisation so that you can receive monthly salary credit from your new emplyoer & you are all set to continue your existing Kotak account

Kotak Bank is not empanelled with new employer: Here what you need to note!

Your Kotak Bank corporate salary account will continue, however, if salary is not credited for 2 consecutive months and the Average monthly balance (AMB) is not maintained as per product variant, your account will attract non-maintenance charges.
To continue your Kotak bank account in the absense of salary credits & to avoid non-maintainance charges, we would recommend you to maintain AMB(Average monthly balance) as per the product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000 (whichever is lower)

Click here to know details of General Schedule of Features & Charges (GSFC) applicable

data.query: What is the rate of interest that I will earn on the balance in my Kotak Bank Salary Account?
data.solution: Interest rates are subject to change from time to time. For latest information on interest rates, please visit Kotak Mahindra website at www.kotak.com

data.query: How can I avoid charges for non-maintenance of AMB(Average monthly balance) for my salary account?
data.solution:
You Corporate Salary account is a " zero balance" account till the time salary is getting credited in the account
Click here to know details of General Schedule of Features & Charges (GSFC) applicable

Tips to avoid charges for non-maintenance of AMB(Average monthly balance) :

1. Ensure regular Salary credits in your Corporate Salary account - In the absence of salary credits  for two or more months ,maintain AMB (Average monthly balance) as per the product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000 (whichever is lower) to avoid non maintenance charges
In case you have changed your emlpoyer,check with your new employer on provision of linking your existing Kotak Corporate Salary Account for receiving your salary from new employer

2. Pay attention to notifications sent by the bank regarding your accounts - Bank sends regular notification on your registered mobile number/email id regarding non credit of salary, on maintenance of AMB prior to levy of these charges. Basis these initmations,you can fund your account suitably to meet the required AMB and there by avoid charges

3. Avoid maintaining multiple accounts : This way you don’t have to worry about tracking different accounts. Plus you can access your funds with much more ease, rather than blocking them through these AMB requirement of multiple accounts
4. Smart withdrawals : Instead of withdrawing excess funds from your account in advance, use your debit card or digital mode of payments for transactions as and when needed. Advance withdrawals impact opportunity to earn interest on your savings account balance & also AMB requirement
5. In case you are certain of no further salary credit in your corporate salary account & are not able to maintain AMB requirement as per product variant or AMB of Rs 10,000(whichever is lower),please reach out to any of our branches for conversion of your Corporate salary account to a different Savings account variant with lower AMB requirement as per bank's policy

data.query: How do I check net banking pin delivery status?
data.solution:
You can check the courier details and status of your net banking PIN package by clicking here.
It will be delivered at the registered mailing address within 7 working days of the account opening.

data.query: My internet banking pin was incorrectly returned with reason given as landmark needed.
data.solution:
You can view delivery status and update landmark by following below steps
Net-banking
1) Login to Net-Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will  see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Internet Banking PIN displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
 
Mobile Banking
1) Login to Mobile Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will be see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Internet Banking PIN displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
 
Please Note :: You will able to update landmark only in case of failed attempt of deliverable. 
This functionality is not applicable, in case of RTO (Return To Origin) which happens after 3 attempts to deliver
If deliverable status is RTO, Please call our cutomer care no 1860 266 2666 available between 10 am to 6 pm for redelivery of your Internet Banking PIN to nearest branch or registered address.

data.query: Delay in delivery of internet banking pin.
data.solution:
Your net banking PIN should reach to you within 7 working days from the date you placed the request for new PIN .
Click here to get net banking password /PIN online or else go ahead and apply for fresh one once again. 

If this time frame has elapsed and you are still waiting for it please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply) to check the status. 

Please Note: If Net Banking PIN was not delivered in second attempt also it will be returned to bank and same will be destroyed due to security reason, same PIN (package) will not be re-dispatched.

data.query: My internet banking pin was delivered to the wrong address.
data.solution:
We deliver Net banking PIN packages only on the registered correspondence address as per our records. The delivery is made only to family members at residences, and authorised personnel at office locations. 
In case your net banking PIN was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, nothing to worry because for our net banking login with password we need CRN and dynamic access code which is available only with you. 

Then too as a precaution, you can block your net banking or apply for new one or regenerate it online so automatically old Net banking PIN will be invalid. 

Click here.

data.query: My internet banking pin envelop was delivered in a open condition.
data.solution:
I am so sorry that this happened! We will definitely check this with our delivery partner and take necessary action. 
If you found your net banking PIN delivery package (envelope) with open/torn or damage (not useable) condition so for the time being, if possible, could you please return the package at your nearest branch or destroy it and apply for a new one or generate online.

Click here, automatically old one will be invalid.

data.query: Can I collect my internet banking pin at the nearest branch?
data.solution:
We deliver your net banking PIN on your registered correspondence address only. 
However, to place a request for delivery to your nearest branch, you can call our 24X7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply), but do note that the request will be taken based on approval.

Click here.

data.query: My internet banking pin package was returned.
data.solution:
In that case, here is what you can do: 
1. If your latest address is not updated in the bank's records or if your current registered address is incomplete or incorrect, please visit your nearest branch with relevant documents and update your address. 

2. You can generate net banking PIN online Click here or place a fresh request for the same after step 1, (if change in address). 

Please Note: If Net Banking PIN was not delivered in second attempt also it will be returned to bank and same will be destroyed due to security reason, same PIN (package) will not be re-dispatched.

data.query: Place request for internet banking pin redispatch.

Sorry we do not take a Net Banking PIN re-dispatch request as its returned in first two attempts made by our delivery partner (courier company).Once its returned to bank we destroy that due to security reason. 
Click here or else go ahead and apply for fresh one once again.

data.query: What is Silk Account Program?
data.solution:
Silk programme is an exclusive account that provides women with the best of offers in finance, dining, health and lifestyle, empowering them to do more.
Features -

Earn up to 1500* Kotak Reward points through your debit card spends
35% discount on first year rental for lockers
Lifestyle offers in categories like health care, beauty, travel, dining, shopping etc.
Option to avail Maintenance Free Junior Account for your Kids through linked RD or SIP

Click here for more information on Silk.

data.query: What is Junior Account?
data.solution:
Junior Account is specifically designed to teach children the benefits of saving, while also providing a host of privileges across dining, entertainment and shopping on kids’ brand
Features

NMC waived Junior account (Nova Variant) with linked SIP or RD of value of Rs. 2000/- (Rs. 1000 or above for Semi-Urban & Rural Branches) for a minimum tenure of 36 months
Personalized Debit card
Various offers under Junior FOODIE, Junior LEARNER, Junior ANGEL, Junior SHOPPER. 

Click here for more information on Junior account.

data.query: What is Grand Account?

Grand programme offers new-age senior citizens a plethora of benefits that are guaranteed to make their lives comfortable. You can even enjoy these privileges as early as when you turn 55.
Features

Earn up to 1500* Kotak Reward points through your debit card spends
SMS for a call back (SMS KGRAND to 5676788 )
Priority Service and first Aid Card
Debit card with Purchase protection of upto 1 lakh for Platinum card
Home Banking for cash pickup and delivery service
Lifestyle offers in categories like health care, beauty, travel, dining, shopping etc

Click here for more information.

data.query: What is MyFamily Account?

My Family Savings Account brings the entire family’s banking needs under one account, allowing everyone to avail exclusive family-centric benefits and features, and make the most of their banking experience together.
Click here for more information.

data.query: What is Alpha Account?

The Alpha - Savings & Investment Programme is specially designed to make regular saving fun and easy. With this unique savings programme you can invest in Recurring Deposits, NPS, Fixed Deposits, Mutual Fund and much more all in one place.
Features

Non- Maintenance  charge waived account subject to investments.
Earn up to 1500* Kotak Reward points through your debit card spends
15% locker rental discount with Ace variant of alpha  for first year

Click here for more information.

data.query: My UPI / IMPS / Payment Gateway Transaction is declined but still the amount is debited or not received by beneficiary / merchant
data.solution:
Sorry to hear that.

For UPI or IMPS Transaction, request you to please wait for 2 working days (including transaction date) as beneficiary bank may take time to settle the amount. In case amount is not reversed in your account or not received by beneficiary post 2 working day (including transaction date), then please contact us along with beneficiary bank statement to raise dispute

For transaction done through net banking on merchant website / mobile banking / bill pay, request you to please wait for 3 working days (including transaction date) and in case amount is not refunded in 3 working days (including transaction date) then please contact merchant. If still merchant confirms that amount is not received at their end, then please contact us with merchant confirmation to raise dispute
To contact us, Please click here

data.query: Credit not received for cancelled or returned goods / services
data.solution:
Please check with Merchant if the refund has been initiated at their end, if merchant has refunded and still credit is not received then please contact us with below details-

RRN Number (Refund reference number)
Mode of refund
Refund amount
Date of refund
Merchant refund confirmation mail (If required)

 
To contact us, Please click here

data.query: I have received defective or not as described goods / service
data.solution:
Request you to contact the respective merchant for your dispute and in case merchant failed to assist then please contact us with the below information to raise dispute from Bank’s end.

Order description
Details of what was defective in the order OR what was not as described as per Order description
Delivery date

 
To contact us, Please click here

data.query: Amount debit but transaction failed hence paid the amount again by alternate mode
data.solution:
Don’t worry! If the amount is debited but the transaction was not processed, the same will be refunded within 48 hours.
If the refund is not processed, then please contact us with the below information to raise dispute.


If cash payment done, then please provide cash payment proof
If any other mode like credit card / debit card mode then please provide the respective statement reflecting the debit transaction

 
To contact us, please click here

data.query: My amount is debited however I have not received the services / goods from merchant
data.solution:
Don’t worry! If the amount is debited but the transaction was not processed, the same will be refunded within 48 hours.
If the refund is not processed, then please contact us with the below information to raise dispute.

Description of Service/Merchandise.
Expected date of delivery for Services/Merchandise
Please attach response / communication received from merchant


 
To contact us, please click here

data.query: Duplicate / Multiple transaction
data.solution:
Please check with the merchant / beneficiary for the receipt of the funds and refund for duplicate transaction. You may contact us to raise dispute in absence of their response.
 
To contact us, please click here

data.query: Wrong Amount Charged to Customer account
data.solution:
Please contact us with bill copy / invoice copy with correct transaction amount to raise dispute
 
To contact us, please click here

data.query: Amount deducted but not received at beneficiary end
data.solution:
No need to worry! Your money is safe. Request you to do the following checks:

1. Verify your beneficiary account details like Bank Name, Account number IFSC code etc.
2. Check if the same transaction amount has been reversed into your account in the last 24 to 48 Hours.
3. Please make a note of the below time for the transaction to reflect for each type of Fund transfer:

Kotak to Kotak/IMPS/UPI — Instant,
RTGS — 4 hours or by the End of the Day,
NEFT — Within one working day from the transaction date

4. Below are the service availability timings for various fund transfers:
IMPS / UPI - Anytime (24x7)
NEFT – 12:30 AM to 11:30 PM (Available on all days)
RTGS - Till 4pm (Mon to Sat - except second & fourth Saturday & bank holidays)
Any transaction done after cut off time will be sent for clearing on next working day.

data.query: Payment made but not received by the merchant
data.solution:
Sorry you faced this issue. I request you to bear in mind that if for any reason, the payment has not reached the merchant, it will be reversed into your account within 18 days if payment is done by debit card else within 10days if payment is done by credit card from the date of transaction.

Do check with the merchant once again after 48 hours (two working days).
If the money has not come back into your account within 18 working days OR not received by the merchant, simply get in touch with us on our 24x7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 and we'll sort it out. Standard call charges applicable.

data.query: How much amount can I transfer without adding a beneficiary?
data.solution: You can transfer a maximum of Rs. 50,000 per transaction per day without having to add a beneficiary using ‘One time transfer’ feature. However, if you activate mobile banking on a new device, ‘One time transfer’ limit will be reduced to Rs. 5,000/- per day for first 7 days on the newly registered device. These limits are applicable across all transfer types such as NEFT, IMPS, UPI, Scan & Pay.

data.query: What is the maximum amount I can transfer in a day?
data.solution:
Transferring funds has now become easier than ever before. The transaction limits on Mobile Banking & Net Banking are as follow: 
1) Payment Gateway transaction limit is up to 10 lakh per day / per transaction. 
2) Own account fund transfer — No limit (up to the available balance in debit account). 
3) IMPS to registered beneficiary - up to Rs 5 Lakh per day/per transaction. 
4) NEFT to registered beneficiary per day - up to Rs.10 lakh./per transaction - up to Rs 5 lakh. (Newly added beneficiary — less than 24 hours old — the limit is Rs 25,000). 
Below are the limits & timings for NEFT transactions:

12:31 AM to 09:30 PM - Continue to enjoy your existing limits
09:30 PM to 11:30 PM - You can transfer up to Rs. 10 Lakh
11:31 PM to 12:30 AM - No transactions can be initiated

   
For more details on NEFT please click here
5) RTGS to registered beneficiary per day- up to Rs.10 lakh./per transaction - up to Rs.5 lakh. Fund transfer to RTGS beneficiary can be done after 24 hours from beneficiary activation time.
6) You can transfer a maximum on Rs. 1,00,000 in a day on Mobile Banking & Rs. 50,000 on Net Banking without adding beneficiary. Please note, if you have installed Kotak Mobile App on a new device OR reinstalled on existing device OR you have added a secondary CRN on your existing Kotak Mobile App, your one time transfer limit will be Rs. 5,000 for seven days.
7) For fund transfer of more than Rs.10 lakh in a day, we advise you to visit a nearby Kotak branch with a Photo ID, cheque book and beneficiary account details.
For more details on payment transfer, click here.

data.query: UPI: Within 1 working day: Payment done to correct beneficiary?
data.solution:
Don’t worry! Your funds are safe
Typically within 1 working day money either shows up in your beneficiary’s account or comes back in yours! 

You may check with your beneficiary if they got the money, else check your account to see if it came back during this period.

Example: UPI transfer done on Saturday (non working day) 10:00 am, please allow time till Monday 6:00pm.

data.query: UPI: Within 1 working day: Registered Beneficiary
data.solution: As  a wrong beneficiary has been selected from your already added beneficiary list, please contact the beneficiary who has received the credit for the refund of this amount.

data.query: UPI: Within 1 working day: Non-registered beneficiary
data.solution:
UPI is an instant transfer, hence we request you to check beneficiary details before transacting. A successful transaction cannot be reversed, unless the beneficiary refunds at his own end.
We will try our best to help you by raising a chargeback with beneficiary bank. Basis the availability of debit consent & balance in beneficiary account, beneficiary bank may recover the amount by accepting the chargeback, or can reject it. There is no guarantee that your amount will be reversed.

You may raise a request by clicking “I need more help”

Intended Beneficiary Account Name
Intended Beneficiary Account Number
Intended Beneficiary Bank Name
Intended Beneficiary VPA ID

data.query: UPI: More than 1 working day: Payment done to correct beneficiary?
data.solution:
Eg. UPI transfer done on Saturday (non-working day) 10:00 am, please allow time till Monday 6:00 pm for transaction credit to beneficiary's account or reversal to your account.
Beyond 1 working day,it might be an instance of a failure that money hasn’t  shown up in your beneficiary’s account nor come back to yours!
Don’t worry! You may raise a request by clicking “I need more help” We will help track the status of your money
Please provide following details while raising query:

Date of Transaction
Transaction Amount
Transaction Reference Number
Beneficiary UPI details

data.query: What if the transaction is unsuccessful and money has been deducted?
data.solution:
This could happen due to low network connectivity or no response from the receiver's bank. If the Transaction is unsuccessful and the amount is debited, you will receive a refund within 5 working days.
If you have not received a successful response and the Transaction is shown as pending, please wait 24 hours; post that, the status will be updated. After 24 hours, if the updated status is shown as transaction failure and your amount was debited, you will receive the refund within 5 working days.

data.query: How can i raise a dispute for a upi transaction from transaction history?
data.solution:
You can raise the dispute for certain types of transaction status:

If the Transaction is Pending, or;
If a transaction with the merchant is successful and you are yet to receive the goods/services from the merchant.

You can go to transaction history, select the Transaction, and raise the dispute.
You can also connect to Kotak customer care to raise any disputes.

data.query: Where can i see the status of the dispute raised from transaction history?
data.solution: If you have raised the dispute from UPI transaction history, you can see the latest status by going to transaction history> and clicking on the Transaction.

data.query: What should i do if the transaction is successful, but the amount is not credited to the receiver's account?
data.solution: If the Transaction is successful, check if the entered UPI ID/ number/ Account number & IFSC are correct. Please connect to Kotak Customer Care in case of further assistance. If the receiver is a merchant, you can contact the merchant's customer care by mentioning the UPI Reference number.

data.query: NEFT: Within 1 working day: Payment done to correct beneficiary?
data.solution:
Don’t worry! Your funds are safe
NEFT transactions service is available between 12:30 AM to 11:30 PM  on all days .

Any transaction done after service availability time will be sent for clearing on next working day. 

Eg. Fund transfer done on Saturday (non working day) 10:00 am, please allow time till Monday 6:00pm.

Typically within 2 hrs – maximum by the end of a working day, money either shows up in your beneficiary’s account or comes back in yours! 

You may check with your beneficiary if they got the money, else check your account to see if it came back during this period.

data.query: NEFT: Within 1 working day: Registered Beneficiary
data.solution: As  a wrong beneficiary has been selected from your already added beneficiary list, please contact the beneficiary who has received the credit for the refund of this amount.

data.query: NEFT: Within 1 working day: Non-registered beneficiary
data.solution:
The credit to the beneficiary account is released solely based on the account number mentioned by remitter at the time of initiating the transaction.  It is the responsibility of the remitting customer to provide the correct account number of the beneficiary, in the NEFT remittance instruction/application
We will try our best to see what we can do however recovery is solely dependent on response from beneficiary bank.  We will do the necessary follow up with the Beneficiary Bank . The beneficiary bank will contact their customer and only after getting the debit consent they will return the funds ( subject to the availability of funds( assuming that funds to that extent have not been withdrawn by  that customer)

You may contact any of our nearest branch or customer care with below details to help us raise issue to beneficiary bank .

Date of Transaction
Transaction Amount
16 digit  UTR Number 
Beneficiary Bank Name
Intended beneficiary name
Intended beneficiary account number
