data.query: How to access 'Pay your Contact' feature?
data.solution:
You can access this feature under Quick Access section of Kotak Mobile Banking App or through Kotak Mobile Banking App -> Payments Section (present in bottom menu) -> Send Money.
This feature is available only for Kotak Mobile Banking App users.

data.query: How can I view my transaction history?
data.solution: You can view your transactions by clicking on the "Account Activity" section of the app.

data.query: How fast is ‘Pay your Contact’ transaction?
data.solution: Transactions using Pay your Contact are instant and completed within seconds.

data.query: What is a UPI ID?
data.solution: UPI ID is a unique identifier assigned to your bank account by any of the UPI apps. For Kotak Bank, the UPI ID format is username@Kotak & you can create the same using Kotak Mobile Banking App

data.query: What are the transaction limits in Pay your Contact?
data.solution: You can transact up to 10 times and with a total value of up to Rs. 1,00,000 per day.

data.query: What are the working hours for Pay your Contact transactions?
data.solution: ‘Pay your Contact’ transactions can be made 24x7 which means it can be done on bank holidays and are not dependent on banking hours.

data.query: How to use this feature?
data.solution:
Please find the below steps to use this feature:
 
1. Log into Mobile Banking App
2. Tap on ‘Pay your Contact’ under the Quick Access section on the home screen
3. Enter MPIN
4. Enter/ select mobile number of Beneficiary
5. Select Kotak bank/ UPI Apps icon (apps are shown using an algorithm)
6. User can also enter the full UPI ID on the screen
7. Enter Amount and Remark
8. Review your Payment details, submit & enter MPIN
9. Success Confirmation Page can be shared over WhatsApp

data.query: Can I send money to anyone using Pay Your Contact feature?
data.solution:
You can send money to:

A beneficiary who already has a UPI ID
A beneficiary who has Kotak Bank Account* 

*T&C Apply. The mobile number entered should be mapped with only one Kotak Bank account number.

data.query: What are the advantages of using Pay your Contact?
data.solution:
Following are the advantages for this feature:

Transfer money securely using mobile number instead of bank account number or UPI ID
Instant & convenient way of money transfer

data.query: Bill amount is deducted but not received by merchant or my transaction failed
data.solution:
Please note:
By any reason if the transaction failed and it was deducted from your account or credit card, we request you to wait for 3 working days for the biller/merchant to claim the amount. If merchant claims the amount within 3 days, your bill payment is considered successful.
If merchant does not claim the amount in 3 working days from the date of transacion, it will be reversed into your account within 5 working days from the date of transaction.
All your bill payments done by using bill pay option may take up to 3 working days to update at biller end. Please make your bill payments atleast 3 days before the due date to avoid charges from the biller.

data.query: My autopay request was not executed on time
data.solution:
Please Note:
1. It takes upto 6 weeks depending on the biller to activate autopay for that particular biller once you place an autopay request for the 1st time or modify an existing autopay request. If due date of your upcoming bill is within 6 weeks, please make the bill payment manually for the the current cycle. From next billing cycle onwards, autopay will be executed automatically.
2. All your autopay bills will be paid 4 days prior to due date mentioned by your biller. Please make sure you have sufficient balance in your account or available limit on your credit card 4 days prior to the due date.
3. If your autopay is active and still was not executed on time, we request you to call our 24x7 helpline and raise a query.

data.query: I would like to cancel autopay of my bill for one month
data.solution:
You can cancel your AutoPay for a particular biller for particular month by following steps:
On Mobile Banking

Go to Payments -> BillPay/Recharge
Tap on Pay Due Bills
Select View Scheduled Payments
Tap on Delete against the scheduled bill you want to delete.

On Net Banking 

Go to More -> Bill Pay/Recharge
Select My Bills 
View/Delete Schedule Payments
Click on Delete against the scheduled bill you want to delete.

data.query: Recharge amount deducted but not received by operator
data.solution:
Please Note:
If your recharge transaction is failed by any reason you can expect a refund after 2 working days from date of transaction (if amount is not claimed by the operator).
If the amount is claimed by the operator within 2 working days, then your recharge is considered sucessful.

data.query: My recharge transaction failed, when will get a refund?
data.solution:
Please Note:

If your recharge transaction is failed by any reason you can expect a refund after 2 working days from date of transaction (if amount is not claimed by the operator).
If the amount is claimed by the operator within 2 working days, then your recharge is considered sucessful.

data.query: I selected wrong operator name while recharging my number
data.solution:
Please Note:

In such cases, if the transation has failed and your amount got deducted, you can expect the refund within 2 working day from the date of transaction (if not claimed by the operator)
However, if it was successful and claimed by the operator, we request you to contact the selected operator for refund request.

data.query: Amount got deducted twice for the same prepaid recharge transaction
data.solution:
Please Note:

You can expect a refund of your failure recharge transaction within 2 working days from date of transaction if its not claimed by operator.
If one or both are successful (if its claimed by operator) for refund we request you to contact your operator.
If recharge is not done successfully (not claimed by operator) and amount is not refunded to your account please call our 24x7 helpline.

data.query: How can I make a payment through UPI QR?
data.solution:
You may follow the steps mentioned below to pay through UPI QR:

Download the Kotak Mobile Banking app from Google Play Store /App Store
Setup your Kotak account in app
Go to Scan any QR feature present in Pay & Transfer section of Homepage
Scan UPI QR code available with the merchant
Select the Bank account of your choice to make payment

data.query: How do I know if my transaction is successful or not?
data.solution:
After authenticating the payment, the transaction status will be displayed. In case you are unable to see the status, you can access it by following these steps:

Go to Transaction history
Click on the Transaction card to access the Transaction Details page, where the failure reason and transaction flow is provided.

data.query: What happens if money from my account has been debited and merchant has not received the payment?
data.solution: In case the transaction status shows as “Failed”, the amount will be transferred back to your account immediately. In case the transaction status shows as “pending,” please check the status on the App after sometime. If you have not received the refund within 48 hours, you may contact our customer support.

data.query: My transaction is showing "Pending". The amount has been debited and not credited. Is there a problem?
data.solution:
Your payment is initiated, but due to some issue at the beneficiary bank, there is a delay in confirmation. The amount will reach the beneficiary or will be reversed in your account within 48 hours, once the banks complete their daily settlements
When the Transaction is in Pending state, you can raise a complaint, using “Raise a Complaint” feature provided on the Transaction details page or you can raise a complaint via Raise Complaint feature located in Payments Homepage.
In case the transaction status shows as “Failed,” the amount will be transferred back to your account immediately. If you have not received the refund within 1 day (in case of P2P(person to person) transaction) or 5 days [(in case of P2M) (person to merchant) transaction], you may contact our customer support.

data.query: I have paid for my transaction but not received any confirmation. Why is that?
data.solution: Once you complete a transaction, you can check the transaction status on the App and you will receive an SMS from the bank. At times, due to operator issues, there may be a delay in receiving the SMS

data.query: When can I use the Raise a complaint feature against UPI Transaction?
data.solution:
When the Transaction is in Pending state (P2P/P2M), you can raise a complaint, using “Raise a Complaint” feature provided on the Transaction details page (or you can raise a complaint via “Raise Complaint” feature located in Payments Homepage.
Also, if a P2M transaction is successful and you have not received the goods/services from the merchant, you can raise a complaint in a similar manner.
You can raise a complaint, using “Raise a Complaint” feature provided in the Transaction details page, which can be accessed from Transaction History.
In case the transaction status shows as “Failed,” the amount would be transferred back to your account immediately. If you have not received the refund within 1 day [in case of P2P (person to person) transaction)] or 5 days [in case of P2M (person to merchant) transaction], you may contact our customer support.

data.query: Do I need to enter ATM PIN, UPI PIN to carry out a Scan and Pay Transaction?
data.solution: MPIN is required to perform any transaction from Kotak Mobile Banking App. MPIN is set while installing the Kotak Mobile Banking App. This will be different from your ATM PIN or UPI PIN set on other UPI Apps.

data.query: What are the transaction limits?
data.solution: You can transfer maximum Rs 1 lakh per day using UPI and you can carry out a maximum of 10 transactions per day. In case, you send money by uploading QR code from gallery, the maximum transaction limit would be Rs. 2,000/- per transaction.

data.query: Why am I not able to send large amount of money immediately after registration?
data.solution: As a security measure against frauds, transactions are limited up to Rs. 5,000/- within first 24 hours after registration.

data.query: What are the types of UPI QR codes?
data.solution: There are majorly 2 types of QR codes: Static QR, where you need to fill the amount in the payment page after scanning the QR code, and Dynamic QR, where the amount you need to pay is automatically displayed after scanning the QR code.

data.query: How Bharat QR is different from UPI based QR?
data.solution: Bharat QR is only used for P2M (person to merchant) transactions done via credit card or debit card payments, whereas using UPI based QR, P2P (person to person)/P2M transactions are done via Virtual Payment Addresses (VPA)

data.query: Are there any additional charges for using Bharat QR?
data.solution: There are no additional charges for making transactions through Bharat QR.

data.query: How can I make a payment through Bharat QR?
data.solution:
You may follow the steps mentioned below to pay through Bharat QR:

Download the Kotak Mobile Banking app from Google Play Store /App Store
Setup your Kotak account in app
Go to Scan any QR feature present in Pay & Transfer section of Homepage
Scan Bharat QR code available in the merchant store
Select the Debit card/ Credit card/ UPI ID of your choice and authenticate the transaction

data.query: Why am I unable to scan a QR code?
data.solution:
This might be due to any of the following reasons:

You're scanning the QR code by holding your phone too close or too far from the QR code. Try to position the QR code within the square frame shown on your phone while scanning the QR
The light is not bright enough for your phone to scan the QR code. You can use the phone torch feature, which can be accessed from the top left corner of your screen, besides the Self QR button
The QR code is damaged or invalid
You don't have good internet connectivity. Please check your connectivity and try again.
Your phone camera is being used by another app. Please close other apps which are potentially using your camera, and try again.

You can follow the above suggested remedies for resolving the issues. In case you face issues in scanning the QR code even after trying the above remedies, close your app and relaunch it before trying to make the payment again. This should help resolve the issue.

data.query: Can I make bill payments through Scan & Pay?
data.solution: Yes, you can make bill payments through Scan & Pay provided the merchant accepts Scan & Pay transactions. Spot the QR code available in your bill to complete the Scan & Pay transaction.

data.query: Where can I check my bank account balance?
data.solution: You can view the balance of your accounts linked with the Kotak app using the Check Balance feature on the app's homepage.

data.query: What is UPI ID/ VPA?
data.solution: UPI ID/ VPA (Virtual Payment Address) acts as an identifier that allows you to send money from your bank account or receive it. For example, UPI ID would be in the form of Myname@Kotak.

data.query: Can I edit my UPI ID?
data.solution:
Yes, you can edit UPI ID under the BHIM UPI/Manage Bank Account section. You can select a bank account, click on the 'edit' icon in the UPI details section, and edit UPI ID based on availability.
Please note that only your mobile number would be allowed for a 10-digit numeric UPI ID. For example, if your mobile number is 1234567890, you cannot have a UPI ID as 0987654321@kotak as it is not your mobile number.

data.query: What is a UPI Number?
data.solution: UPI Number is an identifier for your bank account/ UPI ID and can be used to receive funds from anyone, regardless of any UPI app they use. UPI Number can be your 10-digit mobile number or any 8–9 digit number.

data.query: Can I create UPI Number in the Kotak Mobile Banking App?
data.solution:
Yes, you can create a maximum of 3 UPI numbers. You can go to the Manage Bank Account section and select the account you need to create a UPI number. Click on 'Create Now' to use your mobile number or any 8-9 digit number as a UPI number. Once the number is available and selected, click on 'Continue' to set it as a UPI number.
After creating the UPI number, you can use it to receive funds into your bank account without remembering your UPI ID.

data.query: How can I request money from others?
data.solution: In the Kotak Mobile Banking App, you can initiate a request using the "Request Money" feature by asking for money from anyone with a UPI ID. You need to enter the amount and UPI ID of the sender. The sender can approve this collect Request through their UPI app.

data.query: How can I check the pending request/ collect Request sent by others?
data.solution: Others can send you a payment request which would be displayed on the app homepage and can be approved or rejected. Once approved, you need to authenticate the Transaction, and the money will be transferred from your account to the person who sent the Request.

data.query: Can I block unknown Collect Requests sent by others?
data.solution: Yes, you can block the unknown Collect Request by clicking on the 'Block & Reject' option shown on the popup after rejecting the Request.

data.query: What is the time frame to approve the Collect Request sent by others?
data.solution: The time frame would be as per the UPI app of the receiver. For merchants, it would be 5 minutes in general, but it can also be different.

data.query: How can I block a fraud UPI ID?
data.solution: If you receive any fraudulent Collect Request, you can reject it, and then you will get an option to block the UPI ID.

data.query: Where can I see blocked UPI IDs?
data.solution: You can see the blocked UPI ID under the BHIM UPI tile

data.query: Can I unblock a previously blocked UPI ID?
data.solution: Yes, you can unblock the UPI ID by going to the 'Blocked UPI IDs' option in the BHIM UPI.

data.query: How can I add a New Beneficiary?
data.solution: You can add a new beneficiary by going to the Add/Manage Beneficiary section and clicking on the 'Add' option. Then, enter the beneficiary details such as Bank name, account number, IFSC, etc. After validating using OTP, the Beneficiary would be activated.

data.query: How can I manage my added beneficiaries in the Kotak Mobile Banking App?
data.solution: You can manage the existing beneficiaries by going to the Add/ Manage Beneficiary option on the home screen. Select a beneficiary, and you will see options to delete or edit the Beneficiary. While editing, you can change the beneficiary details & transaction limits and also enable/disable various transaction modes.

data.query: What are transaction limits while sending money to the Beneficiary?
data.solution: For the first 24 hours after the Beneficiary is added or edited, the transaction limit would be Rs. 25,000. After that, you can send up to Rs. 10 lakhhks for NEFT/RTGS and Rs 5 lakhs for IMPS daily.

data.query: How can I apply for an IPO through the Kotak Mobile Banking App?
data.solution: You can add a new beneficiary by going to the Add/Manage Beneficiary section and clicking on the 'Add' option. Then, enter the beneficiary details such as Bank name, account number, IFSC, etc. After validating using OTP, the Beneficiary would be activated.

data.query: Is there any limit for using UPI Mandate?
data.solution: You can add a new beneficiary by going to the Add/Manage Beneficiary section and clicking on the 'Add' option. Then, enter the beneficiary details such as Bank name, account number, IFSC, etc. After validating using OTP, the Beneficiary would be activated.

data.query: What is the Schedule Transfer option?
data.solution: The schedule Transfer feature allows you to schedule a one-time payment for a future date without needing to authenticate during the payment. Please note that you can schedule payments only for bank transfers.

data.query: What are the limits for schedule Transfer?
data.solution: The schedule Transfer feature allows you to schedule a one-time payment for a future date without needing to authenticate during the payment. Please note that you can schedule payments only for bank transfers.

data.query: Are there any charges applicable on my credit card?
data.solution:
Depending on the type of credit card you hold with us, Annual Fees or Joining Fees or both will be applicable (if any). 
There are no additional charges applied on for the usage of credit card. However charges are applied in following cases,

Late payment charges along with applicable GST will be levied if payment is not received till the due date of your credit card bill
Interest will be charged on all unpaid transactions till the date the part payment is received by us and then on the balance amount till the next statement date.
Interest is also levied on all fees, charges and GST
In case of part payment received towards the previous outstanding, interest will be applicable even on the fresh transactions incurred on the card account.
Overlimit charges of INR 500.00 plus applicable GST will be levied if you have over utilisized the credit limit offered to you on your card.

Click here and select your card type to know all details on credit card charges.

data.query: Late payment fee and interest charges levied on my credit card bill
data.solution:
Late payment and interest charges (along with applicable GST) are levied if credit card payment is not received till the due date of your credit card bill.

In order to avoid such charges in future we request you to please make your credit card bill payment atleast 3 days before the actual due date of your credit card bill as all payments made online may take up to 3 working days to reflect in credit card account.

For more information on credit card fees click here.

data.query: My question is not listed here
data.solution:
We are sorry for the inconvenience! To assist you further, please connect with us by any of below mentioned ways

Use “search” option on this Help centre with different keywords.
Chat with Keya – Virtual assistant. Click here to initiate chat.
Write to us or Call us clicking “No, need more help” below .Please mention your query in detail. Our customer service officer would be glad to provide resolution.

data.query: Delay in delivery of credit card
data.solution: Your credit card should reach you within 7 working days from the date you placed the request for replacement. If this time frame has elapsed, please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply) to check the status and/or place a re-dispatch request.

data.query: How many days does it take to deliver Credit Card?
data.solution:
Your Credit Card should reach you within 7 working days from the date of replacement request placed or date of its approval.
Once the card is dispatched, you will receive an SMS from us with Courier Company name and AWB number for tracking purpose.

data.query: Place a request for credit card redispatch
data.solution:
If you find first two attempts has been already made by our delivery partner and then too your credit card is become undelivered so to place a re-dispatch request, please call our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply). 
However, please note the following: 

A re-dispatch request can be taken only if there is no change in address and you verify it. If you feel you need to change/update your address, please do this by visiting your nearest branch with relevant documents and place a re-dispatch request by calling us only once address change is done. 
Please Note: If you wish to change your correspondence address only for credit card records or / and if you hold only credit card (not bank account) with us, so you can place a address change request by calling our customer care number also.

data.query: Can I collect my credit card delivery from nearest branch
data.solution: We deliver your credit card on your registered correspondence address only. However, to place a request for delivery to your nearest branch, you can call our 24X7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply) and confirm the custodian name and branch address along with Pincode, but do note that the request will be taken based on approval.

data.query: Credit card delivered to wrong address
data.solution:
We deliver credit card packages only on the registered correspondence address as per our records. The delivery is made only to family members at residences, and at office locations only to the card holder. In case your credit card was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, as a precaution, you can block your credit card temporarily; you can activate the same credit card later once you receive it. 
To block now, please click here.

data.query: My credit card was returned
data.solution:
In that case, here is what you can do:
1. If your latest address is not updated in the credit card records or if your current registered address is incomplete or incorrect, please visit your nearest branch with relevant documents and update your address. 

2. Once your address is correctly updated in the bank's records, please place a request to re-dispatch your credit card by calling our 24X7 helpline number at 1860 266 2666 (standard call charges apply). 

Please Note: If you wish to change your correspondence address only for credit card records or / and if you hold only credit card (not bank account) with us, so you can place a address change request by calling our customer care number also.

data.query: What is the status of my Credit Card application?
data.solution:
You can check your Credit Card Application status by clicking here
Please keep your Application Reference Number or Form Number ready.
If you do not have any of these details mentioned above, request you to call our 24x7 helpline number 18602662666 (Local Call Charges Applicable).
Please note : It takes minimum 2 working days for processing the credit card application from the date of receipt of complete application in all respect.

data.query: My credit card delivery status is reflecting in transit from long time.
data.solution: One of the possibility is your credit card was not delivered in first or second attempt and you requested for re-dispatch so reason being its taking longer for you.

data.query: Credit card status is reflecting delivered but I have not received.
data.solution:
Ohh! We deliver credit card packages only on the registered correspondence address as per our records. I request you check with your family members once. 
In case your credit card was delivered to a wrong address and/or to a wrong/unknown person, as a precaution, you can block your credit card temporarily; you can activate the same credit card later if/once you receive it. 
To block now, please click here.

data.query: Credit card package was delivered in a open condition
data.solution: We are so sorry that this happened! If your credit card delivery package (envelope) was open or torn or damaged (not useable), could you please return the package at your nearest branch or destroy it and apply for a new one.

data.query: I have not received my Credit Card PIN.
data.solution:
Please do following checks:

On Net banking, under Profile section, please check if your correspondence address registered with us is same as your current address. 
Please track the package on the courier company website using AWB number sent your registered mobile number.
You can also regenerate your Credit Card PIN by following simple steps:
You can also generate your Credit Card PIN by clicking here

On Net Banking

Login to Net Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Service Request 
Instant PIN Generation

On Mobile Banking 


Login to Mobile Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Credit Card Service Requests 
Instantly Generate PIN
Or you can generate physical PIN by sending SMS CCPIN to 5676788 or 9971056767.
The same will be processed in 7 working days and sent to your registered mail address.

Please Note:

PIN can be generated for active cards only.
If the card is temporarily blocked, then you will need to unblock the card to initiate regeneration of PIN.
PIN cannot be regenerated for Credit Cards that are permanently blocked.

data.query: My credit card status is reflecting delivery attempted.
data.solution:
It looks our delivery partner (courier company executive) visited your location to deliver your cheque book but due to some reason (door locked, incomplete address etc.) it's not delivered.  
Net-banking
1) Login to Net-Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will  see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Credit Card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
Mobile Banking
1) Login to Mobile Banking
2) Click on Keya icon -> Click on Track Card/Chequebook/PIN & more
3) If applicable, you will be see a button called “Request for Redelivery” against Credit Card displayed on your screen.
4) On click, you will be re-directed to a new Kotak Bank page on a browser
5) You will see tracking details as well as the option to re-schedule delivery or add landmark
6) Once changes are done by you, same will be passed to respective courier company
 
Please Note :: You will able to update landmark only in case of failed attempt of deliverable. 
This functionality is not applicable, in case of RTO (Return To Origin) which happens after 3 attempts to deliver
If deliverable status is RTO, Please call our cutomer care no 1860 266 2666 available between 10 am to 6 pm for redelivery of your Credit Card it to nearest branch or registered address.

data.query: I made my Credit Card payment but it is not reflecting
data.solution:
Payment done via IMPS is Instant, NEFT would take up to 3 working days and Non- Kotak Cheque payment would take 5 working days to reflect in your credit card account. To view TAT for other methods of payment, please Click here
In case, payment is still not reflecting on your credit card account post the above stipulated time, kindly provide us with a clear scanned copy of the bank statement reflecting the debit entries of the payment made towards your credit card. Below details should be available in your statement:
Name of the customer
Bank Name
Account number
IFSC code
Debit entries of the amount

data.solution:
Sure. We can definitely take care of this!
In order to place a request for refund of excess payment towards your credit card, kindly share below documents with us.

1. Scanned copy of a cancelled cheque of the cardholder for the bank account from which the last payment was done. 

2.Scanned copy of the BANK STATEMENT of your last 2 payment done towards Kotak credit card. 

Please ensure below points are reflecting in the statement. Bank statement should be attested by the bank

Name of the customer

Bank Name
Account Number

Debit entries of the amount

Select “Inbox”

Post selecting necessary details in all field , you may attach required documents and click “Send”


Please Note:


Mention reference number if any in case you have already registered a request with any of our branches or phone banking
Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form

What next?

Post receipt of the required documents we will be able to process your request and status will be communicated on your registered email ID."

data.solution:

On Net Banking

data.query: Can I make my Credit Card payment by cheque or cash?
data.solution:
For Payment using cheque
You can drop a cheque payable to "Kotak Mahindra Bank Card A/C" followed by your 16-digit Credit Card Number, at any one of the drop boxes located in ATMs and branches.
To find a drop box near you, SMS ‘K DROPBOX <6-Digit PIN Code> to 5676788
For Payment using cash

You can visit any Kotak Mahindra Bank branch and deposit cash towards your Credit Card Account.
(For cash payment, Rs. 100 plus GST is charged)
To find a branch near you, SMS ‘K Branch <6-digit PIN Code> to 5676788 or 9971056767

data.query: Can I make my credit card payment online via NEFT?
data.solution:
Here how you can pay your Credit Card bills with NEFT:


Log on to your non-Kotak Bank net banking website
Select Funds Transfer/NEFT
Register for payment to Kotak Credit Cards
Enter following details

Here are the details you will need to enter:

Payee name -4166xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Customer Name
Select Destination Bank – Kotak Bank
Bank Address – Main Branch Mumbai
IFSC Code – KKBK0000958
Update Payee Account Number - 4166xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx (Provide your correct 16-digit Kotak Credit Card Number)

data.query: Can I pay other Bank's Credit card bill using Kotak Credit Card? (Balance Transfer facility)
data.solution:
Yes. We have a Balance Transfer facility which allows you to pay dues of other bank's Credit Card Bill using Kotak Bank's Credit Card.
Here are some important points to note for availaing Balance Transfer facility

Balance Transfer can be availed for minimum of Rs 2500 and maximum of upto 75% of your cedit limit on Kotak Credit Card
Processing fees of Rs 349 + GST per Rs 10,000 will be applied
Your request will be procecced subject to policy, credit and bureau checks
If the payment for Balance Transfer is made successfully within 90 days no interest will be charged
Balance transfer facility is not available if your Kotak Credit Card has been issued less than 6 months back. If you still apply for this facility, the request will be processed subject to credit and bureau checks. In this case the, it might take 2 to 3 extra working day to process the request

 
You can avail balance transfer faciluty by following ways,
On Net Banking 

Click on the ‘Credit Card’ Tab

Choose the ‘Balance Transfer’ option

On Mobile Banking

Click on Credit Card tab
Choose 'Balance Transfer'

Please input  your other bank credit card details carefully

You can also SMS <BT> to 5676788

We will be transferring the balance transfer amount to your other bank credit card via NEFT within 2-3 working days from the date of request.
Alternatively, you may receive the funds via a cheque within 4-5 working days.

data.query: I want my Credit Card payment to be made automatically every month (auto debit facility)
data.solution:
We have Auto Debit facility which will allow you to make automatic payment of your Kotak Credit Card from Kotak Account. You have following options to enable Auto Debit,
On Mobile Banking:

Go to Credit Card
Credit Card Service Requests
Select Auto Debit

On Net Banking:


Go to Credit Card 
Value Added Services
Select Auto Debit

Please note:


In case of Auto Debit, payment will be processed on the due of date of your Credit Card Bill. 
Please make sure you have sufficient balance in your account to avoid auto debit failure charges (Rs. 500 + GST).
It takes 4 working days to reflect the changes from the date of activation or modification of auto debit. so please take care of credit card bill payment for that particular month where you are activating /deactivating or modifying auto debit facility nearby to (4 working days) your credit card bill due date.

data.query: What charges are applied if I pay only minimum amount due of my Credit Card?
data.solution:
If you pay the minimum amount due (or make a part pyment of your bill) for the current bill, then in your next Credit Card bill you will not be charged late payment fee if you make your payment before the due date. 
However, Interest will be charged on all unpaid transactions till the date the part payment is received by us and then on the balance amount till the next statement date.
Interest is also levied on all fees, charges and GST.
In case of part payment received towards the previous outstanding, interest will be applicable even on the fresh transactions incurred on the card account.
Interest rate will vary depending on the type of credit you hold with us. Click here and select your card to check the interest rate applicable.

data.query: How can I block my Credit Card?
data.solution:
Choose from following options,
On Net banking:


Login to Net Banking
Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Report Lost Card

On Mobile Banking:


Login to Mobile Banking
Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Report Lost / Damaged card

You can also send an SMS from your registered mobile number

SMS KCCLOST(space)(Last four digit of Credit Card number) > 5676788 (Standard SMS charges applicable).
If you are unable to block your credit card through above steps, you can also visit the below link to contact us and immediately block your credit card: https://www.kotak.com/en/customer-service/contact-us/phone-banking.html

data.query: How can I apply for a replacement Credit Card?
data.solution:
You can also apply for a Credit Card replacement by choosing one of the following option, 
On Net banking


Login to Net Banking
Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Select Card Replacement Request

On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking
Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Report Lost / Damaged card -> Select check box for Replacement Required

Replacement fee of Rs 100 along with applicable GST will be charged.

data.query: How can I report a fraud on my Credit Card?
data.solution:
We request you to block your Credit Card immediately to avoid any further misuse. But first, do a quick check of the following 2 things:
Before you report a fraud, recheck the transaction details that you wish to report as a fraud.
Check if your friends or family members are using your Credit Card. If a card is blocked as lost then the card will be auto replaced and a replacement fee of Rs 100 along with applicable GST will be charged.
To block your card permanently, please click here.
If you are unable to block your credit card through above steps, you can also visit the below link to contact us and immediately block your credit card: https://www.kotak.com/en/customer-service/contact-us/phone-banking.html

data.query: How can I block my Credit Card temporarily?

On Net banking

Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Credit Card Control

On Mobile Banking

Credit Card Tab
Credit Card Service Requests
Card Control

Please Note: There is no limit on number of times you can switch Off and switch On your credit card.

Report Lost Card

On Mobile Banking:

data.query: Who should apply for a Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Credit card?
data.solution:
a. Someone who has a limited credit history or none, should apply for a secured credit card to build up their creditworthiness. 
b. The bank gives a secured card to a customer in exchange for a certain amount of money deposited as fixed deposit.

data.query: Which customers are eligible for applying for a Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Credit card?
data.solution:
To get a Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Credit card, a customer must be
a. Resident individuals only
b. Between 18 years and 75 years of age
c. Should have an eligible fixed deposit with Kotak Mahindra Bank. The same can also be opened while applying for the card.

data.query: What type of Card is 811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card?
data.solution: The Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Card is a VISA Platinum Card.

data.query: What are the requirements for Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Card application and approv
data.solution: The customer applying for Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card should have a Fixed Deposit with the bank.  If the customer doesn’t have FD, he/she can create one at the time of application for the card.

data.query: What are the Fixed deposit requirements?
data.solution:
a. Minimum FD amount: INR 10,000/-  (online); INR 10,000/- (offline)
b. Maximum FD amount – N.A. [however the maximum credit limit for secured credit card can be up to INR 16,00,000/- only]
c. Minimum tenure of FD – 181 days
d. Type of FD – Quarterly payout/ Monthly payout/ Cumulative FD
e. Maturity instruction
i. Renew principal and interest
ii. Renew principal and redeem interest

data.query: Which FDs are not accepted?
data.solution:
a. Non individual FDs (HUF, Proprietorship, Partnership, Pvt Ltd/ Ltd, etc)
b. FDs in the name of minors or third party
c. Section 80C FDs
d. Short term FDs (< 180 days), Lien marked FDs, Sweep FDs, Flexi FDs, Tax Saving FDs (Section 80C FD) and Recurring Term Deposits 
e. Pre- mature withdrawal FDs
f. Any FD with lien marked for any amount (fully or partially) will not be allowed
g. Any existing FDs with amount lesser than requested credit limit. Customer will have to bring the limit to 80% of the existing FD in order to view and select it in the journey.

data.query: What are the joining fee and annual fees for the card?
data.solution:
a. Joining Fee – Nil
b. Annual Fees – Nil

data.query: How to apply for Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card?
data.solution:
For Non-811 customers:
Login to Kotak Mobile Banking App > Go to Apply Now tab > Click on Credit Card
 
For 811 customers:
Step 1. Complete your FKYC after opening 811 account
Step 2. You can apply for the card after 48 hours of completing your FKYC
Step 3. Book an FD of Minimum Rs. 10,000
Step 4. Login to Kotak Mobile Banking App > Go to Apply Now tab > Click on Credit Card

data.query: What will be the credit limit of Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Card?
data.solution: The credit limit of the card will be up to 90% of the lien amount.

data.query: Can the credit limit be increased on this card?
data.solution:
Yes, the credit limit can be increased on this card and the credit limit can be given upto 90% of your fixed deposit amount. Below are the details which you have to follow

Please make sure the existing fixed deposit amount is sufficient for the credit limit required or else you may open new fixed deposit through Mobile Banking or Net Banking for higher amount as per your credit limit requirement
You have to download a form available on our website and to download Click Here, once link is open select the option ‘Cards’ and scroll down the webpage & download the required form
811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card - Credit limit change (using a different FD)- in case of new FD
811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card - Credit limit change (using existing underlying FD)-in case of existing FD


Kindly share the filled and Signed form with us by Clicking Here

data.query: Can multiple cards be issued under one FD?
data.solution: No, multiple cards against one FD cannot be issued.

data.query: Can one card be issued against multiple FDs?
data.solution: cash limit on the card refers to the percentage of your credit limit which you can take as a cash advance. Kotak Aqua gold card gives you a cash limit of 90% of your credit limit.

data.query: Is this card valid internationally?
data.solution:
Yes, this Card is valid internationally. Please note that all cards will have to be activated by the customer at a contact based point of usage within India, included for international usage.
Please note: 3.5% foreign markup fee along with applicable GST is charged when transactions are done under the International Merchant Category Code other than Indian Rupees.

data.query: Do I enjoy interest free period on Cash?
data.solution: Yes, only Kotak Aqua Gold Card offers you an interest free period on cash advances of up to 48 days.

data.query: Do I enjoy interest free period on Cash?
data.solution: Yes, only Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Card offers you an interest free period on cash advances of up to 48 days.

data.query: What is cash limit on the Card?
data.solution: Cash limit on the card refers to the percentage of your credit limit which you can take as a cash advance. Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent card gives you a cash limit of 90% of your credit limit.

data.query: Am I entitled for an Add-on Card?
data.solution: Yes, Add on cards are available on 811 #DreamDifferent Card. It is offered complimentary to the Kotak 811 #DreamDifferent Card customers.

data.query: Is there a rewards program on 811 #DreamDifferent Card?
data.solution:
Yes, there is a reward program on the 811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card.

2 reward points on every Rs. 100/- of online spends
1 reward point on every Rs. 100/- of other spends. These spends exclude Fuel and Railway transactions as this card also offers 1% fuel surcharge waiver and 1.8% railway surcharge waiver.

You may refer the below link for more details:
https://www.kotak.com/en/personal-banking/cards/credit-cards/811-dream-different-credit-card.html

data.query: What is the process of cancellation of 811 #DreamDifferent credit Card
data.solution:
The TAT for cancellation of Credit card & release of FD to the customers is 4 working days.
The customer can surrender/cancel the credit card by submitting a written application at branch or calling the Customer contact centre. 
The customer can either request for:

811 #DreamDifferent Credit Card cancellation, lien on FD to be removed & liquidation of FD
811 #DreamDifferent card cancellation, lien on FD to be removed & FD to be continued.

data.query: What should I do if my Credit Card is not working for an online transaction?
data.solution:
Please do the following checks,
1. Make sure you are using the correct and latest OTP or Verify by Visa Password for the transaction
2. Check if your card is blocked for Verify by VISA

To unblock your Credit Card for Verify by VISA, please send a simple SMS from your registered mobile number KOTAK UNBLOCK <LAST FOUR DIGITS OF CARD NUMBER> to 5676788 and your card Verify By Visa will be unblocked instantly.

2. Check your transaction amount and the available limit on your Credit Card. If your available limit is lesser than the transaction amount, the transaction may get declined. You can check if you are eligible for increasing your credit limit.
On Mobile Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Credit Card Service Requests
Select Card Limit Increase

On Net Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Value Added Services
Select Limit Enhancement

If you are not eligible for Limit enhancement online, you can call our 24x7 helpline and place and limit enhancement request and provide your income proof documents (subject to approval basis the income documents)

data.query: What should I do if my Credit Card is not working at PoS machine?
data.solution:
Please do the following checks,
1. Make sure you are using the correct PIN for your Credit Card. If you have forgoten your PIN, you can always regenrate your Credit Card PIN online 
On Mobile Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Credit Card Service Requests
Select Instantly Generate PIN

On Net Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Service Requests
Select Instant PIN Generation

2. Check for scratches or cracks on the magnetic strip or the chip. If your card is damaged, please place a Replacement request
On Net banking


Go to Credit Card -> Service Request

Select Card Replacement Request

On Mobile Banking

Go to Credit Card -> Service Request
Report Lost / Damaged card -> Select check box for Replacement Required

         Replacement fee of Rs 100 along with applicable GST will be charged.
3. Check your transaction amount and the available limit on your Credit Card. If your available limit is lesser than the transaction amount, the transaction may get declined. You can check online if you are eligible for increasing your credit limit.
On Mobile Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Credit Card Service Requests
Select Card Limit Increase

On Net Banking

Go to Credit Card
Select Value Added Services
Select Limit Enhancement

Please Note: If you are not eligible for Limit enhancement online, you can call our 24x7 helpline and place and limit enhancement request and provide your income proof documents (subject to approval basis the income documents) 
4. Check with the merchant if any specific error was seen on the machine so that you can take corrective steps accordingly.

data.query: How can I convert my total Credit Card outstanding to EMIs?
data.solution:
You can convert the total retail outstanding amount (excluding Gold purchases and Cash withdrawals) on your Credit Card bill to EMIs by following these steps:
On Net Banking:


Login to Net Banking 
Select Credit Card 
Select Transaction to EMI > Outstanding to EMI 

On Mobile Banking: 


Login to Mobile Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Convert to EMI
Card Outstanding to EMI > Apply Now

Please note: Goverment taxes (including service tax, GST, any / all; applicable taxes) would be charged on interest, fees and other charges levied on your credit card at the rate determined by Goverment of India from time to time.

Click here for more details on the charges applicable,

data.query: How can I convert Credit Card transaction into EMIs?
data.solution:
You can convert your any of your credit transaction (Value more than INR 2500) except gold purchases and Cash withdrawals to EMI  by following these steps:

Login to Net Banking 
Select Credit Card 
Select Transaction to EMI 

On Mobile Banking


Login to Mobile Banking 
Select Credit Card 
Select Convert to EMI

Please note: Goverment taxes (including service tax, GST, any / all; applicable taxes) would be charged on interest, fees and other charges levied on your credit card at the rate determined by Goverment of India from time to time.

Click here for more details on the charges applicable,

data.query: How can I redeem Credit Card reward points?
data.solution:
Credit Card Features and Product details Steps to redeem your reward points:
1. Go to https://kotakrewards.com/ 
2. Once click on login, it will ask you to enter CRN and OTP for authentication.
3. Based on your preference you may utilize your reward points into the following categories.
Reward Redemption Options:

Flight & Hotel Booking- Select Travel à Select One Way / Round trip (as per the need) à Enter destination (From & To)  Select Depart & Return date (as per trip one way / round) à Select passengers and search
Shopping: Select Shop à Select Product and proceed
Recharge- Select recharge à Enter recharge details and proceed
Voucher- Select Voucher and proceed
Cinema- Select Cinema à Enter details and proceed
Cash Redemption - Go to Prole à Select Cashback option and then select a card number from drop down & enter reward points to be redeemed and confirm.


Please note: You will be able to see your cash back in your Net Banking or Mobile Banking within 24hrs from the time the request is placed.
Still facing issues? Don't Worry. We can look into it,
Please take a screenshot/picture of error message and share it with us. This will help us investigate the issue & provide resolution.

Select “Inbox”
Select “Compose mail” 
Post selecting necessary details in all field , you may attach required documents and click “Send”


Please Note:

Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form
For sharing multiple documents, we recommend to use Net banking

 
What next?

data.query: How can I withdraw cash on my Credit Card?
data.solution:
You can withdraw cash/get an instant loan on your Credit Card in following ways:
1. You can withdraw cash from ATM by using your physical Credit Card and Credit Card PIN (similar to Debit Card withdrawal)

Cash advance fee for Fortune Credit Card is Rs. 199 + GST per Rs 10,000 or part thereof and for all other cards is Rs 300+GST per Rs 10,000 or part thereof



2. On Net Banking

Go to Credit Card > Value added service 
Cash as Ease 

         OR

Go to Credit Card > Value added service 
Cash Transfer to Kotak account 

3. On Mobile Banking 


Login to Mobile Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Loan on Credit Card

For all above cash withdrawal on Credit Card Cash advance fee, interest and GST will be applicable.
Click here and select your card type to check applicable charges on your credit card for cash withdrawal and loan on card.

data.query: Do you provide instant Cash / Loan on Credit Card?
data.solution:
You can withdraw cash/get an instant loan on your Credit Card in following ways:
1. You can withdraw cash from ATM by using your physical Credit Card and Credit Card PIN (similar to Debit Card withdrawal)

Cash advance fee for Fortune Credit Card is Rs. 199 per Rs 10,000 or part thereof and for all other cards is Rs 300 per Rs 10,000 or part thereof.

2. On Net Banking

Go to Credit Card > Value added service 
Cash as Ease (Demand Draft will be issued) 


You will receive your draft at your mailing address within 4 working days of submission of your request

         OR

Go to Credit Card > Value added service 
Cash Transfer to Kotak account 

3. On Mobile Banking 


Login to Mobile Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Loan on Credit Card

For all above cash withdrawal options from Credit Card, charges and interest will be applicable.
Click here and select your card type to check applicable charges on your credit card for cash withdrawal and loan on card.

data.query: Yes, my card limit was revised in last 6 months
data.solution:
As a Bank, we periodically review your card account to evaluate eligibility for credit limit revision.
Several things determine this Credit Card limit; it can vary from card to card and even from individual to individual. This depends on various factors like your income, credit history, credit score and income, payment track maintained etc.

As the limit on your card has been revised within last 6 months, we recommend you to initiate request for credit limit increase 6 months after the last revision date.

data.query: No, I do not have a salary account with Kotak Mahindra Bank/ I am self employed
data.solution:
You may place a request for credit limit increase on your credit card by sharing with us ANY ONE of the below mentioned documents
Post receipt of the documents we will be able to process your request for credit limit enhancement, subject to internal credit and bureau checks.

Document required : Any ONE of below mentioned documents

1) Last 3 month’s salary slip along with the bank name and bank account number in which your salary is being credited.
2) Last 2 years IT Returns (if self-employed).
3) Other Bank Credit Card Statement which has a higher Limit than this card along with the front copy of other bank credit card.
4) Last 6 months bank statement (if salaried) reflecting entries for salary credit.

data.query: I am holding PVR gold credit card and I am unable to claim PVR M coupon code
data.solution:
As per the feature of PVR Gold credit card, the minimum eligibility criteria for PVR tickets is as follow:

You get 1 free PVR movie ticket every month on spends of INR. 10,000 and above in a monthly billing cycle or

You get 2 free PVR movie tickets every month on spends of INR. 15,000 and above in a monthly billing cycle. 


You may claim the PVR coupons post logging to net banking and follow the below mentioned steps:

Visit www.kotak.com
Click on net banking
Enter you user name and password
Click on credit card tab
Select PVR       

 
Alternatively, you may also SMS PVRKCC Jun (first three letters of bill month for which you want to claim the coupon codes) to 5676788 form your registered mobile number.
Still facing issues? Don't Worry. We can look into it,

data.query: I am holding PVR Platinum credit card and I am unable to claim PVR M coupon code
data.solution:
As per the feature of PVR platinum credit card, you get 2 free PVR movie ticket every month on spends of INR. 10,000.00/- and above in a monthly billing cycle. 
PVR coupon codes are generated once the statement is generated.

You may claim the PVR coupons post logging to net banking and follow the below mentioned steps:

Visit www.kotak.com
Click on net banking
Enter you user name and password
Click on credit card tab
Select PVR       


Alternatively, you may also SMS PVRKCC Jun (first three letters of bill month for which you want to claim the coupon codes) to 5676788 form your registered mobile number.
Still facing issues? Don't Worry. We can look into it,
Please take a screenshot of error message and share it with us. This will help us investigate the issue & provide resolution.
Ways to submit documents :
Option 1 : Click ""No,Need more help"" below to submit request along with required documents . Currently only 1 attachment is permitted .In case you want to share multiple documents/images,please ensure it is part of one file & upload in one go
Option 2 : Using Net banking 

Post Log in, click on the “Help” tab available at the top right corner of the page
Select “Inbox”
Select “Compose mail” 
Post selecting necessary details in all field , you may attach required documents and click “Send”


Please Note:

Mention reference number if any in case you have already registered a request with any of our branches or phone banking
Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form
For sharing multiple documents, we recommend to use Net banking


What next?

Once we have registered your concern, we will share reference number on your registered email id. 
Post receipt of the required documents we will be able to process your request and status will be communicated on your registered email ID.

data.query: I am unable to redeem my credit card reward points
data.solution:
Steps to redeem your reward points:

Login to net banking and Click on Cards Tab > Click on Credit card Tab.
Click on PVR Claim & Reward Redemption option.
Select the card number from the drop down menu.
Post selecting the card number total reward points would be reflecting in ""Total reward points"".
Check for the preferred email id reflecting in EMAIL option.
Select the Category against which you want to redeem the points from the drop down.
Select the Sub category from the drop down.
Post selecting the sub category click on ADD TO CART.
Once confirming the details the Coupons would be send to the registered email id.

data.query: My PVR M coupon code are not working
data.solution:

The PVR ticket E voucher codes can only be used online at www.pvrcinemas.com to book a free PVR ticket which is subject to availability.
Select the City, Movie, Cinema, Show Timings & Seats to book the tickets. ( except Director’s Cut ,PVR IMAX, PVR Opulent & PVR Mahagun  ) , movie, show , booking class ( except Gold & EUROPA) and seats

On the payment page click on MCOUPON tab below the Credit/Debit Card payment options.
Enter the last 5 digits of your registered mobile number and last 4 digits of your Kotak PVR Credit Card.
Enter the Coupons Code & click on Make Payment tab.
The cost of the tickets will be reduced to zero.
Pay the balance booking/convenience fees and book your free ticket.

data.query: My PVR starpass code are not working
data.solution:
In order to redeem the PVR Starpass code that you have received, we request you to follow the below steps  :       

The PVR ticket E voucher codes can only be used online at www.pvrcinemas.com to book a free PVR ticket which is subject to availability.                           
Select the City, Movie, Cinema, Show Timings & Seats to book the tickets. (except Director’s Cut ,PVR IMAX, PVR Opulent & PVR Mahagun) , movie, show, booking class (except Gold &  EUROPA) and seats.

On the payment page, select ‘Offers’ tab & followed by Star Pass option.                         
Enter the Star Pass Code/s & click on ‘Make Payment’ tab                                   
Pay convenience fee using your Kotak Credit Card & complete the payment transaction to get booking ids.                                    

Note: Each voucher can be used to book a PVR ticket (only on www.pvrcinemas.com) upto Rs.400.

data.query: You can update your address through Net Banking. Please find below the path:
data.solution:
Login to Net Banking.
Click on ‘Profile’ option available below at the end of the left hand side corner
Click on ‘Update’ mention below communication address
And select anyone of the options as mentioned below
Update address using Aadhar Number & OTP (address will be instantly updated) OR
Update address by uploading Address Proof (address will be updated in 1 working day). Valid address proof are Passport, Aadhaar Number, Driving License and Voter ID. OR
Update address by logging into the DigiLocker. (Aadhaar Number details must be updated in the bank records to avail this facility).

 
In case, you do not have Net Banking access and want to change the address only in the Credit Card, then you can follow below process-
Click on this https://www.kotak.com/en/help-center/credit-card/my-profile/q1.html
 
Document required to update Residence address:
Self-attested (duly signed by you) scanned copy of ANY ONE of the below listed address proof in your name

Passport
Aadhar card
Driving License
Voter Id card
NREGA Job card
Letter issued by the National Population Register

Ways to submit documents: Click ""No,Need more help"" below to submit request along with required documents . Currently only 1 attachment is permitted .In case you want to share multiple documents/images,please ensure it is part of one file & upload in one go
Please Note:

Mention reference number if any in case you have already registered a request with any of our branches or phone banking
Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form
For sharing multiple documents, we recommend to use Net banking
Providing Aadhar Card is voluntary

 
What next?

Once we have registered request , we will share reference number on your registered email id.

Post receipt of the required documents we will be able to process your request and status will be communicated on your registered email ID

data.query: How does an Add On credit card work?
data.solution: An Add On card is a privilege offered to the spouse, parents or children of the primary Credit Card holder. All expenses incurred on an Add On card are billed to the primary cardholder.

data.query: What are the charges for an Add-on Credit Card?
data.solution:
Add-on Credit Card charges vary from one card type to another. 
Check applicable charges by clicking here and select your card type.
Please note:


The monthly spend limit of the Add On card cannot be more than the credit limit of the primary card. However, you can set the card limit for Add-on card same or lesser than your card limit  
You will receive your Add On Card at your mailing address within 15 working days of submission of your request.

Gold Cardholders can request for a maximum of 2 Add On Cards
Platinum Cardholders can request for a maximum of 3 Add On Cards.
Gold Kotak Platinum card fees Rs. 299 per card and NRI credit card fee Rs. 599 per card.
Urbane Gold Add on Card Fee: Nil
Platinum Add On Card Fees: Nil.
As per RBI guidelines, it is mandatory for the Add-on Card applicant to submit complete KYC documents.
The Add-on Card will be issued once the KYC documents are received and approved by the Bank.

data.query: I already have a Kotak Credit Card, want to apply for my wife/relative.
data.solution:
We suggest you to apply for an Add-On card. Your Add-On card user will get all the benefits of your Card.
Choose the method that works best for you: 
On Net Banking

Login to Net Banking 
Go to Credit Card > Service request 
Request for Add-on Card

Please note:

The monthly spend limit of the Add On card cannot be more than the credit limit of the primary card. However, you can set the card limit for Add-on card same or lesser than your card limit  
You will receive your Add On Card at your mailing address within 15 working days of submission of your request.
Gold Cardholders can request for a maximum of 2 Add On Cards
Platinum Cardholders can request for a maximum of 3 Add On Cards.
Gold Kotak Platinum card fees Rs. 299 per card and NRI credit card fee Rs. 599 per card.
Urbane Gold Add on Card Fee: Nil
Platinum Add On Card Fees: Nil.
As per RBI guidelines, it is mandatory for the Add-on Card applicant to submit complete KYC documents.
The Add-on Card will be issued once the KYC documents are received and approved by the Bank.

We request you to visit the below link and fill the attached form and scan the same along with KYC of Add-on Card holder and send it across to [email protected] 
https://www.kotak.com/content/dam/Kotak/Customer-Service/Download-Forms/Personal-Banking/Credit-Cards/addon-card-application-form.pdf
We request you to refer the format of add-on card documents to be sent.
Subject line: CRN Add-on Documents
Body Copy: Please find attached identity and address proof for add on application
Identity Proof attached: 
Address proof: < Please mentioned documents provided>
NOTE: Kindly send Self-attested KYC document of the Add-on card holder and all the pages has to be self-attested by the card holder.

data.query: I forgot my Credit Card PIN
data.solution:
Don't worry, you can reset / generate a new Credit Card PIN by following these easy steps:

You can also generate your Credit Card PIN by clicking here
On Net Banking

Login to Net Banking
Go to Credit Card > Service request
Instant PIN Generation

On Mobile Banking

Login to Mobile Banking
Go to Credit Card > Credit Card Service Requests
Instantly Generate PIN
Or you can generate physical PIN by sending SMS CCPIN to 5676788 or 9971056767.
The same will be processed in 7 working days and sent to your registered mail address.

Please Note:

PIN can be generated for active cards only.
If the card is temporarily blocked, then you will need to unblock the card to initiate regeneration of PIN.

PIN cannot be regenerated for Credit Cards that are permanently blocked.

data.query: I recently opened a Kotak 811 Account. Can I do the video KYC?
data.solution:
Video KYC is available only for new Kotak811 customers and Kotak811 Limited/Lite account holders.
Click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: What is video KYC?
data.solution:
Video KYC is a start-to-end journey that can be opted for to complete Full KYC for your Kotak811 account through online video verification. You will get a full-fledged Kotak811 account after your Video KYC is done.
Here are some advantages of choosing Video KYC and getting your Full KYC Account:
 
Get the full-fledged award-winning Kotak811 experience
Enjoy unlimited banking with zero paperwork
Unlimited account validity
Unrestricted deposits & spends

data.query: Do I need to book an appointment for video KYC?
data.solution: No, you don't need to book an appointment for Video KYC. You can request for a Video KYC on all days between 8AM to 7PM, including Saturdays & Sundays, and also bank holidays. Click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: When can I carry out the video KYC process? Is it available 24*7?
data.solution: You can request for a Video KYC on all days between 8AM to 7PM, including Saturdays & Sundays and also bank holidays.

data.query: Is Aadhaar required for video KYC?
data.solution:
Yes. Aadhaar card/number is required for Video KYC. Your Aadhaar number will be verified through an OTP. You don't need to carry your physical Aadhaar Card during the Video KYC process.
Click here to start your Video KYC journey.
* Submission of Aadhaar is voluntary

data.query: What are the different steps involved in video KYC process?
data.solution:
In the Video KYC process,

1. You have to fill up your details online. After you fill up all the required details,

2. The Kotak811 officer will carry out basic checks through video interaction, and

3. He/She will guide you through the process

Just keep your original PAN card, a blank paper and a blue/black pen handy. You will get a Full KYC Kotak811 account after the Video KYC is done.

Click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: Who are eligible to carry out Video KYC?
data.solution:
Video KYC is available only for new Kotak811 customers and Kotak811 Limited/Lite account holders.
Click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: No agent is available for video KYC. What should I do?
data.solution:
We apologize for the inconvenience. Video KYC service is available on all days between 8AM to 11PM, including Saturdays & Sundays, and also bank holidays. If you reached us on a working day within the mentioned hours, it is possible that your request could not be handled due to heavy traffic on our platform. We appreciate your cooperation and request you to please try again.

Please click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: What are the advantages of video KYC?
data.solution:
Video KYC process can be carried out from the comfort of your home. All you need is a good internet connection and good camera quality on your device.
Click here to start your Video KYC journey.

data.query: Can I fill the details online and carry out the video verification process later during the working hour?
data.solution: No, you need to carry out the entire journey in one go.

data.query: My communication address is different from my Aadhaar address. Can I carry out the video KYC process?
data.solution: Yes, you can. You can add a new communication address in the account opening journey. After adding the new communication address, you can self-verify the address by ticking the self-verification box. There is no need to provide proof of current address.

data.query: What can lead to rejection of video KYC?
data.solution: Video KYC can be rejected due to various reasons such as low video quality, interrupted connection, verification failure etc. In case your Video KYC was rejected, you can always come back and try again.

data.query: Are there any documents that I need to keep handy before doing the video KYC?
data.solution: Please keep your original PAN Card handy during the process. Also, please keep a blank A4 size page and a working pen in blue/black colour to provide your signature.

data.query: I have done the video KYC. When will I get my account details?
data.solution: After the Video KYC process is over, you will get your account details on your registered email ID and mobile number within 8 hours.

data.query: How can I apply for a physical debit card during the video KYC process?
data.solution:
You can request for a physical debit card after completing your Video KYC. A physical debit card comes at a minimal annual fee of ₹299 p.a. (inclusive of taxes) which be debited from your Kotak811 account. Here are the steps that you can follow to apply for a physical debit card:

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to the ‘811’ section
Tap on ’Virtual Debit Card’
Select 'Apply Now' in physical debit card section

data.query: Do I have to be in India to do Video KYC?
data.solution: Yes. According to Reserve Bank of India guidelines, you need to be in India for the Video KYC process.

data.query: I am not confident in doing a video KYC. Can I still do a full KYC through a face to face verification?
data.solution:
Yes, you can. Using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, you can book an appointment with an Kotak811 officer or visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete Full KYC.
To book an appointment via the app,
1. Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
2. Go to 'Verify your a/c'
3. Tap on 'Book appointment'
A customer support executive will call you to confirm the time and your address before the visit.
Alternatively, you may visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a Kotak branch near you, click https://www.kotak.com/en/reach-us.html

data.query: What will happen if the Video KYC process is suspended in between?
data.solution: In case the Video KYC process could not be completed, you can restart it. If your account has been opened, you will receive a communication from the bank.

data.query: What should I keep in mind before the video KYC?
data.solution:
Here are some of the things that you should keep in mind before carrying out the Video KYC:

Make sure you have uninterrupted data connectivity.
Make sure that you open the Video KYC link on Google Chrome web browser
Please ensure that your background is plain and white in colour and no other person appears or comes in the frame during the process.
Please keep your original PAN* handy during the process. Also, keep a blank A4 size page and a working pen in blue/black colour to provide your signature.

*e-PAN or Digital PAN is not allowed

data.query: I don’t have any current address proof. Will that be an issue during Video KYC process?
data.solution: There is no requirement to show your current address proof for Video KYC. You can give self-declaration on your current address proof.

data.query: Can I set an MPIN for my account in the video KYC process?
data.solution:
You can reset your MPIN after completing your Video KYC. Here's how you can reset your MPIN:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘Forgot MPIN’
Fill your personal details such as a) Mother’s maiden name b) PAN Number c) Date of Birth
Add a new 6-digit MPIN
Confirm your new MPIN

data.query: Will there be any limitation on transactions in the account opened through Video KYC?
data.solution: There are no limitations on an account fully verified through the process of Video KYC.

data.query: Can I complete my video KYC through a Whatsapp/Skype video call?
data.solution: Video KYC can be done through the Video KYC link that opens on Google Chrome web browser. There is no requirement for a video calling applications such as Whatsapp or Zoom.

data.query: I have tried carrying out the video KYC twice but I am not successful due to the slow internet connection and video quality. What can I do?
data.solution:
Don't worry if you are unable to do a Video KYC. You have two more ways to complete your Full KYC.
Using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, you can book an appointment with an Kotak811 officer or visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete Full KYC.
To book an appointment via the app,
1. Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
2. Click on 'Verify your a/c'
3. Click on 'Book appointment'
A customer support executive will call you to confirm the time and your address before the visit.
Alternatively, you may visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a Kotak branch near you, Click here

data.query: Can I do the video KYC through a web browser?
data.solution: Video KYC can be done through the Video KYC link that opens on Google Chrome web browser. There is no requirement for a video calling application such as Whatsapp or Zoom.

data.query: What is the minimum pixel requirement of the phone to carry out the video KYC process?
data.solution: There is no minimum pixel requirement. However, your video during the Video KYC process should be clear so that the Kotak811 officer can verify the documents and take a clear live photo.

data.query: Why do I need to give access to my location for video KYC?
data.solution: Providing location access will help us ascertain your location. According to RBI guidelines, you need to be in India to carry out Video KYC. Your location will be used for verification purposes only and will not be shared with any one.

data.query: I got a notification saying that video KYC can't be carried out on my browser. What should I do?
data.solution: Video KYC can be done on Google Chrome. If you are using other browsers like Internet Explorer, Opera Mini etc., make sure you copy the Video KYC link and open it on Google Chrome.

data.query: Why do I need to give consent for my camera and microphone?
data.solution: Since Video KYC is a video verification process, the consent to use your camera and microphone is needed to proceed with the Video KYC process. Information obtained during Video KYC is for verification purpose only and will not be shared with any one.

data.query: I have rejected location access by mistake. What should I do?
data.solution:
You need to grant location access to proceed with Video KYC. Follow these steps to enable location access on your device:
 
Go to Chrome settings
Click on Site Settings
Go to location
You will see a list of blocked websites
Find the Kotak website link
Under permissions, select location
Change the permission to 'allow' from 'block'

 
You can also book an appointment with an Kotak811 officer or visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete your Full KYC.
To book an appointment via the app,
1. Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
2. Click on 'Verify your a/c'
3. Click on 'Book appointment'
A customer support executive will call you to confirm the time and your address before the visit.
To locate a Kotak branch near you for walk-in KYC, click https://www.kotak.com/en/reach-us.html

Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to 'Verify your a/c'

To complete Full KYC through Video KYC, click here

Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App

The verification process is quick and simple. Completing your Full KYC is easy . Using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, you can book an appointment with our officer or opt for a Video KYC. You can also visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete your Full KYC.

Visit the Kotak811 section of the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App

data.query: Do I need to carry my Aadhaar card, PAN card or any other documents?
data.solution:
Kotak811 is an Aadhar OTP based account. Hence, you must carry your Aadhar Card and PAN Card for in-person verification with an Kotak811 officer to complete your Full KYC. 
You can also opt for a Video KYC process to complete your Full KYC from the comfort of your home. Just keep your Aadhaar Card and PAN Card handy. 
To complete your Full KYC through the Video KYC process, click here 
Please note: Video KYC is not available for Kotak811 Lite accounts

Alternatively, you can also visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a Kotak Mahindra branch near you, click here

data.query: What are the documents required for the completion of KYC?
data.solution: Aadhaar Card and PAN Card are the only two documents you need to complete your Full KYC.

data.query: Does my 811 Lite / 811 Limited KYC account have a validity?
data.solution:
Yes, Kotak811 Lite and Limited KYC accounts come with a limited validity of 12 months.
You can remove this limit and get a lifetime validity for your account by completing your Full KYC.
If you hold a Kotak811 Limited account, you can complete Full KYC through the Video KYC process. Click here to start the call. Video KYC is not available for Kotak811 Lite account holders.
You can also complete your Full KYC using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App. Just book an appointment with a Kotak811 officer and they will visit you for Full KYC.
To book an appointment via the app,

Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to 'Verify your a/c'
Tap on 'Book appointment'

A customer support executive will call you to confirm the time and your address before the visit.
Alternatively, you may visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a Kotak branch near you, click here
IMPORTANT: If Full KYC is not completed within 180 days from the date of account opening, transactions for your account are blocked. However, you can still complete your Full KYC.
An account expires if Full KYC is not completed within 12 months from account opening, with no possibility of reactivation.

data.query: Can I save my online account opening application and continue it later?
data.solution:
Yes, of course! 
All the information you've entered is regularly backed up. You may leave the app or close it at any point. When you return, you can resume from where you left off.

data.query: Am I eligible to apply for Kotak 811?
data.solution:
You are eligible for an Kotak811 account if you meet all of the below requirements:

You are 18 years of age or above
You have a valid Aadhar & PAN card
You are resident of India with an Indian address
You do not hold any previous relationship with Kotak Mahindra Bank

To open an Kotak811 account, click here
* Submission of Aadhaar is voluntary

data.query: Can I hold my account jointly with another applicant?
data.solution: When you open an Kotak811 account online, it is intended for a single user only. After completing Full KYC for your Kotak811 account, you can add a joint account holder by visiting your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a branch near you, click here

Apply PAN Card

data.query: I do not have an Aadhaar number. Can I still apply for a Kotak 811 account?
data.solution: Aadhar card is mandatory to open an Kotak811 savings account. Click here to view features of different Kotak811 a/c variants.

data.query: What is a Kotak 811 Edge account and how do I apply for it?
