data.query: What will be the fees & charges for Kotak 811 zero balance account?
data.solution:
811 savings account is a zero balance account. Hence, you do not have to maintain a minimum balance. However, Kotak811 Edge Account requires you to maintain a minimum Average Monthly Balance of ₹10,000.
To know about all the charges related to an Kotak811 account in detail, click here

data.query: What are the features of Kotak 811 account?
data.solution:
Kotak811 is a fully Digital Savings Account. Below are the key features of your Kotak811 account.

Open account instantly online
Earn up to 3.5%* interest p.a. on your savings account balance
No Minimum Balance required. Enjoy your Kotak811 Zero Balance account
Kotak811 Account holders can avail free funds transfer online using NEFT or IMPS or RTGS.
Shop online with ease using your Virtual Debit Card (VDC) or physical debit card.
Request for your physical debit card through Net-banking or Mobile Banking App and get it for ?235 p.a. Ensure you have adequate balance to pay for the Physical Debit Card before you request one.
Avail Scan and Pay** for your payments
Seamless handling of your Kotak811 account through Kotak Mobile Banking App

 
*W.e.f. May 25, 2020, interest rate on daily balances in Savings Account stands revised as follows: Daily balances above Rs. 1 lakh will earn 3.5% interest p.a. and daily balances up to Rs. 1 lakh will earn 3.50% interest p.a. The interest rates mentioned are applicable for Resident Accounts only.
In case you have opened an Kotak811 Lite account if you didn't want to use your Aadhaar or you didn't want to open savings account for receiving DBT or didn't receive Aadhaar OTP, then you need to convert your account to Full KYC account in order to get Savings account interest, virtual debit card and cheque book.
**Scan and Pay at selected store outlets

data.query: I got a message on KYC pending due to incomplete signature form. What should I do?
data.solution:
We are here to help you.

In order to complete your Full KYC and update signature in your account, we request you to share the documents listed below with us:

Scanned copy of the signed 811 Signature Card form - Click here to download the form
Image of your original PAN card
Please Note:

Mention your CRN, Account Number and Name on the 811 Signature Card form.
Ensure that your signature is strictly within the signature box provided in the form.
Once you have the hardcopy of the form, place PAN card within the box provided in the form. Your PAN card number should be on the top side. Click the image of the form along with PAN card.
Documents to be in jpeg or PDF format only.
Maximum attachment size: 5 MB
At the moment, only 1 attachment is permitted. To share multiple documents/image, please ensure it is part of one file and is uploaded in one go.

Click here to submit the document.

Alternatively, you may visit your nearest branch to submit documents. To locate your nearest branch, click here

data.query: How can I deposit money into my Kotak 811 account?
data.solution:
Following are the ways in which you can deposit money into your Kotak811 account:

You can deposit money in your account using your Debit Card or Net Banking of another bank.
You can transfer money from another account through NEFT, IMPS or UPI*
You can visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank branch to deposit cash*.

data.query: I tried to deposit money into my Kotak 811 account. My bank has debited the money from my account but your app says my transaction has failed. What do I do?
data.solution:
Please don’t worry. In case of a failed transaction, the full amount will be credited back into your source bank account within 7 to 10 working days. 
If it has already been over 10 days and the amount has not been credited back to the source account yet, please reach out to our phone banking officer on 1860 266 0811 from 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM (Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays)

data.query: When will the funds I transferred be available in my account?
data.solution:
Generally, funds get credited instantaneously. In some cases, it may take upto 2 working days to credit money to your account.
In case of a failed transaction, the full amount will be credited back into your source bank account within 7 to 10 working days.
If it has already been over 10 days and the amount has not been credited back to the source account yet, please reach out to our phone banking officer on 1860 266 0811 from 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM (Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays)

data.query: How much money can I deposit into my 811 account?
data.solution: Deposit limits on your Kotak811 account vary as per the account type. Click here to know more.

data.query: How can I transfer funds to my Kotak 811 Lite Account?
data.solution:
It's easy to transfer money to your Kotak811 Lite account. Just follow the steps below:

Login to Kotak811 Mobile Banking App.
Go to the Kotak811 section
Tap on Add Money (up to ₹5,000/-)


IMPORTANT: Funds transferred/added to Kotak811 Lite accounts can be used only for utility bill payments.
If Full KYC is not completed within 180 days from the date of account opening, transactions for your account are blocked. However, you can still complete your Full KYC.
An account expires if Full KYC is not completed within 12 months from account opening, with no possibility of reactivation.

data.query: How can I withdraw cash through my 811 account
data.solution:
There are two ways to withdraw your money from an Kotak811 account:

Through an ATM using physical debit card**
You can also visit a branch to withdraw cash

 
**Only Limited and full KYC accounts can apply for a physical debit card. For charges associated to your Kotak811 account, click here
*Cash withdrawal is not allowed on Kotak Lite account
 Cash withdrawal at branch is only available for FKYC customer

data.query: Why am I unable to transfer money from my 811 Account?
data.solution:
If you hold an Kotak811 Lite account, you cannot transfer money from your bank account to other account. However, lifting this restriction is easy. Simply complete your Full KYC and upgrade to a Full KYC Kotak811 a/c that comes with no restrictions.
If you hold an OTP account, you may have reached the permissible limit of transactions allowed from your account, which is why further transactions are being prohibited.
Other reasons behind the issue you are facing could be low or no account balance, incorrect details of payee, and account freeze. You may recheck the input details and try again.

data.query: How can I withdraw funds from my Kotak 811 Lite Account?
data.solution:
You cannot withdraw cash from your Kotak 811 Lite account. 
To withdraw cash, you need to complete the Full KYC process of your 811 Lite Account into a full-fledged savings account.

data.query: When will I receive my Virtual Debit Card?
data.solution:
Instantly! You'll get your Virtual Debit Card number the moment you've finished opening your account.
To view your virtual debit card details, follow the steps below:

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App using your CRN and MPIN
Go to the Kotak811 Tab
Tap on Virtual Debit Card

If you're having trouble viewing your virtual debit card, please reach to our phone banking officer on 1860 266 0811 anytime between 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM (Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays)

data.query: What is a Virtual Debit Card? How do I use it?
data.solution: Kotak811 Limited and Full KYC account comes with a free Virtual Debit Card. It can be used to shop/pay online just like how you use a regular debit card. Virtual debit cards cannot be used at ATMs. If you wish, you can apply for a physical debit card as well with a nominal annual fees of ₹299+GST

data.query: Can I have a physical Debit Card? How do I apply for one?
data.solution:
Follow these steps to apply* for a physical debit card

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App using your CRN and MPIN
Go to Kotak811 Tab
Tap on Virtual Debit card
Select 'Apply Now'

*Charges Apply. Physical debit card is not available for Kotak811 Lite account customers. Kotak811 Lite customers must complete their Full KYC to lift this restriction.

data.query: How do I view my Virtual Debit Card in the Mobile Banking App?
data.solution:
To view your virtual debit card, follow these steps:

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App using your CRN and MPIN
Go to the Kotak811 Tab
Tap on Virtual Debit Card

If you're having trouble viewing your virtual debit card, please reach to our phone banking officer on 1860 266 0811 anytime between 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM (Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays)

data.query: It’s been 10 days and I haven’t received my welcome kit. What do I do?
data.solution:
Your truly digital Kotak811 account does not come with a physical welcome kit, or a physical debit card.
If you are a Kotak811 Limited or Kotak811 Full KYC customer, you can apply for a physical debit card with a nominal annual fee of ₹299.
Follow these steps to apply for a physical debit card:

Log into the Mobile Banking App using your CRN and MPIN
Go to the Kotak811 Tab
Choose Virtual Debit card
Tap on 'Apply Now'

data.query: When will I receive a cheque book* for my 811 account?
data.solution:
Cheque Book is available to Full KYC accounts at a mimimal charge.
To get your personalized Cheque Book, follow the steps below:

Log in to the Kotak Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘811’ section
Tap on ‘Cheque Book’
Request for a 25 or 50 leaf personalized Cheque Book.

For more information on charges, click here

data.query: What happens to my Virtual Prepaid Card after I complete Full KYC for my 811 Lite account?
data.solution:
Your Kotak811 Virtual Prepaid Card will be blocked and replaced with a new Kotak811 Virtual Debit Card. To view your virtual card details, follow the below steps:

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App using your CRN and MPIN
Go to the Kotak811 Tab
Tap on Virtual Debit Card link

data.query: How can I view my statement online
data.solution:
To view the statement for your truly digital Kotak811 account, simply follow the steps below:

Log into the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App using CRN and MPIN
Go to Statement
Tap on Consolidated Statement
Select Month and View

data.query: Will I receive a Physical passbook by default when I complete Full KYC?
data.solution:
Your Kotak811 digital savings account does not require you to carry a passbook. You can check all your transactions online on the Kotak Mobile Banking App.
If you wish to have a statement of your transactions for documentation purposes, you can place a request on the Kotak Mobile Banking App and receive your statement on your registered email ID.
If you still prefer a Passbook, you can apply for it online and get it be delivered to your preferred communication address as per Bank records in 7-10 working days. Please note, only Full KYC account holders can request for a passbook. This process is applicable only for customers applying for a passbook for the first time. For second passbook onwards, please visit your nearest bank branch.
To apply for a passbook, click here

data.query: What if I forget the MPIN? How can I create again?
data.solution:
If you have forgotten your MPIN, here's how you can reset it:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘Forgot MPIN’
Fill your personal details such as a) Mother’s maiden name b) PAN Number c) Date of Birth
Add a new 6-digit MPIN
Confirm your new MPIN

data.query: How do I create my MPIN?
data.solution:
When you use the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App to create an Kotak811 account, you’ll be able to create a 6-digit MPIN of your choice during the account opening process.
If you have forgotten your MPIN, here's how you can reset it:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘Forgot MPIN’
Fill your personal details such as a) Mother’s maiden name b) PAN Number c) Date of Birth
Add a new 6-digit MPIN
Confirm your new MPIN

data.query: How do I create a PIN for my Virtual Debit Card*?
data.solution:
Here’s how you can create a PIN for your Virtual Debit Card:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Click on ‘Service Requests’.
Under the ‘Debit Card’ section, you'll see an option to ‘Regenerate PIN’.


Please note: Virtual Debit Card is not available for Kotak811 Lite customers.

data.query: What is an MPIN and why do I need to set one?
data.solution:
An MPIN is a Mobile Banking Personal Identification Number. You will need your MPIN to login to the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App to transact and manage your Kotak811 Account.
If you have forgotten you MPIN, here's how you can reset your MPIN:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘Forgot MPIN’
Fill your personal details such as a) Mother’s maiden name b) PAN number c) Date of Birth
Add a new 6-digit MPIN
Confirm your new MPIN

data.query: How do I set password for my Net Banking*?
data.solution:
You can use your Virtual Debit Card credentials to register for Net Banking. You’ll need your card number, expiry date, CVV and PIN.
* - Unfortunately, we can’t offer Net Banking to Kotak811 Lite customers. To use our Net Banking services, please upgrade to a full-service Kotak811 account by verifying your KYC details.

data.query: I got disconnected from the Kotak Mobile Banking App. How can I continue my online account opening application?
data.solution: Don't worry! We regularly back up all the information that you've entered. Please reopen the app, and you will be able to continue from where you left off.

data.query: How do I start using the Mobile Banking App after opening my account?
data.solution:
To download the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, click here. Log into the app by entering your CRN and the MPIN that you set during account opening process.
To know your CRN number in one simple step, message CRN(space)Last 4 digits of your a/c no. to 9971056767
In case you have forgotten your MPIN, please follow the below steps to reset it:

Open Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Click ‘Forgot MPIN’
Fill your personal details such as your date of birth, mother’s maiden name, etc.
Add a new 6-digit MPIN
Confirm your new MPIN

data.query: How can I start a Recurring Deposit/Term Deposit (RD/TD)?
data.solution:
Following are the steps to apply for RD/TD through Kotak811 Mobile Banking App:

Log in to the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App by entering your CRN and the MPIN
Go to the ‘Banking’ section inside the app
Tap on ‘Fixed/Recurring Deposits’
Select ‘Open Recurring Deposit’ or ‘Open Fixed Deposit’.


These features are available to customers who have verified their identity with us through FKYC. If you haven't done that yet, you can book an appointment with an Kotak811 officer or visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch
To book an appointment via the app,

Visit the Kotak811 section of the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Click on 'Verify your a/c'
Book an appointment


Alternatively, you may visit the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. To locate a Kotak branch near you, visit Locate us

data.query: How do I set password for my Net Banking*?
data.solution:
You can use your Virtual Debit Card credentials to register for Net Banking. You’ll need your card number, expiry date, CVV and PIN.
* - Unfortunately, we can’t offer Net Banking to Kotak811 Lite customers. To use our Net Banking services, please upgrade to a full-service Kotak811 account by verifying your KYC details.

data.query: I am having another OTP account so my account got blocked, What should I do?
data.solution:
It seems like your account was blocked due to compliance reasons.
You can easily reactivate your account and resume banking with us by completing Full KYC for your account.
Here are 3 simple ways to complete your Full KYC:

For verification with Aadhaar Card - Biometric authentication is compulsory. No other documents are required if you opt for Aadhaar verification.

You can easily reactivate your account and resume banking with us by completing Full KYC for your account.

Our officer will visit you at your communication address to complete your Full KYC as per the appointment scheduled.

data.query: My 811 limited Accounts completed 1year & FKYC is not done. My account is currently blocked. What should I do?
data.solution: Hey, Kotak811 Limited account comes with a validity of 12 months. When you do not complete your Full KYC within 12 months from the date of account opening, your account is closed. Currently, your account is in freeze mode since Full KYC was not completed, and your account will be closed shortly.

data.query: My 811 lite Accounts completed 1year & FKYC is not done. My account is currently blocked. What should I do?
data.solution:
Hey, Kotak811 Lite account comes with a validity of 12 months. When you do not complete your Full KYC within 12 months from the date of account opening, your account is closed. Currently, your account is in freeze mode since Full KYC was not completed, and your account will be closed shortly.
In case your account balance is zero, your account is closed automatically when the account validity expires.
If your account holds a certain balance, your account will remain in freeze mode until this balance is used up. You can use this balance to make payments online. This balance, however, cannot be withdrawn as cash

data.query: I have Signature card form handed over to me by bank officer during Full KYC
data.solution:

Documents should be in JPEG or PDF format only.
Attachment sizes should not be more than 5 MB.

data.query: I got a message on account blocked due to NAME MISMATCH observed between Aadhaar & PAN card submitted during Full KYC procedure. What should I do
data.solution:
When a name mismatch is detected between your Aadhaar and PAN card during the Full KYC process, your account is blocked due to failure of verification.
You can unblock your account by submitting any one of the documents listed below:
1] Updated PAN Card (with name as per Aadhaar card)
OR
2] ANY ONE from these as ID Proof:

Gazette (if name has changed)
Marriage Certificate - Issued by Govt. (if name has changed after marriage)

Ensure that the document proof you are submitting has your name as per Aadhaar card.
To raise request:

CLICK on “I need more help” button and write to us
FILL the required details
MENTION document type(PAN card, Gazette copy or Marriage Certificate) in the Query/Feedback text box
ATTACH a JPEG/PDF (maximum size allowed 5 MB) of any one of the proof mentioned above
CLICK on Submit

Remember:

Only 1 attachment is permitted. Multiple files can be added to and uploaded as one file.

Alternatively, you may visit your nearest branch to submit these documents. To locate your nearest branch, click here.
To update your PAN card:

Visit the PAN NSDL website/Centre.
Once updated, you may submit the PAN card with your name as per Aadhaar Card as ID proof for Full KYC.

data.query: I did not receive my welcome letter and now my account is blocked.
data.solution:
Accounts are blocked for security reasons if the welcome letter returns undelivered from your communication address. 
In such cases, you can easily reactivate your account by updating your address at any Kotak Branch, and resume banking with us. 
To change your address, please carry ANY ONE of these valid address proofs: Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Driving License, Passport. 
To locate your nearest Kotak branch, click here

data.query: Regulation allows me to do FKYC within 365 days , why is my account frozen in 6 months
data.solution:
Your account is currently blocked for transactions for security reasons as per our internal bank policy. If Full KYC is not completed within 365 days from account opening, your account will expire permanently with no possibility of reactivation.
Completing Full KYC for your account is easy and you have 3 options to choose from. Using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, you can book an appointment with our officer or opt for a Video KYC. You can also visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete your Full KYC.
To complete Full KYC through the Video KYC process, click here

data.query: Is my information secure?
data.solution: Absolutely! The security of your personal information and your online banking transactions is of utmost importance to us. We maintain strict security standards to prevent unauthorized access to your information.

data.query: What is a FATCA declaration and why do I need to make one?
data.solution: FATCA stands for the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act. RBI has made FATCA declaration mandatory for all bank account holders in India. FATCA is a self-certification provided by the bank account holders about their tax residence for their compliance with FATCA.

data.query: Why do I need to add a nominee to my account?
data.solution: Adding a nominee to your account is a smart thing to do. In the unfortunate event of an accident or death, the funds in your account will be transferred to your nominee quickly and easily.

data.query: How can account closure be avoided and I can continue to operate the account?
data.solution:
You can avoid an unforeseen closure of your account by completing Full KYC for your Kotak811 account within 12 months from the date of account opening. Completing Full KYC would upgrade your account to a Full KYC Kotak811 savings account, which comes with unlimited validity.

Using the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App, you can book an appointment with an Kotak811 officer or visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to complete Full KYC.

To book an appointment via the app,

Visit the Kotak811 section on the Kotak811 Mobile Banking App
Go to 'Verify your a/c'
Tap on 'Book appointment'
A customer support executive will call you to confirm the time and your address before the visit.

To complete Full KYC through the Video KYC process, click here

data.query: In case of account closure, how will the balance of my 811 account be remitted to me?
data.solution:
811 Limited KYC Account:
If you have not completed the Full KYC of your account within the stipulated time period, the account will be closed. Once closed, the balance amount will be sent to your registered address via Demand draft within 30 days after the closure of your account.
811 Lite Account:
The balance in your Kotak811 Lite account can be utilised for utility bill payments, however, you will not be able to top up the balance in your account since credit freeze will be applicable.

data.query: Once my 811 account is closed, can I re-apply for another 811 account?
data.solution: Sure, you can! Click here to open your Kotak811 savings account.

data.query: Received DD dispatch update in last 7 working days
data.solution: Don’t worry! Your funds are safe. It normally takes up to 7 working days to deliver a DD. Please rest assured that your DD will be delivered in due time.

data.query: Request transfer via NEFT
data.solution:
Sure, we can do that. Click here to open the request form.

Follow these steps:

CLICK on “I need more help” button and write to us
FILL the required details
MENTION ‘Transfer closing balance amount through NEFT to my other bank account’ in the Query/Feedback text box 
ATTACH a JPEG/PDF (maximum size allowed 5 MB) of your
PAN card
Aadhar card, and
Cancelled cheque of your existing account with the other bank for NEFT


CLICK on Submit
We will process your request in up to 7 working days after checking the DD status in our records.


Remember:

Only 1 attachment is permitted. Multiple files can be added to and uploaded as one file.
Account holder's name in the other bank for NEFT should be the same as that in Kotak.

data.query: Request re-dispatch to registered address
data.solution:
Sure, we can do that. Click here to open the request form.
Follow these steps:


CLICK on “I need more help” button and write to us
FILL the required details on the form.
MENTION ‘Re-dispatch closing balance amount to my registered address’ in the Query/Feedback text box, and
A landmark of your registered address compulsorily
CLICK on Submit
We will process your request in up to 7 working days after checking the DD status in our records.

data.query: Request re-dispatch to nearest or home branch
data.solution:
Sure, we can do that. Click here to open the request form.
Follow these steps:

CLICK on “I need more help” button and write to us
MENTION
'Re-dispatch closing balance amount to home/nearest branch’ in the Query/Feedback text box, and
The branch name and address where the DD should be redelivered


CLICK on Submit


Here’s what needs to be done next:

You will receive intimation on dispatch status.
Once DD is delivered, you may visit the branch for collection along with original PAN & Aadhar, as submitted during account opening.


We will process your request in up to 7 working days after checking the DD status in our records.

data.query: I am not able to deposit DD as it has crossed validity. What should I do?
data.solution:
We can sort this for you. Generally, DD is valid for 90 days. In case it is not banked within the validy period,DD expires.
In a situation where your DD has expired, we can revalidate it basis your request and redispatch DD or transfer funds in your other bank account via NEFT.
Here's what needs to be done :
1.CLICK HERE to raise a request.
2.Mention your preference on how would you like to process it - Redispatch DD to home branch or nearest branch ; or Communication address ; or transfer funds to other bank account via NEFT
3.We will check DD status in our records and process request as per your preference

Option 1 : Re-deliver to Home Branch/Nearest Branch – Please mention details of the branch (branch name and branch location) where the DD should be redelivered. You will receive initimation on dispatch status.Post the delivery of the DD, you may visit the branch for collection along with original PAN & Aadhar (as submitted during account opening) .
Option 2 : Re-deliver to registered address – Please share landmark for redelivery at your registered communication address.
Option 3 : Transferred via NEFT* to other bank account – Please attach a copy of your PAN and Aadhar (used during account opening) and a cancelled cheque of your existing account with the other bank where funds need to be transferred. Please note, account holder's name in the other bank where funds need to be transferred via NEFT has to be the same as that in Kotak.
*Please note: NEFT can be made only to an account where the account holder's name is the same as that on their Kotak account
Turnaround time to process request : 7 working days; Landmark for redispatch is required

data.solution:

data.query: Update my communication address
data.solution:
You can update your Correspondence address through Net Banking. Please find below the path:
1) Login to Net Banking.
2) Go to Profile / Update Contact Details link on top right corner
3) Click on Edit button next to Correspondence Address
4) Select either of the options
Update address using Aadhar Number & OTP (address will be instantly updated)
Update address by uploading Address Proof (address will be updated in 1 working day). Valid address proof are Passport, Aadhaar Number, Driving License and Voter ID.
Update address by logging into the DigiLocker. (Aadhaar Number details must be updated in the bank records to avail this facility).


You can place a request at the nearest branch with the required documents viz. Passport, Aadhaar Number, Driving License and Voter ID. It will be executed within 1 working day from the date the request is placed. Please carry the originals and their self-attested copies.
In order to change the address only in the Credit Card records, you can also call our 24X7 helpline number 1860 266 2666 (call charges apply). This request will take upto 6 working days.


 
Please Note:
1. After the addition / modification of your correspondence address, you can update the same on the platform only after 6 months from the last updation date.

data.query: Incorrect Name in Account
data.solution:

e.g. In case of name correction/change please carry one original Photo ID proof which has latest/corrected name you wish to update on your account.

data.query: MICR Code
data.solution: MICR code can be found at the bottom of your cheque. The middle section of the numbers on the cheque contains the 9 digit MICR code. MICR code can also be found on physical statements sent from the bank.

data.query: Update my Home Branch details
data.solution:
There are many ways you can change your home branch. However, customers who wish to change home branch within the same pin code cannot change home branch online and need to visit branch.
1. On Mobile Banking:
1. Login to Mobile Banking.
2. Go to Service Requests.
3. Select Account Service Requests -> Change of Home Branch
 
2. On Net Banking:
1. Login to Net Banking.
2. Go to Service Requests
3. Select Savings / Current account -> Change of Home Branch
 
3. You can upgrade your home branch by visiting this link.

Go to Service Request 
Select Profile -> PAN Update

On Net Banking


Go to Profile/Update Contact Details 
Personal Information -> PAN -> Edit 

You can also update your PAN by clicking here.
In case your account is less than 6 months old, you will need to visit the branch with valid ID proof for PAN updation.

Please Note : You will not be able to edit PAN online if its wrongly updated and PAN can be updated only once through online channels. For any subsequent requests, you will need to visit our nearest branch with original and copy of PAN card to update.

data.query: View/Update my Aadhaar details
data.solution:
In order avail subsidies from Government Authorities in your Kotak account, please seed your Aadhaar to your account by following ways:
On Mobile Banking

Go to Service Requests 
Aadhaar Update

On Net Banking


Go to Service Requests
Aadhaar Update

 
You can also click here to Seed your Aadhaar to your account.
Please Note:


Aadhaar Number can be seeded with Savings account only. Your request for linking your Aadhaar Number to your Bank Account will be processed, basis validation with NPCI / requisite authorities.

This request will not be processed, if details in your Bank Account do not match with your Aadhaar details available with UIDAI.
Please do not submit multiple requests at the same time, using different channels, for linking your Aadhaar number to your account. For example-If you have already submitted your request for Aadhaar Card linking at one of our branches or any other online channel, please wait for the failure message, before re-submitting your request through any of these channels.

data.query: Update/Link/Seed Aadhaar
data.solution:
In order to avail subsidies from Government Authorities in your Kotak Mahindra Bank Account, you can link your Aadhaar to your bank account in following ways:

On Mobile Banking

Login to your Kotak – 811 & Mobile Banking App
Go to ‘Service Requests’

Go to 'Profile' section
Click on ‘Aadhaar Number Update’
Select/Edit/Enter your Aadhaar Number

Select any of the following option on the page



First time seeding
I already have any account with XXX Bank seeded with Aadhaar, interested in changing: Yes

Share Name of Bank & Account details
Choose an option and proceed
Submit Aadhaar OTP
Confirm



On Net Banking

 Login to your Kotak Mahindra Bank Net Banking portal or click here to initiate.
Select ‘Banking’
Click on ‘Profile/Update Contact Details’
Select ‘Update your Aadhaar’ option

Enter your 12-digit Aadhaar number
Click on ‘Submit’



Through Website

Click here  to link your Aadhaar with your bank account
Complete your authentication by using your registered mobile number, date of birth or CRN and click on ‘Send OTP’
Enter the OTP that you have received on your registered mobile number
Enter your bank account number
Add your 12-digit Aadhaar number

Click on ‘Submit’ button




You can also visit your nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank branch to update your Aadhaar with your bank account.

Please Note:
 1. Aadhaar Number can be seeded with Savings account only. Your request for linking your Aadhaar Number to your Bank Account will be processed, basis validation with NPCI/ requisite authorities.
 2. This request will not be processed if details in your Bank Account do not match with your Aadhaar details available with UIDAI.

data.query: I want to apply for a Fresh/Top Up/BT Personal Loan?
data.solution:
Kotak Mahindra Bank ensures an easy and convenient personal loan application process. For an online application all you need to do is provide us with your basic details, check your eligibility to borrow a loan from Kotak Mahindra Bank and finally, submit the mandatory documents. 
Please click here for start your Online Journey 
Alternatively, you can apply for loan from Whats app Banking.

To apply through Whatsapp Banking
If you are on mobile, click here to get started OR Give a missed call on 9718566655 from your registered mobile number
Add ‘022 6600 6022’ to your mobile contacts
Go to WhatsApp, search for the contact and send “help” as a message to know the list of services available
Simply type the number against the service for eg. “1”or "Loan Request"
Select the applicable option from the available Menu


To apply for Top up or BT, simply SMS 'PLTOPUP' to 5676788 for Top up loan and SMS ‘PLBT’ to 5676788 for BT Loan

data.query: How do I know my EMI, Balance loan amount, Rate of Interest etc. details?
data.solution:
You can easily know your EMI, Balance Loan Amount, Rate of Interest etc. on the Kotak Mobile Banking App/Net Banking App.

Net banking :
Step 1 : Log in to Net banking
Step 2 : Select Loans > Your Loans
Step 3 : Click on Overview
Step 5 : Loan details

Mobile banking :
Step 1 : Log in to Mobile banking
Step 2 : Go to Personal Loan
Step 3 : Loan details   

Please click here to visit the Mobile Banking or Net Banking App
Alternatively, you can also view loan details from Whats app Banking.

1. If you are on mobile, click here to get started OR Give a missed call on 9718566655 from your registered mobile number

5. Select the applicable option from the available Menu
In case, you do not have Net Banking password/Mobile Banking PIN (MPIN)?

For Mobile Banking: Create / Reset your MPIN using your Net Banking / Debit Card / Credit Card details. Click on “Forgot MPIN” after entering CRN in the app.
Do not know your CRN?

data.query: How do I make overdue payments of my Loan?
data.solution:
You can check details post login into his/her Net Banking/Mobile Banking. The bounced personal loan EMI can be paid via the usual payment options available such as Net banking/Mobile Banking. However, the Bank will charge you an overdue interest. Amounts standing unpaid on respective due dates shall attract penal charge at 8% per annum (to be charged for actual no. of days) on overdue amount plus applicable taxes. Post payment is done, you need to call our Customer Contact Centre on 1860 266 2666 (Local call rates applicable) from Mon-Sat (excluding holidays) between 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM so the request can be taken to adjust the amount towards the overdue payments.
Please click here to visit the Mobile Banking or Net Banking


Alternatively, you can also view loan overdue details from Whats app Banking.
To check through Whatsapp Banking

1. If you are on mobile, click here to get started OR Give a missed call on 9718566655 from your registered mobile number
2.  Add ‘022 6600 6022’ to your mobile contacts
3. Go to WhatsApp, search for the contact and send “help” as a message to know the list of services available
4. Simply type the number against the service for eg. “1”or "Loan Request"

data.query: When will I receive no objection certificate?

data.query: Swapping of Repayment Mode
data.solution:
Please note that change of repayment mode is subject to a credit appraisal. If approved by Bank’s internal credit, charges would be applicable to process this request as per TAT. You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques and signed NACH / Standing Instruction mandate form as per your applicable Standing Instruction/NACH mode of payment
In case you are swapping to a Standing Instruction mode the swap charges will not be applicable
To submit the request, you may visit our nearest Kotak Retail Assets branch (List of Kotak Loan Branches). Along with your last 3 months Bank statement of new bank account, request letter & valid signature Identity proof.
Please Note that change of EMI Date is subject to a credit appraisal, post which applicable charges + broken period interest (if any) & penal charges(if applicable)+ broken period interest (if any) + GST will be applicable, if approved.
You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques as per your applicable SI/NACH mode of payment
To get the same processed you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch: https://www.kotak.com/en/customer-service/contact-us/email-us/kotak-loan/home-loan-branch-customer-care.html from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm & submit your last 6 months Bank statement, request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs to our service officer
Once banks internal credit approval is received we will be sending the rescheduling proposal to your registered address. You need to submit the rescheduling proposal signed by borrower to the loan.
Turn Around Time (TAT) applicable as per the request for processing the change in EMI Date after all documents are completely and correctly submitted.

data.query: How do I foreclose/Preclose my Loan?
data.solution:
You can foreclose/pre-close your Kotak Personal loans post payment of first EMI. Upto 3 years foreclosure charges are 4 % plus GST on outstanding principal. For the period after 3 years the foreclosure charges are 2 % plus GST on the outstanding principal.
Lock-in period structure :

Foreclosure charges

Upto 3 years - 4% + taxes on outstanding principal

After 3 years - 2% + taxes on outstanding principal

 

For >10L Loan amount: Foreclosure charges of INR 999/- plus taxes

(only if closing through own funds and after completion of 12 months).

Applicable only for Sanction Letter issued on or before 21st June 2023 and Subject to following conditions.

(This will not be applicable for digitally availed loans)

i) Customer will have to provide a copy of this sanction letter/email at the time of foreclosing the loan with the above clause mentioned.

ii) Latest 3-month salary account statement and savings account statement (from where payment is being made) must be submitted, and no loans should have been availed during the last three months to benefit from this offer (FC 999/-). Bank has the right to ask for additional documents in order to validate the claim and the decision of the Bank will be final and binding in all respects.


You may visit our nearest Kotak Retail Assets branch (List of Kotak Loan Branches), (OR) you can also call our Customer Contact Centre on 18602662666 (Local call rates apply) between 9:00 am to 7:00 pm from Mon to Sat excluding holidays after completion of lock-in period for issuance of foreclosure letter. You need to call and inform Customer Contact Centre team post making the payment towards Foreclosure.

data.query: What do I need to do, incase I want to opt for an ECS mode for making my Installment payments instead of PDC?
data.solution:
You would need to sign and submit an ECS Form along with the documents below,
1 cheque to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX' Loan Account Holder name XXXX. This cheque needs to be undated and blank at the bottom please mention 'Not more than the loan amount'
6 cheques to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX. These cheque need to be undated and blank at the bottom it please mention 'Not more than the EMI amount'
Three cheques dated as per your EMI date and filled with the EMI amount payable in favor of Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX.
PDC change charges* of 500/- +GST will be applicable per instance, in case ECS is being given from a different bank account
All PDC's being submitted need to only be as per the Reserve Bank of India Cheque Truncation System-2010 format (CTS-2010)

Please Note - * PDC swap charges are subject to change.

data.query: What are the documents required for applying for a business loan?
data.solution: Along with your business Loan application form, you'd need to provide your address proof, identity proof documents i.e. KYC, Financials for the last two years, banking details and proof of your business continuity etc. You can view the complete details of business loan documentation by clicking  here.

data.query: The meaning of business loan is what?
data.solution: Business loan means a sum of money borrowed from a financial institution or bank by a merchant to grow, expand and use money for business purpose only   Kotak Business Loans are available from Rs. 3 lakhs to Rs. 75 Lakhs for small, medium & large businesses

data.query: Does one get any extra benefit for applying for a business loan with kotak?
data.solution: At Kotak, we ensure that we give the best possible rates and fees to all our customers. We provide great offers on rates especially on term loan and Faciity against Credit Card Receivables. Kotak Business Loans are available from Rs. 3 lakhs to Rs. 75 Lakhs. Minimal paperwork and speedy approvals are designed to provide the best service at competitive rates.

data.query: How much time does it take to transfer the business loan amount?
data.solution: At Kotak, we strive to give the best possible experience & timelines to all our customers. The time line for the complete processing of loan is 7 working days after all the documents have been received, it is subject to approval.

data.query: What happens if I forget to pay the business loan emi?
data.solution:
A bounce on business loan EMI will lead to the following:   
1. Attract penalties  
2. Impact on the credit score  
3. At the event of the sustained bounce, the chances of getting calls from collection agencies soar high and more importantly, it can lead to financers refusing to extend any kind of credit facility to you in future.  Hence, it is important to ensure that the EMIs are being paid in time.

data.query: With kotak what is the minimum emi tenure for business loan?
data.solution: Minimum tenure for Business Loan is 1 year i.e. 12 months. Tenure is usually from 12months to 36months. Maximum is 3 years i.e. 36months. Funding to Doctors and Chartered Accountants can be done for 5 years i.e. 60 months.

data.query: What are the emi dates available for business loan?
data.solution: EMI date is usually opted between 1st, 5th or 10th of every month based on the cilents comfort.

data.query: Let me know what kind of security is required for business loan?
data.solution: Business Loan offered at Kotak Bank is purely unsecured. No security is needed for the loan application while either of the office or the residence of the applicant should be owned for verification purposes. Kotak’s Business Loan is a collateral-free loan, you could get the business loan without any collateral. No security is required.

data.query: The disbursement of my business loan can be done in how many instalments?
data.solution: The term business loan is disbursed fully in one go i.e. bullet payment.

data.query: I want to know who can be my co applicant for the business loan?

data.query: How is my business loan eligibility calculated?
data.solution:
Business Loan Eligibility depends on various factors:
1.The applicant has to be in business for last 3 years with a minimum turnover of Rs.40 Lakhs.
2.The business must have generated profit for a minimum of 1 year.  
3.The applicant should be a Sole Proprietor / Partnership firm / Private Ltd Co. / Trust / LLP involved in the business of Manufacturing, Trading or Services.
4.The main applicant should be minimum of 25 years of age & should be no older than 65 years at the time of loan maturity.

data.query: What if a default is done in paying back my business loan?
data.solution:
A bounce on business loan EMI will lead to the following:  
1. Attract penalties  
2. Impact on the credit score  
3. At the event of the sustained bounce, the chances of getting calls from collection agencies soar high and more importantly, it can lead to financers refusing to extend any kind of credit facility to you in future hence, it is important to ensure that the EMIs are being paid in time.   
Click here to know more.

data.query: How is the emi of business loan calculated?
data.solution: The amount of EMI payable depends on the amount of your business loan, the interest rate and the tenure you are looking at. We have devised an EMI calculator to ease this process.  Get hands on with our easy-to-use business Loan EMI Calculator and calculate your monthly instalments by clicking here.

data.query: Needed to know does kotak offer any different type of business loan interest rate?
data.solution: Kotak offers reducing rate and fixed rate Business loans. The rate of interest can be adjusted based on the structured EMI suitable to you. Contact your relationship manager to know more about the rate benefits.

data.query: For the business loan taken what are the charges if I pay the same early?
data.solution:
Business Loan Nil foreclosure charges for term loan given to individual @ floating rate of interest.   
 
6% of foreclosure loan amount if within lock in period of 12 months from the date of agreement and 5% on foreclosure loan amount otherwise (plus GST and other applicable statutory levies). 
 
Please Note:   
1. In order to foreclose the business loan a written request needs to be submitted or a query under Foreclosure Statement, Only post completion of 6 EMI's and by serving a notice period a foreclosure statement will be issued to you.  
2. The time taken to issue a foreclosure statement is 15 working Days.  3. No Waiver can be offered on the Applicable Foreclosure Charges (if any),Lock-in period & Notice period for issuance of the Foreclosure Statement, as it is all clearly mentioned in the Loan Agreement signed by you, prior to the Loan Disbursement.

data.query: What are the charges if i close my business loan early?
data.solution:
Foreclosure on a loan can be done at any point of time during the tenure, however foreclosure charges of 6% will be applicable if the loan is foreclosed within 12 months of loan agreement date and 5% will be applicable if the loan is foreclosed after 12 months of loan agreement date on the outstanding Principal amount.  

You may request for foreclosure of loan  online (to submit your query/request) (OR) you may visit the nearest branch and submit the physical request (OR) you may call our Customer Contact Centre on 18602662666 (Local call rates apply) between 09:00 am to 07:00 pm from Mon to Sat excluding holidays. 
Turn Around Time (TAT) for issuance of Foreclosure Statement is 10 working Days
You need to submit the full prepayment cheque at our branch at least 7 working days before your next Installment date  
You can make the foreclosure payment either via DD/cheque/cash, cheque or DD in favor of "Kotak Mahindra Bank " after you receive the Foreclosure statement.
Once your foreclosure cheque is cleared your loan closure will closed in the banks records.

data.query: What is the Annual Review Charges charged for Overdraft Facility?
data.solution: 1.5% of renewal limit or Rs.5000/- (plus GST and other applicable statutory levies) whichever is higher.

data.query: What is the Non utilisation Charges charged for Overdraft Facility?
data.solution: 0.25% of difference between actual average utilisation and 25% of average operating limit during the quarter, subject to minimum of Rs. 1250 + GST, chargable on quarterly basis.

data.query: I returned my product but still my loan is active?/ Loan cancellation not done its getting delayed what to do next?
data.solution:
To cancel loans availed at retail outlet through Kotak Debit Card EMI, connect with merchant to get the cancellation confirmation. Send it to us at [email protected] to initiate cancellation process. 
Loans availed at e-commerce websites can be cancelled within 30 days of purchasing, subject to the merchant acknowledging the cancellation and initiating the cancellation process on the system, as mutually agreed between the bank and the merchant/service provider. 
Once the product is cancelled please do collect confirmation mail along with Refund reference number (RRN) from merchant and mail the details to [email protected] and wait for 7 working days.
If the same is not executed please Call our helpline to place a service request.

data.query: When do I pay my EMI? How would I get to know about the same?
data.solution: EMI is payable on the due date of every month (i.e. 5th of every month). If your payment is Not deducted from your bank than you will receive text message for the same and the payment can be made at your nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd branch or through online payment (IFSC Code: KKBK0000631, Account Number: CFB (Consumer Finance Business) Loan Number).

data.query: Will I get any Notification or reminder before the EMI is deducted from my bank account?

data.query: I did Not maintain balance in my account and missed paying my EMI. Where can I make the EMI payment Now?

data.query: How can I make my overdue payment?

data.query: How to cancel the loan, though the product is not booked and loan sanction letter has been released?
data.solution: Cancellation of loans availed at retail outlet through KOTAK Card DCEMI is not permitted. However, loan availed at e-commerce websites can be cancelled within 30 days of purchasing, subject to the merchant acknowledging the cancellation and initiating the cancellation process on the system, as mutually agreed between the bank and the merchant/ service provider.

data.query: Will No Cost EMI be applicable in case of replacement for defective products?
data.solution: If a concerned dealer replaces a defective product, your loan booked with Kotak Bank still continues with the original scheme under which it was booked. Hence, if the loan is originally booked under No Cost EMI scheme, the same would continue upon replacement also.

data.query: When will I be charged? How to change my DC EMI due date?
data.solution:
For loan availed at retail outlets till the 15th of the month, EMI will be deducted on 5th of the next month . Loans taken between 16th to 30th or 31st of the month will be charged with first EMI on the 5th of next to next month. For example, loan taken on 20th October will have the first EMI date as 5th of December. 
For transactions at online merchants, 5th of the month subject to completion of 30 days from date of transaction. Currently there is no option available to change the EMI due date. Payment due dates are uniform for all our Customers, which is 5th of every month.

data.query: Will my account get debited in case for DC EMI transaction?
data.solution: Your bank account may get debited with Re.1/- only for authorization, at some merchants. The loan amount, however, will be charged from the pre-approved limit assigned to you by Kotak Bank. You need to pay monthly instalments to Kotak Bank as per the EMI tenure selected by you.

data.query: I have Rs. 10,000 in my bank account and want to buy a product worth Rs. 20,000. Can I use Rs. 10,000 from my bank account and avail the remaining Rs. 10,000 through DC EMI?
data.solution: You will need to make the complete payment of Rs. 20,000 using DC EMI option. Partial down payment is not permitted in DC EMI.

data.query: How will I pay my EMI to the Bank?
data.solution: Kotak Bank will auto-enable standing instruction on your primary savings / current account to enable debit of monthly instalments. Please ensure to maintain sufficient balance in your account to cover for EMI.

data.query: I have seen No Cost EMI being offered in some merchant outlets / stores. Will I also get No cost EMI if I pay using DC EMI?
data.solution: No cost EMI is available on select product / brands / merchant outlets / stores. To check if your product / store offers No cost EMI, please inquire at the payment counter or with the Kotak Bank representatives stationed at the stores for available EMI schemes.

data.query: What charges do I need to pay for availing DC EMI?
data.solution: For most of the products where DCEMI is available, there is processing fees varying from Rs. 99 to Rs. 2,999

data.query: What is the minimum purchase amount for availing DC EMI?
data.solution: Minimum purchase amount is Rs. 5,000/- for DC EMI transactions.

data.query: What are the EMI tenures available for DC EMI?
data.solution: Currently Kotak DC EMI is available with 3/6/9/12 month EMI tenures.

data.query: Are all EMI schemes No cost EMI schemes?
data.solution: All schemes with Kotak DC EMI are not No Cost EMI schemes. No Cost EMI schemes are applicable on selected products / brands / stores. However, you can also choose to purchase the product of your choice under normal EMI schemes where interest will be levied on the EMI. You can check the scheme details at the respective stores either from the store representatives or from the Kotak representative present at the stores.

data.query: Are there any hidden charges in DCEMI? Is No Cost EMI, actually No Cost?
data.solution:
All charges applicable on DCEMI transactions like Processing Fee, are communicated upfront transparently. 
No Cost EMI is actually structured to offer a product on EMI at the product cost itself without any additional cost to it. However, processing fees, wherever applicable gets communicated and charged.

data.query: How do I apply for a new Consumer Finance Scheme?
data.solution: For this, you can visit the nearest store where Kotak Consumer Finance has a tie up.  Click here to find the store near you.

data.query: Where can I view my loan details?
data.solution: The sanction letter and welcome letter is sent to your registered Email ID available with the bank (as mentioned by you in the application form).

data.query: What is my EMI date?
data.solution:
EMI date is 5th of every month. Refer to welcome letter sent at your registered email id. 
For loan availed at retail outlets till the 15th of the month, EMI will be deducted on 5th of the next month . Loans taken between 16th to 30th or 31st of the month will be charged with first EMI on the 5th of next to next month. For example, loan taken on 20th October will have the first EMI date as 5th of December.

data.query: How do I change my EMI date?
data.solution: Currently there is no option available to change the EMI due date. Payment due dates are uniform for all our Customers, which is 5th of every month.

data.query: can my loan application be rejected? If so, what should I do?
data.solution: For this, you can visit the nearest store where Kotak Consumer Finance has a tie up. Click here to find the store near you.

data.query: What is Kotak Debit Card EMI?
data.solution: Debit Card EMI is the program offering EMI schemes to Kotak Bank customers who shop with their Debit Cards. Bank offers pre-approved limits to customers based on their relationship with the Bank and based on the Bank’s credit policies. Customers who enjoy pre-approved limit from the Bank can avail No Cost EMI and regular EMI by transacting with their Kotak bank Debit Card in selected stores/selected e-commerce merchants

data.query: How and when can I foreclose my Consumer Finance Scheme?
data.solution: It’s mandatory to pay first 3 EMIs then after, please write a mail to [email protected] or call us on 1860 266 7777 (Local call rates apply) between 09:00 am to 7:00 pm from Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays for foreclosing the Consumer Finance scheme. You will receive a mail from us with all the details.

data.query: How do I get the NOC letter of my loan completion?
data.solution: The NOC letter will be sent to you registered Email ID within 7 working days after the termination of the loan in our systems. If in case you have Not received the NOC, please write to us at [email protected] or call us on 1860 266 7777 (Local call rates apply) between 09:00 am to 7:00 pm from Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays.

data.query: What is CIBIL score, and why is it required?
data.solution: Your CIBIL score is your credit score. It reflects how well or how poorly you have repaid your loans or credit cards outstanding in the past. It is also known as ‘CIBIL TransUnion Score’. The higher your CIBIL score, the better your chances of getting a loan approved from the bank.

data.query: How do you get my consent for CIBIL information report?
data.solution: We have taken your consent through an OTP that you gave us when you have filled your loan application at the store.

data.query: How do I get my foreclosure letter?
data.solution: To make early repayments / foreclosure, you can write to us on [email protected] or call us on 1860 266 7777 (Local call rates apply) between 09:00 am to 7:00 pm from Monday to Saturday, excluding holidays.

data.query: My question is not listed here
data.solution:
We are sorry for the inconvenience! To assist you further, please connect with us by any of below mentioned ways

Use “search” option on this Help centre with different keywords.
Chat with Keya – Virtual assistant. Click here to initiate chat.
Write to us or Call us clicking “No, need more help” below .Please mention your query in detail. Our customer service officer would be glad to provide resolution.

data.query: Submit documents for query or complaint already raised
data.solution:

In case you have not registered your query or complaint yet and wish to connect with us, Click here

Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form 
Acceptable file type - pdf, doc, docx, ppt, xls, xlsx, jpeg, png

data.query: CIBIL Related
data.solution:

It takes generally 45-60 days to update the record in CIBIL's database
In case of modifications required on your CIBIL records, you would need to a copy of your latest CIBIL report

data.solution:

You can view and update your Email ID registered with the Bank by following simple steps:

On Net Banking:

data.query: When does any rate change get effected on my loan?
data.solution:
All rate changes get effected at the beginning of the calendar quarter for your loan. Calendar quarters would be: 1st January, 1st April, 1st July and 1st October. **



** All fixed and floating rate loans will get effected, in case of a rate change on a monthly reset basis.

data.query: Can I reduce or increase my tenure or EMI? If its possible then are any charges applicable?
data.solution:
You need to inform us in writing your desired Tenure/ EMI by Clicking here. (Provide link for webform)
We will put up the same for credit assessment and if approved, the loan account (EMI/Tenure) shall be modified accordingly
The Customer care department will send you a revised proposal for this rescheduling your loan which needs to be signed by the borrower to the loan. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of the borrowers to the loan.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for rescheduling your loan is 4 working Days

 
Please Note: Rescheduling charges are 1% of the Principal Outstanding.

data.query: Is it possible to change my EMI date? Are there any charges applicable?
data.solution:
Please Note that change of EMI Date is subject to a credit appraisal, post which charges of Rs. 5000/- + broken period interest (if any) & penal charges(if applicable) Or 0.5% of the Loan Amount + broken period interest (if any) + GST whichever is less would be applicable to process this request, if approved.
You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques as per your applicable SI/NACH mode of payment
To get the same processed you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm & submit your last 6 months Bank statement, request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs to our service officer
Once banks internal credit approval is received we will be sending the rescheduling proposal to your registered address. You need to submit the rescheduling proposal signed by borrower to the loan.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for processing the change in EMI Date is 4 working Days after all documents are completely and correctly submitted

data.query: Swapping of repayment mode
data.solution:
Please Note that change of repayment mode is subject to a credit appraisal. if approved by bank’s internal credit, charges of Rs.500 + GST would be applicable to process this request,
You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques and signed NACH / SI mandate form as per your applicable SI/NACH mode of payment
In case you are swapping to a SI mode the swap charges will not be applicable
To submit the request, you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm along with your last 3 months Bank statement of new bank account, request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for Swapping of EMI Date is 3 working Days after all documents are completely and correctly submitted

In case you have still not received the unused PDC's, then we request you to kindly submit your request online (Click here to submit your request/query) (OR) You may also call our Customer Contact Centre on 18602662666 (Local call rates apply) between 09:00 am to 07:00 pm from Mon to Sat excluding holidays.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for Retrieval of Unused PDC’s is 10 working Days

data.query: What do I need to do, incase I want to opt for an ECS mode making my EMI payments instead of PDC?
data.solution:
You would need to sign and submit an ECS/NACH Form along with the documents below,

 1 cheque to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX' Loan Account Holder name XXXX. This cheque needs to be undated and blank, at the bottom please mention 'Not more than the loan amount'

 6 cheques to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX. These cheque need to be undated and blank, at the bottom it please mention 'Not more than the EMI amount'

 Three cheques dated as per your EMI date and filled with the EMI amount payable in favor of Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX.

 PDC change charges* of 500/- +GST will be applicable per instance, in case ECS is being given from a different bank account

 All PDC's being submitted need to only be as per the Reserve Bank of India Cheque Truncation System-2010 format (CTS-2010)

 Please Note: * PDC swap charges are subject to change.

 To get the same processed you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch: from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm & submit your request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs to our service officer

data.query: When can I foreclose the loan? What is the procedure of full prepayment?
data.solution:
Applicable for All Customers having Floating Rate Home Loans / Individual Mortgage Loan Customers having Floating Rate Loans
We allow full prepayment of the loan anytime (after the full disbursement of the loan) with NIL charges

You need to inform us in writing or via email about your request for full prepayment

After your full prepayment request is received within 15 days' time a foreclosure statement of your loan will be issued to you

The Full prepayment statement is required to be signed by all borrowers to the loan. You need to get the full prepayment statement signed by all borrowers to the agreement and submit it along with the full prepayment cheque at our branch at least 7 working days before your EMI date. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of all the borrowers to the loan

Once your foreclosure cheque gets cleared your loan closure will happen in the Bank's records. You will receive the original documents of your loan back within 15 working days from the date of your foreclosure cheque getting cleared




Applicable for All Non-Individual Mortgage Loan Customers / Individual Mortgage Loan Customers having Fixed Rate Loans

We do not allow full prepayment for a period of 6 months from the date of your first EMI

At present, the foreclosure charges post this period will be 4%+applicable service tax of the loan outstanding + 4%+applicable service tax on the amounts prepaid during last 12 months (if any)

You need to inform us in writing or via email about your request for full part prepayment

After your full prepayment request is received within 15 days' time a foreclosure statement of your loan will be issued to you

The Full prepayment statement is required to be signed by all borrowers to the loan. You need to get the full prepayment statement signed by all borrowers to the agreement and submit it along with the full prepayment cheque at our branch at least 7 working days before your EMI date. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of all the borrowers to the loan

Once your foreclosure cheque gets cleared your loan closure will happen in the Bank's records. You will receive the original documents of your loan back within 15 working days from the date of your foreclosure cheque getting cleared

data.query: Foreclosure Statement - LAP
data.solution:

data.query: Submit documents for query or complaint already raised
data.solution:
Use this option in case you connected with our branch or phone banking team and registered your query /complaint and are here to submit required documents so that we can resolve the issue
In case you have not registered your query or complaint yet and wish to connect with us, Click here  
To submit documents as supporting for your query or complaint, please note below points:

Mention reference number if any for your query or complaint for which document needs to be submitted  
Mention your registered mobile number & email id while filling up the form 
Acceptable file type - pdf, doc, docx, ppt, xls, xlsx, jpeg, png
File size should be less than 5 MB including all documents
For sharing multiple documents, we recommend to use Net banking


Ways to submit documents :
Option 1 : Using Net banking 

Post Log in, click on the “Help” tab available at the top right corner of the page
Select “Inbox”
Select “Compose mail” 
Post selecting necessary details in all field , you may attach required documents and click “Send”

 
Option 2 : Using our Website or Mobile App
Click Here to submit document . Only one document can be submitted with each form.

data.query: When can I foreclose the loan? What is the procedure of full prepayment?
data.solution:
Applicable for All Customers having Floating Rate Home Loans / Individual Mortgage Loan Customers having Floating Rate Loans
We allow full prepayment of the loan anytime (after the full disbursement of the loan) with NIL charges

You need to inform us in writing by Clicking here about your request for full prepayment or walk-in to nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to get this request raised.
Click here to locate nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank.
After your foreclosure request is received, within 15 working days’ time a foreclosure statement of your loan will be issued to you
The Full prepayment statement is required to be signed by all borrowers to the loan. You need to get the full prepayment statement signed by all borrowers to the agreement and submit it along with the full prepayment cheque at our branch at least 7 working days before your EMI date. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of all the borrowers to the loan
Once your foreclosure cheque gets cleared your loan closure will happen in the Bank's records. You will receive the original documents of your loan back within 10 working days from the date of your loan termination post your foreclosure cheque getting cleared
 
Applicable for All Non-Individual Mortgage Loan Customers / Individual Mortgage Loan Customers having Fixed Rate Loans
We do not allow full prepayment for a period of 6 months from the date of your first EMI
At present, the foreclosure charges post this period will be 4%+applicable service tax of the loan outstanding + 4%+applicable service tax on the amounts prepaid during last 12 months (if any)
You need to inform us in writing by Clicking here about your request for full prepayment or walk-in to nearest Kotak Mahindra branch to get this request raised.
Click here to locate nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank.
After your foreclosure request is received, within 15 working days’ time a foreclosure statement of your loan will be issued to you
The Full prepayment statement is required to be signed by all borrowers to the loan. You need to get the full prepayment statement signed by all borrowers to the agreement and submit it along with the full prepayment cheque at our branch at least 7 working days before your EMI date. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of all the borrowers to the loan
Once your foreclosure cheque gets cleared your loan closure will happen in the Bank's records. You will receive the original documents of your loan back within 10 working days from the date of your loan termination post your foreclosure cheque getting cleared

data.query: When does any rate change get effected on my loan?
data.solution:
All rate changes get effected at the beginning of the calendar quarter for your loan. Calendar quarters would be: 1st January, 1st April, 1st July and 1st October. **



** All fixed and floating rate loans will get effected, in case of a rate change on a monthly reset basis.

data.query: Will I get any intimation when my rate changes?
data.solution:
We will send an SMS and Email alert, whenever there is change in RPLR/Base Rate/MCLR, provided your correct email id and mobile number is registered with the bank.
You can view and update your Email ID registered with the Bank by following simple steps: 
On Mobile Banking:
Go to Service Request
Profile -> Email ID Update
On Net Banking: 
Go to Profile/Update Contact Details
Contact Details -> Email ID -> Edit
Please Note: For security reason services like One Time Fund Fransfer, Online Net Banking Password Generation will not be available for 7 days after updating Email ID. 
Also you can update your Email ID only after 7 days from the date of last update.
To update your mobile number you may visit the nearest branch along with valid photo identity proof or visit any nearby Kotak ATM. 
You may click here to locate the nearest branch or ATM.
A rate change letter will also be sent to your registered address within 15 working days.

data.query: Is it possible to change my EMI date? Are there any charges applicable?
data.solution:
Please Note that change of EMI Date is subject to a credit appraisal, post which charges of Rs. 5000/- + broken period interest (if any) & penal charges(if applicable) Or 0.5% of the Loan Amount + broken period interest (if any) + GST whichever is less would be applicable to process this request, if approved.
You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques as per your applicable SI/NACH mode of payment
To get the same processed you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm & submit your last 6 months Bank statement, request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs to our service officer
Once banks internal credit approval is received we will be sending the rescheduling proposal to your registered address. You need to submit the rescheduling proposal signed by borrower to the loan.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for processing the change in EMI Date is 4 working Days after all documents are completely and correctly submitted

data.query: What do I need to do, incase I want to opt for an ECS mode making my EMI payments instead of PDC?
data.solution:
You would need to sign and submit an ECS/NACH Form along with the documents below,
1 cheque to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX' Loan Account Holder name XXXX. This cheque needs to be undated and blank, at the bottom please mention 'Not more than the loan amount'
6 cheques to be drawn in favor of 'Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX. These cheque need to be undated and blank, at the bottom it please mention 'Not more than the EMI amount'
Three cheques dated as per your EMI date and filled with the EMI amount payable in favor of Kotak Mahindra Bank Loan Account No.XXXX Loan Account Holder name XXXX.
PDC change charges* of 500/- +GST will be applicable per instance, in case ECS is being given from a different bank account
All PDC's being submitted need to only be as per the Reserve Bank of India Cheque Truncation System-2010 format (CTS-2010)
Please Note: * PDC swap charges are subject to change.
To get the same processed you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm & submit your request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs to our service officer

data.query: Can I reduce or increase my tenure or EMI? If its possible then are any charges applicable?
data.solution:
You need to inform us in writing your desired Tenure/ EMI by Clicking here (Provide link for webform)
We will put up the same for credit assessment and if approved, the loan account (EMI/Tenure) shall be modified accordingly
The Customer care department will send you a revised proposal for this rescheduling your loan which needs to be signed by the borrower to the loan. You would also need to submit the self-attested signature proof of the borrowers to the loan.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for rescheduling your loan is 5 working Days

 
Please Note: Rescheduling charges are 1% of the Principal Outstanding.

data.query: Swapping of repayment mode
data.solution:
Please Note that change of repayment mode is subject to a credit appraisal. if approved by bank’s internal credit, charges of Rs.500 + GST would be applicable to process this request,
You would also need to resubmit revised CTS-Post Dated Cheques and signed NACH / SI mandate form as per your applicable SI/NACH mode of payment
In case you are swapping to a SI mode the swap charges will not be applicable
To submit the request, you can walk into your nearest Kotak Retail Asset Branch from Monday to Friday between 10 am to 5 pm along with your last 3 months Bank statement of new bank account, request letter & valid signature Identity self-attested proofs.
Turn Around Time (TAT) for Swapping of EMI Date is 4 working Days after all documents are completely and correctly submitted
