data.query: What if FASTag blacklisted by other bank - what will be the status of Kotak FASTag which already has wallet balance?
data.solution:
If you own a FASTag from other Brand prior to the purchase of Kotak NETC FASTag for same vehicle and if that FASTag gets been blacklisted by the concerned authority, your Kotak NETC FASTag status will get blacklisted as well.
You are required to close/de-activate your previously owned FASTag.

data.query: What do I have to do if I have lost/ damaged my RFID Tag? What will happen to the account balance?
data.solution: Please call our Customer Care Number 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable) / 1800 3006 9090 (Toll Free) or send a mail to [email protected]  from your registered mail id for replacement of the FASTag. Your wallet balance will remain the same and the new tag will be linked to your wallet.

data.query: How do I cancel / surrender my FASTag?
data.solution:
Kindly refer the following steps to surrender your FASTag:
1) Login FASTag portal - https://fastag.kotak.com with your User Id - registered mobile number and password.
2) Click ""Tag Closure"" in left menu and Select: Single / Multiple / All Tag Closure option.
3) Enter Account Number and Upload image of personalised cancelled cheque.
4) In case, All tag closure option is selected security deposit and wallet balance (in case available) will be refunded in account number provided by customer.
5) TAT for processing the request : 8 days.
In case, you are unable to close the tag online or in case of demise of Tag holder, kindly send the cancellation request from the registered email-id to [email protected].
Attach dully filled and signed FASTag Maintenance Form, ID proof, personalised cancelled cheque copy and Death Certificate (in deceased case).
Link for Maintenance Form : https://www.kotak.com/content/dam/Kotak/Customer-Service/Download-Forms/Personal-Banking/fastag/fastag-maintenence-form.pdf

data.query: Can I recieve refund of my balance if I close my Fastag account?
data.solution: Yes, post closure of wallet, the closure proceeds will be transferred to your preferred account given while requesting the closure.

data.query: Are there any fess for closure of FASTag wallet?
data.solution:
There is no account closing fee. 
Security deposit will be refunded to your bank account on the acceptance of "Close Tag" request.
In case your FASTag wallet is running in Negative balance then you will need to fund the wallet to cover the negative balance before submitting the closure request.

data.query: How do I Hotlist/block my FASTag account?
data.solution:
You can call our Customer Care Numbers on 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable) / 1800 3006 9090 (Toll Free) for assistance. 
For Corporate customers - Please contact the Customer Care Number printed on your FASTag.

data.query: How to change / update Mobile Number / Email ID in my FASTag wallet?
data.solution:
Following are the options to change/ update your mobile number/ email-id in Kotak FASTag records :

1) To update Mobile No. / Email Id instantly, log in with your registered mobile number on https://kotakfastag.in/ >> Click On 'My Profile' tab wherein an 'Edit' icon will be displayed near mobile number and email id.
To update your mobile number :

Click on edit icon displayed near Mobile Number
Enter your new mobile number and verify via OTP. Kindly note, a combination of OTP will be sent to your old and new mobile number
After OTP verification, the new mobile number will be updated instantly in Kotak FASTag profile

To update your email Id:

Click on edit icon displayed near email-id.
Enter your new email-id and verify via OTP. Kindly note, a combination of OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number and new email-id.
After OTP verification, a validation link will be sent on new email-id.
Once you click on validation link, email id will be updated instantly in Kotak FASTag profile

2) Send email to [email protected] with attached valid KYC document and duly filled and signed FASTag Maintenance Form.
Link to access Maintenance Form: https://www.kotak.com/content/dam/Kotak/Customer-Service/Download-Forms/Personal-Banking/fastag/fastag-maintenence-form.pdf

data.query: Where I can get the login id for my FASTag wallet?
data.solution:
Your FASTag wallet login user id is your Registered Mobile number and a Password which would be sent to you on your registered email id.
For First time login -

Click on URL : https://fastag.kotak.com/
Enter registered mobile number as User ID & click on submit
Enter security captcha & click on Get OTP for first time login
Input the OTP received as old password
Create New password minimum of 8 characters in combination of alphabet, numeric & special character.
Confirm your password and enter security captcha. Click on Login.


Subsequent Login - User can login with the Password set for their wallet or using the Get OTP functionality.

data.query: How to change login ID and password?
data.solution:
Your Login ID on FASTag portal  is your registered mobile number. 
To update or change your password, log on to https://fastag.kotak.com/ and click on the “Change Password” option.

data.query: If I forget Kotak FASTag portal password, how can I log in?
data.solution: Click on “Forgot Password” option on https://fastag.kotak.com and  follow the steps to reset the password. Once you have reset the password,  you will be able to log into your account.

data.query: What are the helpline numbers for FASTag?
data.solution:
Please find below the Customer Care Numbers:    
1. For Individual customers - please call on 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable) /  1800 3006 9090  Toll Free ( Car / Jeep / Van )                                                                                                          
2. For Corporate customers - Please contact the Customer Care Number printed on your FASTag

data.query: What is the Customer Care number for FASTag?
data.solution:
If you have a Car / Jeep / Van then please call on 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable) / 1800 3006 9090 (Toll Free) (Car / Jeep / Van) Purple Color Tag for Vehicle class 4 (VC4). 
In case you have any other vehicle, please reach out to us on the Customer Care Number mentioned on your tag and register your complaint or mail at [email protected]

data.query: What is Perpetual/Limited KYC in Kotak FASTag wallet?
data.solution: As per RBI guidelines, all the MIN KYC FASTag wallet owners have been classified as "Perpetual/Limited" KYC. A perpetual/limited KYC status in FASTag wallet indicates that the FASTag wallet is valid forever without any time bound restrictions to update KYC along with monthly recharge limit of INR 10000.

data.query: Is it mandatory to upgrade the FASTag wallet to Full KYC? How will it affect usage of my FASTag?
data.solution: It is not mandatory to upgrade the KYC status of your wallet to Full KYC. As per RBI guidelines, a Perpetual/Limited KYC wallet is valid forever with the monthly recharge limit of INR 10000. Your daily transactions on FASTag will remain unchanged. As there is no time bound restriction, it will be your decision to upgrade the KYC status of FASTag wallet.

data.query: What are the steps to upgrade FASTag wallet to Full KYC?
data.solution:
You can upgrade your FASTag wallet to Full KYC using either of the following processes:
Online Process:
1) To upgrade your KYC digitally, request the link by calling on 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable).
2) The link will be sent to your registered mobile number via SMS.
3) Simply follow the steps displayed during the process to update your KYC in FASTag wallet.
4) PAN, Aadhaar and a blank page with pen to be kept handy.
Offline / Branch Process:
1) Visit any nearby branch with your PAN, identification document, address proof and passport size photograph. To locate a Branch near you, visit - https://www.kotak.com/en/reach-us.html
2) Ask for Customer Relationship Form (CRF) from the branch staff.
3) Submit the duly filled CRF with the documents.
4) Branch will verify the form and process it further.
5) You will receive an Email and SMS on the successful updation of KYC within 4 working days.
Note:
1) Post successful upgradation in Full KYC, you can maintain balance of INR 200000 per month in your FASTag wallet.
2) The above mentioned process is applicable for individual customers only.

data.query: How should I upgrade my FASTag wallet to Full KYC?
data.solution:
You can upgrade your FASTag wallet to Full KYC using either of the following processes:
Online Process:
1) To upgrade your KYC digitally, request the link by calling on 1860 2666 888 (local call charges applicable).
2) The link will be sent to your registered mobile number via SMS.
3) Simply follow the steps displayed during the process to update your KYC in FASTag wallet.
4) PAN, Aadhaar and a blank page with pen to be kept handy.
Offline / Branch Process:
1) Visit any nearby branch with your PAN, identification document, address proof and passport size photograph. To locate a Branch near you, visit - https://www.kotak.com/en/reach-us.html
2) Ask for Customer Relationship Form (CRF) from the branch staff.
3) Submit the duly filled CRF with the documents.
4) Branch will verify the form and process it further.
5) You will receive an Email and SMS on the successful updation of KYC within 4 working days.
Note:
1) Post successful upgradation in Full KYC, you can maintain balance of INR 200000 per month in your FASTag wallet.
2) The above mentioned process is applicable for individual customers only.

data.query: KYC Status in Kotak FASTag
data.solution:
Steps to know the KYC status of your FASTAG wallet:
1) Visit Kotak FASTag portal - https://fastag.kotak.com
2) Log in with user ID - Registered Mobile Number and Password / OTP
3) Click on "My Profile" in Menu section
4) Click on "KYC Tab" to know the KYC status of your FASTag wallet
or
4) View "Monthly Limit" tab in "Account Summary" :
        a) If the wallet balance monthly limit is INR 10000 it is a Perpetual/Limited KYC
        b) If the wallet balance monthly limit is INR 200000 it is a Full KYC wallet

data.query: Monthly Recharge Limit in FASTag
data.solution: As per RBI guidelines, all the MIN KYC FASTag wallet owners have been classified as "Perpetual/Limited" KYC status. A perpetual/limited KYC FASTag wallet indicates that the FASTag wallet is valid forever without any time bound restrictions to update KYC along with monthly recharge limit of INR 10000 whereas a Full KYC wallet has monthly recharge limit of INR 200000.

data.query: How to change/update mobile number/email-id for Kotak FASTag?
data.solution:
There are multiple options to  change/ update your mobile number/ email-id in Kotak FASTag records :    

1) To update Mobile No. / Email Id instantly, log in with your registered mobile number on https://kotakfastag.in/  >> Click On 'My Profile' tab wherein an 'Edit' icon will be displayed near mobile number and email id.

To update your mobile number :  


Click on edit icon displayed near Mobile Number
Enter your new mobile number and verify via OTP. Kindly note, a combination of OTP will be sent to your old and new mobile number
After OTP verification, the new mobile number will be updated instantly in Kotak FASTag profile


To update your email Id:


Click on edit icon displayed near email-id.
Enter your new email-id and verify via OTP. Kindly note, a combination of OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number and new email-id.

After OTP verification, a validation link will be sent on new email-id.

Once you click on validation link, email id will be updated instantly in Kotak FASTag profile



2)  Send email to [email protected] with attached valid KYC document and dully filled and signed FASTag Maintainanence Form.
Link to access Maintenance Form: https://www.kotak.com/content/dam/Kotak/Customer-Service/Download-Forms/Personal-Banking/fastag/fastag-maintenence-form.pdf

data.query: What is Digital Bulk Dispute Management of Kotak FASTag?
data.solution: The Digital Bulk Dispute management is one step process for managing multiple disputes online - fastag.kotak.com. This feature provides convenience to large fleet owners, as they can instantly register, track status of the disputes and download reports.

data.query: How to raise Bulk Dispute?
data.solution:
Steps to raise the bulk disputes:

Visit https://fastag.kotak.com and login with registered mobile number and password
Click on “Bulk Dispute” in the Menu (left hand side)
Download Standard Bulk Dispute Template and enter details related to the disputes. Ensure to select Complaints Type and Complaints Sub Type based on the nature of dispute in the template
You can upload up to 200 dispute records at a time. The template file should not exceed 2MB, and should be in .xls or .xlsx format only
Supporting images if any should be less than 10 MB
Upload the template and submit successfully

You will receive the status of disputes via SMS alerts on registered mobile number.

data.query: How can I check how many FASTags are attached to my vehicle
data.solution:
1) Click on https://www.npci.org.in/what-we-do/netc-fastag/check-your-netc-fastag-status
2) Enter you Vehicle Registration Number (VRN)/ NETC FASTag Id
3) Enter Captcha and then click on submit.
Kindly check the issue date of FASTag(s), the latest issued tags will be used for toll payments, any other tags should be closed with respective issuer bank/organization.

data.query: Why are FASTag(s) closed on my vehicle number?
data.solution: As per regulatory guidelines, only the most recent FASTag issued on your vehicle/chassis number can remain ACTIVE and be used for toll payments.Read the guidelines on - https://ihmcl.co.in/. Since more than one FASTag is mapped to your vehicle number; all other except most recent one will get closed.

data.query: I have multiple/more than one FASTags on my vehicle number; how should know which tag is used for toll fees deduction?
data.solution: Kindly click on this link: : https://www.npci.org.in/what-we-do/netc-fastag/check-your-netc-fastag-status to check how many tags are attached to the vehicle by entering the vehicle number & then click on submit. Further check the issue date of FASTag(s), the latest issued tags will be used for toll payments, any other tags should be closed with respective issuer bank/organization. Only the most recently issued tag will be active and used for toll payments. Ensure your FASTag wallet is sufficiently funded for toll transactions.

data.query: How can I update my correspondence address on my NRE/NRO account?
data.solution:
You can place a request at the nearest branch with the required documents. It will be executed within 7 working days from the date the request is placed. Please carry address proof documents like, passport, driving licence, voter's ID, Aadhaar card, utility bill, bank statement, bank account Passbook (updated and not more than 3 months old), etc.
Please carry the originals and their self-attested copies OR kindly contact your relationship manager for assitance.


You can also send the request through a secured mail, along with the necessary documents. Please follow below steps: 
Log in to Net Banking – Go to Service Requests – NRI Services – Select Request Type

data.query: How can I update my new mobile number on my NRE/ NRO Account?
data.solution:
You can place a request at the nearest branch by filling in the necessary application form OR contact your relationship Manager for assistance.   


You can also send the request through a secured mail, along with the necessary documents. Please follow below steps: 
Log in to Net Banking – Go to Service Requests – NRI Services – Select Request Type

data.query: How do I activate my dormant NRE account?
data.solution:
As an NRI customer, you can activate your dormant NRE account by sending a request  to [email protected]. , from your preferred email address that is updated in our Bank records.Kindly attach a Dormancy Removal request along with your identity, signature and address proof while sending the mail. To download a request letter, please click here.
Note: Dormant accounts are converted into inactive accounts, so you will need to initiate a debit/ credit transaction to have your NRE account fully activated.
You can also visit a nearby Kotak Mahindra Bank branch and place the request for NRE account activation. Please click here to locate the nearest branch. This will take up to 3 working days from the day you place the request with us.

data.query: How can I update my PAN card details on my NRE/NRO account?
data.solution:
To update your PAN card details on your NRE account, follow the easy steps given below: 
1. On Mobile Banking:  
1) Go to Service Request 
2) Select Profile - PAN Update 

2. On Net Banking:
1) Go to Profile 
2) Update Contact Details - Personal Information - PAN

3. You can drop a mail to [email protected] along with a self attested copy of your PAN card from your registered preferred email id with the bank.

data.query: How can I proceed with the rekyc request for my NRE/NRO account since I am overseas?
data.solution:
In order to complete the Re-KYC request for your NRE/NRO account, you need to send an email to [email protected] along with the Re-KYC declaration, Self-attested Passport, Visa, and Address proof document from your registered preferred email id with the bank.       
You can also send the request through a secured mail, along with the necessary documents. Please follow below steps: 
Log in to Net Banking – Go to Service Requests – NRI Services – Select Request Type

data.query: How can I open an NRE/ NRO account?
data.solution:
Glad to hear that you would like to open an NRE/NRO account with us. You can apply online for a new NRE/NRO account, by clicking here.
Once you have filled out the necessary details and submitted them, you would receive a call back from our concerned bank official, who will be happy to assist and guide you further with the documentation, and will then arrange to pick up the necessary documents from your overseas address.
In case you are in India, you can also visit a nearby Kotak Mahindra Bank branch, please click here to locate the nearest branch. Our representatives will assist you in opening your account. Currently it takes up to 10 working days to open an NRE account, provided all the necessary documentation is in place.

data.query: What are the documents that I need to provide to open an NRE/NRO account?
data.solution:
Usual Documents that you need to provide for NRE/NRO account opening are a copy of your passport, Valid VISA copy, and an address proof. 
Click here to view the list of documents required.

data.query: Can I apply debit card for my NRE/NRO account online?
data.solution:
Yes, you can apply debit card online for your NRE / NRO account; by following some simple steps: 
1. On Mobile Banking 
1) Go to Service Request 
2) Debit Card - Apply Debit Card 
 
2. On Net Banking 
1) Go to Card
2) Debit Card
3) Apply for a new Debit Card 
 
3. You can also place the request at our Customer Care Centre. The card will be delivered within 7 - 10 working days, once you have placed the request. 
Click here and select you account type to know the charges applicable (if any) for Annual/New/Replaced debit card.

data.query: What is my debit card limit?
data.solution: Depending upon the kind of debit card you hold or the account type you have with us, the debit card limit will vary. You can check your Debit card ATM & shopping limits by clicking here.

data.query: How can I reset my NRE/ NRO debit card PIN?
data.solution:
You can reset your NRE/NRO Debit Card PIN by following some simple steps, that are as follows:
 
1. On Mobile Banking 
1) Go to Service Request - Debit Card Request 
2) Select Regenerate PIN          

2. On Net Banking 
1) Go to Card 
2) Debit Card
3) Select Instant Regeneration of PIN 

3. Click here to reset your debit card PIN online.

data.query: Why am I unable to use my  debit card at ATM/POS?
data.solution:
We are really sorry for the inconvenience caused. That can happen at times, due to various reasons.
Please perform the following checks to understand the possible reason:
1) Look for any physical damage on your Debit Card, such as scratches and cracks on the magnetic strip or the chip.
2) Check the error message that appeared at the ATM or at the POS machine screen, and take the necessary steps. For example, if the error message is 'Network Connectivity Failure', then please try again. If it is 'Invalid PIN' or 'Invalid Authentication', try again with the correct PIN. If you do not remember your PIN, you can reset your PIN and try again. 
3) Check if your card is temporarily blocked. If yes, then please click on the button below to activate now and/ or reset the debit card PIN.
4) Click here and select your Debit Card type to know your daily transaction (amount) limit.

data.query: What is the minimum balance that I need to maintain in my NRE account?
data.solution:
The Average Quarterly Balance that you are supposed to maintain in your NRE/ NRO account is Rs. 10000. Depending upon the type of account you hold with us, the Average Monthly or Quarterly Balance may vary and on the occurrence of the balance not being maintained, applicable charges also vary.
Please click here and select your account type to know the Average Monthly or Quarterly Balance that needs to be maintained and the charges applicable for not maintaining the same.

data.query: What is the current interest rate offered in the NRE/NRO savings account?
data.solution:
Currently the bank offers 3.00% p.a up to Rs. 5 lakhs and 3.50% interest p.a. for Rs. 5 lakhs and above on NRE/NRO Savings Account (w.e.f. Oct, 2024). Interest rates are subject to change as per bank's discretion.                                                                              
Please click here to know more details.

data.query: How can I apply for a credit card?
data.solution: Yes, as an NRI customer, you can apply for an NRI Royale Signature Credit Card. To do that, you will need to fill in the physical application form and provide it at the nearest Kotak Mahindra branch. You can also connect with your Relationship Manager, who can assist you with the application form.For further information about this, click here.

data.query: Do I need to have a term deposit to apply for an NRI credit card?
data.solution: Yes, as an NR customer, you can apply for an NRI Royale Signature Credit Card, which is a secured card, provided against a term deposit that you maintain with us. For more details, please click here.

data.query: Are there any charges applicable on my credit card?
data.solution:
Depending on the type of credit card you hold with us, Annual Fees or Joining Fees or both will be applicable (if any). There are no additional charges applied on for the usage of credit card. However charges are applied in following cases:
1. Late payment charges along with applicable GST will be levied if payment is not received till the due date of your credit card bill 
2. Interest will be charged on all unpaid transactions till the date the part payment is received by us and then on the balance amount till the next statement date.
3.Interest is also levied on all fees, charges and GST 
4. In case of part payment received towards the previous outstanding, interest will be applicable even on the fresh transactions incurred on the card account 
5. Overlimit charges of INR 500.00 plus applicable GST will be levied if you have over utilisized the credit limit offered to you on your card. Kindly click here to know the charges applicable.

data.query: Can I apply for an Add On credit card against my NRI credit card?
data.solution: Yes, NRI Royale Signature Credit Card holders can apply for an Add On Credit Card. You will need to fill in the request for an add-on credit card and submit the same at the nearest Kotak Mahindra Bank branch. Please click here to locate the nearest branch. OR You can connect with your Relationship Manager, who will guide you with the application form. For further information about features and charges, please click here.

data.query: Can I access airport lounges through my NRI Royale Signature credit card?
data.solution:
Yes, your NRI Royale Signature Credit Card comes with complimentary access to Airport Lounges in India. For further information on this, click here.
Please Note: The maximum limit of 2 free visits for Kotak Signature card holders (per quarter) is applicable, along with other restrictions applicable.

data.query: I am a NRI , how can I book a fixed deposit?
data.solution:
It's great that you are thinking of saving for your future! You can book a Fixed/ Term Deposit by following the steps given below: 
1. On Mobile Banking 
1) Go to Banking - Fixed/ Recurring Deposits 
2) Open Fixed Deposit
 
2. On Net Banking 
1) Go to Investment - Deposits 
2) Open a Fixed/ Recurring Deposit     
 
Please Note: 
1. In order to know the NR Fixed Deposit Interest Rates, please click here.
2. A Fixed Deposit can be booked with a minimum amount of Rs. 50,000. There is no maximum limit. 
3. For NRO Fixed Deposits with a tenure below 181 days, the interest will be calculated at maturity as Simple Interest. 
4. No interest will be payable for NRE FDs maintained for less than 1 year. 
5. In case of a NRO Tax Saving Fixed Deposit: 
a) No pre-mature withdrawal of principal or accrued interest is permitted, under this scheme. 
b) Lien cannot be marked on the Fixed Deposit receipt, issued under this scheme. 
c) For Tax Saving Fixed Deposit, maximum amount is Rs. 150000 and minimum tenure is 60 months.

data.query: What is the minimum tenure for NRE term deposits?
data.solution: NRE Term Deposits need to be booked for a minimum tenure of 365 days (one year).In case of any premature withdrawal prior to one year, there would be no interest pay-out.

data.query: How can I close my NRE/NRO Fixed deposit?
data.solution:
To get the full benefit of your Fixed Deposit, it's always better to allow it to complete the term. But if you need to request Fixed Deposit closure / Premature withdrawal*, this is what needs to be done:  
1. On Net Banking  
a) Login to Net Banking  
b) Go to Investment > Deposit  
c) Select Premature Withdrawal of Deposit (Amount will be credited your account instantly).  
 
2. You can also place a request at the nearest Kotak Branch. (Amount will credited your account within 24-48 hours). 
Please note: 
Please click here for accessing Penal charges on on Pre-mature withdrawal of Fixed Deposits (NRO / NRE)

data.query: How do I cancel an order?
data.solution:

2. Click on Nykaa Man icon under KayMall Section

4. Click on User icon on top right corner and select "My Orders"

Your order will be cancelled and the refund will be initiated by Nykaa Man.

data.query: Can the ATM PIN be changed for Forex card or what if I forget my ATM PIN for Forex card?
data.solution: Yes, you can change the ATM PIN through online travel web log-in portal

data.query: Is there any minimum and maximum POS/Cash Withdrawal Limit for forex card?
data.solution: Please refer the link: Fees and charges

data.query: What options should I choose to withdraw cash from the ATM using Forex Card?
data.solution:
At the time of Cash withdrawal across Visa/Plus ATM's abroad, the screen will display 3 options for the type of accounts that you can carry out transactions in:
Credit

Savings
Checking
Please choose the Credit option for transaction to be successful or if this option is not available then only choose the checking option.

data.query: Do I need to pay additional amount over and above Cash withdrawal Charges levied by the Kotak Bank for ATM transactions done using Forex Card?
data.solution:
The banks in U.S. and other regions are given rights by the local federal laws to charge Surcharge/fees to other bank customers
for accessing their ATM's to withdraw money.
Accordingly, many ATM's in US do levy charges for withdrawing from their ATM over and above the charges levied by the Kotak Bank.

Similarly, there are certain ATM's across other countries as well which may levy a charge for transactions done by other bank customers. This charge is normally displayed to the customer during the transaction and the customer has the option to either proceed with the transaction or abort it.

data.query: How will I know which ATMs accept the Forex Card?
data.solution: All ATM's displaying the Visa/PLUS logo will accept the Forex Card.

data.query: Will the ATM display foreign exchange rates that one can use before withdrawing cash?
data.solution:
No. Post withdrawal of cash, with the amount withdrawn and balance available,
it is possible to arrive at the exchange rate charged.

data.query: What is Verified by Visa?
data.solution:
Verified by Visa is a service developed by Visa that gives you added security when you shop online with your Forex Card.
Verified by Visa protects your online transactions, giving you an added assurance that only you can use your Forex Card to make purchases over the internet..

data.query: How does Verified by Visa work and why is it needed?
data.solution:
Once your card is activated with the Verified by Visa service, your card number will be recognized 
whenever you make an online payment. System will check whether your card is secured with Verified by Visa.
 
After you provide your card details online, you will be redirected to the authorization page to specify your Verified by Visa authentication details. Your identity will be verified. Post confirmation of your identity your transaction will get completed. You will get a confirmation once the transaction is processed.
 
Verified by Visa adds an additional level of authentication for online card transactions on websites. It ensures that only you can use your Visa Card to shop online from the Verified by Visa enabled merchant store / website and proceeds to the payment page.

data.query: Can I use the forex card on websites which do not have verified by visa service enabled?
data.solution: Yes the card will work and will not prompt for a password.

data.query: What is Forex Card?
data.solution:
The Forex Card is a Chip based pre-paid card introduced in association with Visa. It is the first card to offer you the option of loading up to 13 currencies in a single card in a convenient and secure way.
 
This card gives you the freedom to shop anywhere in the world and provides access to the currency of your destination at competitive market rates.
 
It can be used at all VISA ATMs and merchant establishments accepting VISA Cards worldwide except for a few countries which are listed in FAQ (2)

data.query: Will I be able to use my Forex Card across the World?
data.solution:
Forex Card will work across the world other than the countries mentioned below:
 
Cuba, Sudan, Yemen, North Korea, Syrian Arab Republic, Nepal, Bhutan, Iran

data.query: How does Forex Card work?
data.solution:
Your Forex Card will be activated with the loaded currencies within 24 hours of the bank getting clear funds from your end. Once active, the card can be used at any international location.
 
The Forex Card works just like a Credit/Debit Card for purchase transactions at merchant establishments that have an electronic terminal. The only difference is that the transaction amount is directly debited from your Forex Card balance.
 
The card can be used to withdraw cash at all Visa ATMs worldwide. Irrespective of the currency in the card, the cash dispensed will be of the said currency of the country. Only ensure that you remember the PIN given to you with the card welcome kit. The same is unique for every card and can be changed only through travel web log-in. Following are the steps for using a Forex Chip Card during a POS transaction:
 
The cashier inserts the chip card in the POS terminal
The chip card must remain in the terminal till the transaction is completed
If the POS terminal does not have chip facility, the card can be used for normal magnetic stripe swipe on the POS terminal.

data.query: How is a Forex Chip Card better than a magnetic stripe card?
data.solution:
The chip card is also known as EMV Card. EMV is the brand name of EMV Co. which stands for Europay MasterCard Visa.
 
This organization has set the standards for payment cards with chips. Due to increasing fraud and misuse on the payments that are done through the magnetic stripe cards, the smart EMV cards have been developed according to the EMV standard in order to prevent fraud and misuse.
This makes the chip card more secure against card fraud than cards that rely only on data encoded in a magnetic stripe on the back of the card.

data.query: What are the currencies in which the Forex Card is available?
data.solution:
The Forex Card is currently available in 13 currencies:
 
US Dollar (USD), European Euro (EUR), Sterling Pound (GBP), Australian Dollar (AUD), Singapore Dollars (SGD), Swiss Franc (CHF), Hong Kong Dollars (HKD), Canadian Dollar (CAD), Japanese Yen (JPY), Swedish Krona (SEK), South African Rand (ZAR), United Arab Emirates Dirham (AED), Saudi Riyal (SAR). Each of these currencies is also termed as Currency Wallet, where in one can load one or more currency wallets of the respective country of travel.

data.query: How can I get forex card?
data.solution:
This card is available over the counter at all Kotak Mahindra Bank branches. You simply need to walk into the branch, get the Insta Forex Card, login to Net banking or Mobile banking app for self-registering the Forex Card.

You can alternatively fill in the Forex Card application form, submit the required documentation, fund your card and walk out with the welcome kit pack.

You can login to Kotak Net banking or Mobile banking app and apply for the Forex card with a choice to get the card delivered to your doorstep or picking up from nearest branch.

data.query: What is the validity of the forex card?
data.solution: The Forex Card is valid for a period of 3 or 5 years. Please refer to expiry date mentioned on your Forex card.

data.query: How does Forex Card function?
data.solution:
Utilization of the money from the currency wallet will be processed from the card as per the transaction made, corresponding to the currency of the country or currency of transaction, in which it is being used.
 
The card has inbuilt intelligence of pulling funds from other currency wallets, in case transaction currency wallet does not have sufficient funds. In such a scenario, the system checks for the currency wallet with sufficient balance to process the transaction and equivalent amount is debited from corresponding currency wallet with sufficient balance.
 
For Example: You have 50 GBP and 400 AUD on you Forex Card and you need to pay for your purchase 75 GBP in United Kingdom (London), instead of declining the transaction, the Forex Card will convert 75 GBP equivalents from AUD currency wallet to GBP currency wallet, for processing the payment transaction of 75 GBP. A cross currency conversion fee as per prevailing exchange rates will be applicable for converting the AUD to GBP.
 
The currencies as listed below will be the currency order of priority in which funds will be taken off your card if you don't have the currency or insufficient currency of the transaction on your Forex Card.
 
US Dollars
Pound Sterling
Euro
Australian Dollars
Swiss Franc
Singapore Dollars
Hong Kong Dollars
Canadian Dollars
Japanese Yen
Swedish Krona
South African Rand
United Arab Emirates Dirham
Saudi Riyal
Kindly note that if none of the wallets have sufficient balances to process the transaction then the transaction will be declined even if there are sufficient funds available collectively,  across all currency wallets.

data.query: What documents should I submit when I purchase the Forex Card?
data.solution:

data.query: What forex rates are charged at the time of purchase / reload / refund?
data.solution:
The card can be purchased/reloaded/refunded at the on-going forex card rate of that day
offered by Kotak Mahindra Bank.

data.query: Can Forex card be used over the Internet or for MOTO (Mail Order- Telephone Order) transactions?
data.solution:
Yes, the card can be used for any Internet based (E-Commerce) transactions; 
however the card cannot be used for MOTO transactions

data.query: Do I need to have Kotak Mahindra Bank account to purchase the Forex Card?
data.solution:
No, you don't need to have an account with Kotak Mahindra Bank to purchase the Forex Card.
You can just walk into any of our bank branches in India and purchase the card over the counter or apply using Kotak Net Banking

data.query: How much in advance one can buy foreign exchange for travel abroad?
data.solution:
The foreign exchange acquired for any purpose has to be used within 60 days of purchase.
In case it is not possible to use the foreign exchange within the period of 60 days it should be surrendered.

data.query: How soon can forex card be used after it is purchased?
data.solution:
Your card will be activated with the loaded currencies within 24 hours of the bank
having received the clear funds from your end.

data.query: How to obtain a Pre-Authorization using Forex card for Hotels/Car Rentals?
data.solution:
Hotels/Car Rentals before check-in/renting services etc., take a pre-authorization on your card. 
A Pre-Authorization is essentially blocking of a certain amount on your card. At the time of checking out of the hotel/settling the bill, you should: Ask the executive to settle the final bill against the pre-authorization that was taken.
 
Example: If Pre-Authorization was taken for $400, and the final bill is $700, this should be settled against the pre-authorization that was taken, and the balance asked to be credited back on the card. Ask the executive to cancel the pre-authorization (credit back the amount) that was taken and settle the bill by taking an authorization for the actual bill amount.

data.query: Can I use the forex card to pay in any currency?
data.solution:
Yes the card can be used to pay in any currency apart from those loaded on the card.
The card itself converts the balance in the currency wallets into the currency of transaction. Please note that cross currency conversion charges will be applicable in this case.

data.query: What services can I avail on Global Customer Assistance Services (GCAS)?
data.solution:
You can avail following services through GCAS:
 
Emergency Card Replacement
Emergency Cash Disbursement
Cardholder Inquiry Service
Lost and Stolen Card Reporting
Note: Please note that the services are charged as follows: Cardholder Inquiry Service: US $5 per inquiry, Lost/Stolen Card reporting: US $35 per card, Emergency Card Replacement: US $175, and / Emergency Cash Disbursement: US $175

data.query: How can I avail of Global Customer Assistance Services (GCAS) for my Forex Card?
data.solution:
You can call the VISA call centre numbers to avail VISA's Global Customer Assistance Services.
You can find a country wise list of GCAS numbers at http://www.visa-asia.com/ap/Subscription/gcas.jsp

data.query: Can one retain the foreign exchange on the Forex Card after returning to India?
data.solution:
One can retain the card only if the balance remaining on the card is less than $2000.
Else the amount needs to be refunded within 180 days from the date of arrival.

data.query: How does Forex Card work at Merchant Establishments?
data.solution:
Forex Card works in four easy steps at Merchant Establishments:
 
Merchant dips/swipe the card in the POS terminal.
The merchant then enters the transaction amount.
The POS terminal prompts for a PIN which has to be entered by you.
You enter the ATM PIN to complete the transaction and authorize the same with a signature

data.query: Can forex card be issued to Non Resident Indians?
data.solution:
As per the RBI guidelines, Forex Card can be issued only to Resident Indians & foreign national having 
Resident account with KMBL

data.query: What is Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) charge?
data.solution: DCC charge is applicable when you opt for Home Currency (i.e. USD) instead of Local Currency for an international transaction. Avoid DCC charge by selecting local currency/without currency conversion.

data.query: What do I have to do, in case there are fraudulent transactions on my Forex Card?
data.solution:
You need to immediately inform the Bank by calling the Call our 24-hour Customer Contact Centre
or by visiting any Kotak Mahindra Bank branch and get your Forex Card hot listed.
 In case of any fraudulent transactions that may have taken place on the Forex Card, you will need to lodge a claim by submitting the documents as and when required by the Bank. You can call our 24-hour Customer Contact Centre for further assistance.

data.query: Can the value of the forex card be topped up/reloaded?
data.solution: Yes, you can top up or reload your Forex Card.

data.query: Can I load multiple currencies on one forex card?
data.solution:
Yes, you can carry more than one currency on your Forex Card.
Only Forex Card gives you the power of carrying 13 currencies on just one card. So now forget to apply for a new card every time you visit a different country.

data.query: Whom should I contact if my forex card is lost or stolen?
data.solution:
In case of loss of card please report the loss immediately by:
 
Calling our Customer Contact Centre at 1860 266 2666 or
Log on to the online travel web log-in on www.kotak.com and hot-list your Forex Card
You will not be liable for transactions on your card account (if any) from the moment your loss report is registered with the bank and your card is hot-listed.

data.query: Can the value of the forex card be topped up/reloaded?
data.solution:
You can visit any Kotak Branch for replacement of your Forex Card.
The charges for the reissue of the card are given in the General Schedule of Fees and Charges available on the website. Replacement of Card:
USD 3.50, EURO 3, GBP 2.50, AUD 3.50, SGD 4.50, CHF 3.50, HKD 25, CAD 4.5, JPY 375 SEK 25 ZAR 43 AED 12.8 SAR 12.8 (within India) (exclusive of GST)

data.query: Is there any Insurance offered in Forex Card?
data.solution:
Yes, we offer you the following complimentary insurance coverage on Forex Card.
 
Loss Card Liability - up to Rs. 2,00,000/-.
Loss of Baggage & Personal Documents - up to Rs. 50,000/-

data.query: What needs to be done to lodge an insurance claim for forex card?
data.solution:
You will need to lodge a claim by submitting the documents as and when required by the Bank.

data.query: What should I do if I lose my Forex Card overseas?
data.solution:
To report loss of your Forex Card, just call VISA Global Customer Assistance (GCAS);
this service is available to our Forex Card customer anywhere in the world.
 
 For a nominal cost, you can request for the card to be delivered to you. For assistance in India, the toll free number is 000 117 highlight followed by 866 765 9644 when asked. Alternatively, you may place a collect call from anywhere in the world to +1 303 967 1090.
 
Visit Visa Global Customer Assistance at http://www.visa-asia.com/ap/Subscription/gcas.jsp

data.query: what is working capital loan?
data.solution:
A working capital loan is a loan taken to finance a company's everyday operations.  It is broadly classified as Overdraft limit or cash credit limit,  There are many other working capital facilities offered by us.
To know more about the different types of working capital facilities, their features, eligibility, fees and charges: 
Please follow the below steps: 
1) Go to www.kotak.com  
2) From the dropdown select Business  
3) Under business click on explore products  
4) Click on working capital and you can check out the features, eligilibility, fees and charges.
To apply for a working capital loan, please click here.
Just fill out your personal details in the form that appears after clicking.  
You can also get a quick working capital limit sanction by clicking here Kotak offers in principle approval of your working capital limit loan through a paperless process by using your income tax credentials.  
Please Note: The time line for the same is 7 working days, subject to approval.

data.query: What is overdraft?
data.solution: Overdraft is a credit facility given to a busines to run his day to day business activity. Eg, procurement of RM, payment of salary, payment to creditors etc.

data.query: What is Cash Credit?
data.solution: Cash Credit is a credit facility given to a busines to run his day to day business activity based on the DP of the customer. Eg, procurement of RM, payment of salary, payment to creditors etc.

data.query: What is the difference between Cash Credit and Overdraft?
data.solution: Overdraft is a fixed limit given to the client and Cash Credit is a limit given to the customer but the client can use the amount based on his DP (formula for illustration:(Stock+Debtors-Creditors)*75%). No stock audit required during the tenor of the loan in OD. Stock audit is rarely stipulated.

data.query: What is more beneficial Overdraft or Cash Credti?
data.solution: Overdraft is more suitable for a service provider and trader to some extent and CC is more suitable for manufacturers

data.query: What are the documents required for applying for a working capital loan?
data.solution:
Apart from regular KYC and business related details, financials, nature of requirement, debtor/creditor details, last 6 month banking, Sales Returns, etc. would be required.  In addition, basis the nature of facility sought, facility specific documents would be sought.  
Alternatively, to apply for a working capital loan, you can simply click here.

data.query: How to modify address for working capital loan?
data.solution: For updating your communication address, you can place a request at the nearest branch with the required documents. It will be executed within 7 working days from the date the request is placed. Please carry address proof documents like shop licence, Passport, driving license, Voter ID, Aadhaar card, utility bill, bank statement, bank account Passbook (updated and not more than 3 months old), etc. please carry the originals and self-attested copies.

data.query: What is the  insurance policy cover of the working capital loan?
data.solution:
Working capital loan insurance is a plan that covers a borrower's outstanding loan liability to hedge the risk of loss in case he/she dies during the loan re-payment term. These policies offer a cover that reduces every year, as the loan amount comes down.  Please Note: You may thoroughly go through the form before you avail the loan insurance.


For Creation of Term Deposit, please download and fill the TD Request Form and affix the Signature as per the mode of Operation. You will receive a confirmation call on your registered number and only post confirmation the request will be executed at our end. Please note that NRE/FCNR Deposits can be booked only for tenure exceeding 1 year. NRE/FCNR Deposits preclosed within 1 year will not earn any Interest.
NRE/NRO Deposit Form, FCNR Deposit Form 
For preclosure of Deposits, please fill the closure request form available here and sign the request as per mode of operation. You will receive a confirmation call on your registered number and only post confirmation the request will be executed at our end.
For booking NRE/NRO Fixed Deposit, Login into Net Banking and click on Accounts/ Deposits section > click on Fixed Deposit Section > click on Open Fixed Deposit and update the requisite details and click on Continue and post confirmation the fixed deposit will be booked.Please note that NRE Deposits booked and closed within 1 year will not earn any Interest. FCNR Deposits cannot be booked under this option.
For Preclosure of Deposits, Login into Netbanking and click on Accounts/ Deposits Section > Go to Deposits>Premature Withdrawal of Deposits > Fill the requisite details and click on Submit for closure and credit into account.

data.query: How working capital loan works?
data.solution: Working capital loans are a breather for many businesses. A working capital loan can be availed to finance the everyday cash requirements of a firm.  Interest is charged only on the amount that has been actually used up by the borrower, in case of Cash Credit and Overdraft accounts.  These loans do not have any monthly EMIs.

data.query: Can I sell the property kept as security even if the working capital loan is outstanding?
data.solution: No, the borrower cannot sell the property without clearing the outstanding working capital loan amount of existing bank/financial institution.

data.query: With kotak what is the minimum tenure for working capital loan?
data.solution: Minimum tenure of working capital loan is 12 months.

data.query: how can I trace my working capital loan application status?
data.solution:
Thank you for choosing to apply with Kotak Mahindra Bank. In order to check the application status of the working capital loan, please click here.
 
Please Note:  The same is subject to approval.

data.query: What is the time frame for approving a working capital loan?
data.solution:
At Kotak, we strive to give the best possible experience and time lines to all our customers. One can receive the disbursement after credit, technical and legal appraisals of the property have been done, besides execution of relevant documents & deposit of original property documents is required to be completed prior to disbursement.
Please Note : The time line for the same is 14 working days, subject to approval.

data.query: Does one get any extra benefit for applying for a working capital loan with kotak?
data.solution: At Kotak, we ensure that we give the best possible rates and fees to all our customers. To know more about the different types of working capital loans, their features, eligibility, fees and charges : Please follow the below steps:  1) Go to www.kotak.com  2) From the dropdown select Business  3) Under business click on explore products  4) Click on working capital and you can check out the features, eligilibility, fees and charges  To apply for a working capital loan, please click https://www.kotak.com/en/apply-now-form.html?pid=Working-Capital-Finance.  Just fill out your personal details in the form that appears after clicking.  You can also get a quick working capital limit sanction by clicking https://kmbl.digitalorder.finfort.ind.in/ Kotak offers in principle approval of your working capital limit loan through a paperless process by using your income tax credentials.  Please Note: The time line for the same is 7 working days, subject to approval.
